S04bsu021_u:1_0: om namo ratnatrayāya / om namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:5_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavāṃllaṅkāpure samudramalayaśikhare viharati sma nānāratnagotrapuṣpapratimaṇḍite mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca bodhisattvagaṇena nānābuddhakṣetrasaṃnipatitairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ anekasamādhivaśitābalābhijñāvikrīḍitairmahāmatibodhisattvapūrvaṃgamaiḥ sarvabuddhapāṇyabhiṣekābhiṣiktaiḥ svacittadṛśyagocaraparijñānārthakuśalairnānāsattvacittacaritrarūpanayavinayadhāribhiḥ pañcadharmasvabhāvavijñānanairātmyādvayagatiṃgataiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:6_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān sāgaranāgarājabhavanāt saptāhenottīrṇa 'bhūt /
S04bsu021_u:6_1: anekaśakrabrahmanāgakanyākoṭibhiḥ pratyudgamyamāno laṅkāmalayamavalokya smitamakarot - pūrvakairapi tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairasmiṃllaṅkāpurīmalayaśikhare svapratyātmāryajñānatarkadṛṣṭitīrthyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāryaviṣaye tadbhāvito dharmo deśitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:6_2: yannvahamapi atraiva rāvaṇaṃ yakṣādhipatimadhikṛtya etadevodbhāvayan dharmaṃ deśayeyam /
S04bsu021_u:7_0: aśrauṣīdrāvaṇo rākṣasādhipatistathāgatādhiṣṭhānāt - bhagavān kila sāgaranāgarājabhavanāduttīrya anekaśakrabrahmanāgakanyākoṭibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ samudrataraṃgānavalokya ālayavijñānodadhipravṛttivijñānapavanaviṣaye preritāṃstebhyaḥ saṃnipatitebhyaścittānyavalokya tasminneva sthitaḥ udānamudānayati sma - yannvahaṃ gatvā bhagavantamadhyeṣya laṅkāṃ praveśayeyam /
S04bsu021_u:7_1: tanme syāddīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:8_0: atha rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipatiḥ saparivāraḥ pauṣpakaṃ vimānamadhiruhya yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāma /
S04bsu021_u:8_1: upetya vimānādavatīrya saparivāro bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tūryatālāvacaraiḥ pravādyadbhirindranīlamayena
S04bsu021_u:8_2: daṇḍena vaiḍūryamusāra(galva)pratyuptāṃ vīṇāṃ priyaṅgupāṇḍunā anardhyeṇa vastreṇa pārśvāvalambitāṃ kṛtvā ṣaḍjarṣabhagāndhāradhaivataniṣādamadhyamakaiśikagītasvaragrāmamūrchanādiyuktenānusārya salīlaṃ vīṇāmanupraviśya gāthābhigītairanugāyati sma -
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.2_1: pratyātmavedyagatidharmarataṃ laṅkāṃ hi gantu samayo 'dya mune //
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.3_1: deśehi nātha iha dharmavaraṃ śroṣyanti yakṣa bahurūpadharāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:9_0: atha rāvaṇo laṅkādhipatiḥ toṭakavṛttenānugāyya punarapi gāthābhigītenānugāyati sma -
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.6_0: ṛddhyā gatvā tamadhvānaṃ yatra tiṣṭhati nāyakaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.7_1: anugṛhṇāhi me laṅkāṃ ye cāsmin puravāsinaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.9_2: śrotukāmā vayaṃ cādya ye ca laṅkānivāsinaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.17_1: anukampārthaṃ mahyaṃ vai yāhi laṅkāṃ sutaiḥ saha //
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.19_0: ājñākaro 'haṃ buddhānāṃ ye ca teṣāṃ jinātmajāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.19_1: nāsti tadyanna deyaṃ me anukampa mahāmune //
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.25_0: tatra gatvā purīṃ ramyāṃ punaḥ pūjāṃ pralabdhavān /
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.29_0: ahaṃ hi śrotā yakṣāśca jinaputrāśca sanniha /
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.30_1: adhyeṣayāmi tvāṃ bhaktyā nayaṃ pṛccha viśārada //
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.34_0: atra tāḥ parṣadaḥ sarvā ekaikasmin hi dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.34_1: sarvakṣetrāṇi tatraiva ye ca teṣu vināyakāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.38_0: cinteti kimidaṃ ko 'yaṃ deśitaṃ kena vā śrutam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.38_1: kiṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kena vā dṛṣṭaṃ nagaro vā kva saugataḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.39_0: tāni kṣetrāṇi te buddhā ratnaśobhāḥ kva saugatāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.41_0: atha vā dharmatā hyeṣā dharmāṇāṃ cittagocare /
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.42_0: na draṣṭā na ca draṣṭavyaṃ na vācyo nāpi vācakaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_1.42_2: ye paśyanti yathādṛṣṭaṃ na te paśyanti nāyakam //
S04bsu021_u:10_0: samanantaraprativibuddhe parāvṛttāśraye svacittadṛśyamātrādhigame 'vikalpapracārasthitasya laṅkādhipateḥ pūrvakuśalamūlasaṃcoditasya sarvaśāstravidagdhabuddheryathātathyadarśanasya aparapraṇeyasya svabuddhivicālanakuśalasya tarkadṛṣṭivyapetadarśanasya aparapraṇeyasya mahāyogayogino mahāviśvarūpadhāriṇaḥ upāyakauśalyagatiṃgatasya sarvabhūmyuttarottarasvalakṣaṇādhigamanakuśalasya cittamagomanovijñānasvabhāvavivekaratasya trisaṃtativyavacchinnadarśanasya sarvakāraṇatīrthyavyapetabuddheḥ tathāgatagarbhabuddhabhūmyadhyātmasamāpannasya sthitabuddhabuddhergaganādadhyātmavedyaśabdamaśrauṣīt - sādhu sādhu laṅkādhipate,
S04bsu021_u:10_2: evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yoginā yathā tvaṃ śikṣase /
S04bsu021_u:10_4: yathā tvayā dṛṣṭāḥ / anyathā dṛśyamāne ucchedamāśrayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:10_9: na svabhāvadṛṣṭinā, na rājādhipatyamadapatitena, ṣaḍdhyānādidhyāyinā / eṣa laṅkādhipate abhisamayo mahāyogināṃ parapravādamathanānāmakuśaladṛṣṭidālanānāmātmadṛṣṭivyāvartanakuśalānāṃ sūkṣmamabhivijñānaparāvṛttikuśalānāṃ jinaputrāṇāṃ mahāyānacaritānām /
S04bsu021_u:10_11: evaṃ kriyamāṇe bhūyo 'pyuttarottaraviśodhako 'yaṃ laṅkādhipate mārgo yastvayā parigṛhītaḥ samādhikauśalasamāpattyā /
S04bsu021_u:11_0: atha tasminnantare rāvaṇasyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ punarapi bhagavantaṃ sarvayogavaśavartinaṃ tīrthyayogavyāvartakaṃ pratyātmagatigocarodbhāvakaṃ nairmitanairmāṇikavyapetamadhigamabuddhiryadyogināṃ yogābhisamayakāle samādhimukhe samāptānāmadhigamo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:11_1: tasya ca adhigamādyogināṃ yogaśabdo nipātyate adhigamaneneti /
S04bsu021_u:11_2: tadahaṃ kāruṇikaṃ kleśendhanavikalpakṣayakaraṃ taṃ jinaputraiḥ parivṛtaṃ sarvasattvacittāśayānupraviṣṭaṃ sarvagataṃ sarvajñaṃ kriyālakṣaṇavinivṛttaṃ tayaivamṛddhyā [Vaidya_6] paśyeyam,
S04bsu021_u:11_4: adhigataṃ ca me nirvikalpācāraḥ sukhasamādhisamāpattivihārastathāgatagatibhūmiprāpako vivṛddhiṃ yāyāt /
S04bsu021_u:12_0: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ laṅkādhipateranutpattikadharmakṣāntyadhigataṃ viditvā tayaiva śobhayā daśagrīvasyānukampayā punarapyātmānaṃ śikhare subahuratnakhacite ratnajālavitate darśayati sma /
S04bsu021_u:12_1: adrākṣīddaśagrīvo laṅkādhipatiḥ punarapi dṛṣṭānubhūtāṃ śobhāṃ śikhare tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃśadvaralakṣaṇavibhūṣitatanum /
S04bsu021_u:12_2: svātmabhāvaṃ caikekasmin girau tathāgatānāṃ purataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mahāmatinā sārdhaṃ tathāgatapratyātmagatigocarakathāṃ prakurvantaṃ yakṣaiḥ parivṛtaṃ tāṃ deśanāpāṭhakathāṃ kathayantam /
S04bsu021_u:13_0: atha bhagavān punarapi tasyāṃ velāyāṃ parṣadamavalokya buddhyā na māṃsacakṣuṣā siṃharājavadvijṛmbhya mahāhāsamahasat /
S04bsu021_u:13_1: ūrṇākośācca raśmiṃ niścāryamāṇaḥ pārśvorukaṭikāyācca śrīvatsātsarvaromakūpebhyo yugāntāgniriva dīpyamānaḥ tejasendradhanurudayabhāskaropamena prabhāmaṇḍalena dedīpyamānaḥ śakrabrahmalokapālairgaganatale nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ sumeruśṛṅgapratispardhini śikhare niṣaṇṇo mahāhāsamahasat /
S04bsu021_u:13_2: atha tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaḥ teṣāṃ ca śakrabrahmādīnāmetadabhavat - ko nu khalvatra hetuḥ,
S04bsu021_u:13_3: ka ḥ pratyayo yadbhagavān sarvadharmavaśavartī mahāhāsaṃ smitapūrvakaṃ hasati? raśmīṃśca svavigrahebhyo niścārayati? niścārya tūṣṇīmabhavat svapratyātmāryajñānagocarasamādhimukhe patitāśayo 'vismitaḥ siṃhāvalokanatayā diśo 'valokya rāvaṇasyaiva yogagatipracāramanuvicintayamānaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:14_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvamevādhyeṣito rāvaṇasyānukampāmupādāya tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaścittāśayavicāramājñāya anāgatāṃ janatāṃ cāvalokya deśanāpāṭhābhiratānāṃ sattvānāṃ cittavibhramo bhaviṣyatīti yathārutārthābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyayogabalābhiniviṣṭānāṃ tathāgatā api bhagavanto vinivṛttavijñānaviṣayā mahāhāsaṃ hasanti /
S04bsu021_u:14_1: teṣāṃ kautūhalavinivṛttyarthaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchati sma - kaḥ khalvatra hetuḥ,
S04bsu021_u:14_2: kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya pravṛttaye? bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu mahāmate,
S04bsu021_u:14_4: lokasvabhāvamavalokya kudṛṣṭipatitānāṃ ca lokānāṃ traikālyacittāvabodhāya māṃ praṣṭumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:14_6: eṣa mahāmate rāvaṇo laṅkādhipatiḥ pūrvakānapi tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān praśnadvayaṃ pṛṣṭavān /
S04bsu021_u:14_8: ya eṣa praṣṭukāmo daśagrīvo 'nāgatānapi jinān prakṣyati /
S04bsu021_u:15_1: kṛtaste tathāgatenāvakāśaḥ / mā vilamba pracalitamaulin / yadyadevākāṅkṣasi, ahaṃ te tasta tasyaiva praśnasyavyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu021_u:15_2: yathā tvaṃ parāvṛttavikalpāśraye bhūmivipakṣakauśalena pravicayabuddhyā vicārayamāṇaḥ pratyātmanayalakṣaṇasamādhisukhavihāraṃ samādhibuddhaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ [Vaidya_7] śamathasukhavyavasthitaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamādhipakṣānatikramya acalāsādhumatīdharmameghābhūmivyavasthito dharmanairātmyayathātathākuśalo mahāratnapadmavimāne samādhijinābhiṣekatāṃ pratilapsyase /
S04bsu021_u:15_3: tadanurūpaiḥ padmaiḥ svakāyavicitrādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitaistaiḥ padmaiḥ svakāyaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ drakṣyasi,
S04bsu021_u:16_0: atha khalu laṅkādhipatirbhagavatā kṛtāvakāśa utthāya tasmādraśmivimalaprabhādratnapadmasadṛśādratnaśikharāt sāpsarogaṇaparivṛto vividhairanekavidhairnānāprakāraiḥ puṣpamālyagandhadhūpavilepanacchatradhvajapatākāhārārdhahārakirīṭamukuṭairanyaiśca adṛṣṭaśrutapūrvairābharaṇaviśeṣairviśiṣṭaistūryatālāvacarairdevanāgayakṣarākṣasagandharvakinnaramahoragamanuṣyātikrāntaiḥ sarvakāmadhātuparyāpannān vādyabhāṇḍānabhinirmāya ye cānyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tūryaviśeṣā dṛṣṭāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:16_1: tānabhinirmāya bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvāṃśca ratnajālenāvaṣṭabhya nānāvastrocchritapatākaṃ kṛtvā sapta tālān gagane 'bhyudgamya mahāpūjāmeghānabhipravṛṣya tūryatālāvacarāṇi nirnādya tasmādgaganādavatīrya sūryavidyutprabhe dvitīye mahāratnapadmālaṃkṛtau ratnaśikhare niṣasāda /
S04bsu021_u:16_2: niṣadya upacārātsmitapūrvaṃ bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo bhagavanta praśnadvayaṃ pṛcchati sma - pṛṣṭā mayā pūrvakāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:16_8: na ca gocaraṃ vikalpayanti / taṃ deśayanti / tatsādhu me bhagavān svayameva dharmavaśavartī dharmadvayaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho deśayatu /
S04bsu021_u:17_3: tatkathaṃ bhagavan dharmadvayaṃ prahāṇaṃ bhavati? ke cādharmā dharmāḥ? kathaṃ sati dvitvaṃ prahāṇadharmāṇāṃ vikalpalakṣaṇapatitānāṃ vikalpasvabhāvābhāvānāmabhautikabhautikānāmālayavijñānāparijñānādaviśeṣalakṣaṇānāṃ keśoṇḍukasvabhāvāvasthitānāmaśuddhakṣayajñānaviṣayiṇām /
S04bsu021_u:18_1: dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnāṃ bhedanātmakānāṃ vināśadharmiṇāṃ bālavikalpagocaraiḥ prativibhāgaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:18_2: evamihāpi kiṃ na gṛhyate? asti dharmādharmayoḥ prativibhāgo bālaprativikalpamupādāya,
S04bsu021_u:18_4: tiṣṭhantu tāvallaṅkādhipate ghaṭādayo bhāvā vicitralakṣaṇapatitā bālānāṃ na tvāryāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:18_6: evamihāpi kiṃ na gṛhyate? asti dharmādharmayoḥ prativibhāgaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:18_9: evaṃ sarvadharmaprarohadharmiṇāṃ bāhyānāmādhyātmikānāmapyavidyāniryātānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanopagānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ traidhātukopapannānāṃ dṛṣṭasukhasaṃsthānāmabhilāpyagativiśeṣāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:18_10: vijñānānāmekalakṣaṇānāṃ viṣayābhigrahaṇapravṛttānāṃ dṛṣṭo hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyamaviśeṣo vyavadānāvyavadānataśca kuśalākuśalataśca /
S04bsu021_u:18_13: kimaṅga punardharmādharmayoḥ prativikalpapravṛttayorviśeṣo na bhavati? bhavatyeva /
S04bsu021_u:19_1: tatra laṅkādhipate dharmāḥ katame? yaduta ete tīrthyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabālavikalpakalpitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:19_4: svacittadṛśyadharmatābhiniveśānna santi ghaṭādayo dharmā bālaparikalpitā alabdhaśarīrāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:20_0: tatra adharmāḥ katame? ye 'labdhātmakā lakṣaṇavikalpāpracārā dharmā ahetukāḥ teṣāmapravṛttirdṛṣṭā bhūtābhūtataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:20_9: yaduktavānasi laṅkādhipate dharmādharmāḥ kathaṃ praheyā iti,
S04bsu021_u:21_0: yadapyuktavānasi laṅkādhipate - pūrvakā api tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā mayā pṛṣṭāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:21_1: taiśca visarjitaṃ pūrvam / iti laṅkādhipate vikalpasyaitadadhivacanam /
S04bsu021_u:21_8: na kalpante na kalpyante / kena na kalpante? manasā ātmato jīvataḥ pudgalataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:21_9: kathaṃ na vikalpante? manovijñānena viṣayārthahetukena yathā rūpalakṣaṇasaṃsthānākārataśca /
S04bsu021_u:22_7: sa samyakpaśyati / anyathā paśyanto vikalpe carantīti /
S04bsu021_u:22_8: svavikalpā dvidhā gṛhṇanti / tadyathā darpaṇāntargataṃ svabimbapratibimbaṃ jale vā svāṅgacchāyā vā jyotsnādīpapradīpite vā gṛhe vā aṅgacchāyā pratiśrutkāni /
S04bsu021_u:22_11: vikalpayanti puṣṇanti, na praśamaṃ pratilabhante / ekāgrasyaitadadhivacanam - tathāgatagarbhasvapratyātmāryajñānagocarasyaitatpraveśo yatsamādhiḥ paramo jāyata iti /
S04bsu021_u:28_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmatibodhisattvasahitaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrānucārī buddhānubhāvena utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhirabhyaṣṭāvīt - utpādabhaṅgarahito lokaḥ khapuṣpasaṃnibhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.5_1: praśaṃsā yadi vā nindā tasyocyeta kathaṃ mune //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.7_0: na nirvāsi nirvāṇena nirvāṇaṃ tvayi saṃsthitam /
S04bsu021_u:29_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya svanāmagotraṃ bhagavate saṃśrāvayati sma -
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.10_0: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā buddho lokavidāṃ varaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.11_0: pṛcchantu māṃ jinasutāstvaṃ ca pṛccha mahāmate /
S04bsu021_u:30_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ paripṛcchati sma -
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.12_0: kathaṃ hi śudhyate tarkaḥ kasmāttarkaḥ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.12_1: kathaṃ hi dṛśyate bhrāntiḥ kasmādbhrāntiḥ pravartate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.13_1: nirābhāsaḥ kramaḥ kena jinaputrāśca te kutaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.14_0: muktasya gamanaṃ kutra baddhaḥ kaḥ kena mucyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.14_1: dhyāyināṃ viṣayaḥ ko 'sau kathaṃ yānatrayaṃ bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.15_0: pratyate jāyate kiṃ tatkāryaṃ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ca kim /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.17_1: kathaṃ dṛśyaṃ vibhāvo kathaṃ kathaṃ bhūmiṣu vartate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.18_0: nirbhidyentribhavaṃ ko 'sau kiṃ sthānaṃ kā tanurbhavet /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.18_1: sthitaḥ pravartate kutra jinaputraḥ kathaṃ bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.19_1: samādhyate kathaṃ cittaṃ brūhi me jinapuṃgava //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.21_1: lakṣaṇasya vyavasthānaṃ nairātmyaṃ ca kathaṃ bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.22_0: kathaṃ na vidyate sattvaḥ saṃvṛtyā deśanā katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.23_0: kathaṃ hi tīrthikāstvaṃ ca lakṣaṇairna virudhyase /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.24_0: śūnyatā ca kathaṃ kena kṣaṇabhaṅgaśca te katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.24_1: kathaṃ pravartate garbhaḥ kathaṃ loko nirīhikaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.27_1: kathaṃ ca budhyase lokaṃ kathaṃ brūṣe nirakṣaram //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.29_1: nairātmyaṃ ca dvidhā kena kathaṃ jñeyaṃ viśudhyati //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.30_0: jñānaṃ katividhaṃ nātha śīlaṃ sattvākarāṇi ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.32_1: kathaṃ yuktiḥ katividhā vyākhyānaṃ ca kathaṃvidham //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.33_0: annapānaṃ ca vaicitryaṃ maithunaṃ jāyate katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.33_1: rājā ca cakravartī ca maṇḍalī ca kathaṃ bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.35_0: vidyāsthānaṃ bhavetkiṃ ca mokṣo yogī katividhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.37_1: prajñaptimātraṃ ca kathaṃ brūhi me vadatāṃvara //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.38_0: ghanāḥ khe pavanaṃ kena smṛtirmegho kathaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.38_1: taruvallyaḥ kathaṃ kena brūhi me tribhaveśvara //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.39_0: hayā gajā mṛgāḥ kena grahaṇaṃ yānti bāliśāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.39_1: uhoḍimā narāḥ kena brūhi me cittasārathe //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.40_1: strīpuṃnapuṃsakānāṃ ca kathaṃ janma vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.41_1: kathaṃ caivaṃvidhā yoge narāḥ sthāpyā vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.42_0: gatyāgatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ liṅgaṃ kiṃ ca lakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.42_1: dhaneśvaro kathaṃ kena brūhi me gaganopama //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.45_0: abhakṣyaṃ hi kathaṃ māṃsaṃ kathaṃ māṃsaṃ niṣidhyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.47_1: sarvaratnamayā kṣetrāḥ kathaṃ kena vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.49_0: kena nirmāṇikā buddhāḥ kena buddhā vipākajāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.49_1: tathatā jñānabuddhā vai kathaṃ kena vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.50_0: kāmadhātau kathaṃ kena na vibuddho vadāhi me /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.52_1: vinayo bhikṣubhāvaśca kathaṃ kena vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.54_1: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta kathaṃ kena vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.55_1: cikitsāśāstraṃ sattvānāṃ kathaṃ kena vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.60_0: idaṃ śrutvā mahāvīro buddho lokavidāṃ varaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.65_0: nirodhā ṛddhipādāśca bodhyaṅgā mārga eva ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.67_0: svabhāvaḥ kalpanā kalpyaṃ dṛśyaṃ dṛṣṭidvayaṃ katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.68_1: jñānaṃ jñeyo gamaṃ prāptiḥ sattvānāṃ ca bhavābhavam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.69_0: hayā gajā mṛgāḥ kena grahaṇaṃ brūhi me katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.70_0: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ kena nānābhrāntistathā nayam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.70_1: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti bhūmīnāṃ nāsti vai kramaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.72_0: acalānāṃ tathā meroḥ pramāṇaṃ hi kṣiteḥ katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.73_1: kṣetre kṣetre rajāḥ kṛtto dhanvo dhanve bhavetkati //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.74_1: śaśavātāyanaṃ likṣā eḍakaṃ hi yavāḥ kati //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.75_0: prasthe hi syādyavāḥ kyantaḥ prasthārdhe ca yavāḥ kati /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.75_1: droṇe khāryāṃ tathā lakṣāḥ koṭyo vai biṃbarāḥ kati //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.76_0: sarṣape hyaṇavaḥ kyanto rakṣikā sarṣapāḥ kati /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.77_0: karṣo hi dharaṇāḥ kyantaḥ palaṃ vai kati kārṣikā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.77_2: evaṃ hi pṛccha māṃ putra anyathā kiṃ nu pṛcchasi //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.78_1: katyaṇuko bhavetkāyaḥ kiṃ nu evaṃ na pṛcchasi //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.79_0: vahneḥ śikhā katyaṇukā pavane hyaṇavaḥ kati /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.79_1: indriye indriye kyanto romakūpe bhruvoḥ kati //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.80_1: rājyaṃ ca taiḥ kathaṃ rakṣyaṃ mokṣaścaiṣāṃ kathaṃ bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.81_0: gadyaṃ padyaṃ kathaṃ brūṣe maithunaṃ lokaviśrutā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.82_0: vajrasaṃhananāḥ kena hyacalā brūhi me katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.83_0: ghanānāṃ saṃbhavaḥ kutra ṛtūnāṃ ca kuto bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.84_0: śobhāśca jinaputrāśca kutra me pṛccha māṃ suta /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.85_0: muktasya gamanaṃ kutra baddhaḥ kaḥ kena mucyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.86_1: kathaṃ hi śudhyate tarkaḥ kena tarkaḥ pravartate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.87_0: kriyā pravartate kena gamanaṃ brūhi me katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.88_0: vidārtha tribhavaṃ ko 'sau kiṃ sthānaṃ kā tanurbhavet /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.89_0: lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchase kena nairātmyaṃ pṛcchase katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.89_1: garbhā naiyāyikāḥ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.92_0: taruvallyaḥ kathaṃ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.93_0: vaṃśaḥ kaste guruḥ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.93_1: uhoḍimā narā yoge kāmadhātau na budhyase //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.94_0: siddhānto hyakaniṣṭheṣu yuktiṃ pṛcchasi me katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.94_1: abhijñāṃ laukikāṃ kena kathaṃ bhikṣutvameva ca //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.95_0: nairmāṇikān vipākasthān buddhān pṛcchasi me katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.96_1: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.96_2: etāṃścānyāṃśca subahūn praśnān pṛcchasi māṃ suta //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.97_1: siddhāntaṃ deśanāṃ vakṣye sahasā tvaṃ śṛṇohi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.98_0: upanyāsaṃ kariṣyāmi padānāṃ śṛṇu me suta /

S04bsu021_u:32_1: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - katividho bhagavan vijñānānāmutpādasthitinirodho bhavati? bhagavānāha - dvividho mahāmate vijñānānāmutpattisthitinirodho bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:32_2: na ca tārkikā avabudhyante yaduta prabandhanirodho lakṣaṇanirodhaśca /
S04bsu021_u:32_5: trividhaṃ vijñānaṃ pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ karmalakṣaṇaṃ jātilakṣaṇaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:32_6: dvividhaṃ mahāmate vijñānaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa aṣṭalakṣaṇoktaṃ khyātivijñānaṃ vastuprativikalpavijñānaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:33_0: tatra sarvendriyavijñānanirodho mahāmate yaduta ālayavijñānasya abhūtaparikalpavāsanāvaicitryanirodhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:33_6: na cānyo nānanyaḥ, tathā suvarṇaṃ bhūṣaṇāt / yadi ca mahāmate mṛtpiṇḍo mṛtparamāṇubhyo 'nyaḥ syāt,
S04bsu021_u:33_8: tasmānnānyaḥ / athānanyaḥ syāt, mṛtpiṇḍaparamāṇvoḥ pratibhāgo na syāt /
S04bsu021_u:33_13: tasmānmahāmate na svajātilakṣaṇanirodho vijñānānāṃ kiṃ tu karmalakṣaṇanirodhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:33_16: tīrthakarāṇāṃ mahāmate ayaṃ vādo yaduta viṣayagrahaṇoparamādvijñānaprabandhoparamo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:33_19: na cakṣurvijñānasya rūpālokasamudayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti anyatra kāraṇataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:34_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate saptavidho bhāvasvabhāvo bhavati yaduta samudayasvabhāvo bhāvasvabhāvo lakṣaṇasvabhāvo mahābhūtasvabhāvo hetusvabhāvaḥ pratyayasvabhāvo niṣpattisvabhāvaśca saptamaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:35_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate saptavidhaḥ paramārtho yaduta cittagocaro jñānagocaraḥ prajñāgocaro dṛṣṭidvayagocaro dṛṣṭidvayātikrāntagocaraḥ sutabhūmyanukramaṇagocarastathāgatasya pratyātmagatigocaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:36_1: etanmahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bhāvasvabhāvaparamārthahṛdayaṃ yena samanvāgatāstathāgatā laukikalokottaratamān dharmānāryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitān vyavasthāpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:36_2: tathā ca vyavasthāpayanti yathā tīrthakaravādakudṛṣṭisādhāraṇā na bhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:36_3: kathaṃ ca mahāmate tīrthakaravādakudṛṣṭisādhāraṇā bhavanti? yaduta svacittaviṣayavikalpadṛṣṭyanavabodhanādvijñānānām /
S04bsu021_u:37_1: ye kecinmahāmate śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā abhūtvā śraddhāhetuphalābhivyaktidravyaṃ ca kālāvasthitaṃ pratyayeṣu ca skandhadhātvāyatanānāmutpādasthitiṃ cecchanti,
S04bsu021_u:37_2: bhūtvā ca vyayam, te mahāmate saṃtatikriyotpādabhaṅgabhavanirvāṇamārgakarmaphalasatyavināśocchedavādino bhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:37_4: tadyathā mahāmate ghaṭakapālābhāvo ghaṭakṛtyaṃ na karoti,
S04bsu021_u:37_6: evameva mahāmate ye skandhadhātvāyatanabhāvā niruddhā nirudhyante nirotsyante,
S04bsu021_u:38_2: sikatābhyo vā tailasya / pratijñāhānirniyamanirodhaśca mahāmate prasajyate,
S04bsu021_u:38_4: teṣāmapi mahāmate trisaṃgatipratyayakriyāyogenopadeśo vidyate hetuphalasvalakṣaṇatayā atītānāgatapratyutpannāsatsallakṣaṇāstitāṃ yuktyāgamaistarkabhūmau vartamānāḥ svadṛṣṭidoṣavāsanatayā nirdekṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:38_5: evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭidaṣṭā viṣamamatayo 'jñaiḥ praṇītaṃ sarvapraṇītamiti vakṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:39_0: ye punaranye mahāmate śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā niḥsvabhāvaghanālātacakragandharvanagarānutpādamāyāmarīcyudakacandrasvapnasvabhāvabāhyacittadṛśyavikalpānādikālaprapañcadarśanena svacittavikalpapratyayavinivṛttirahitāḥ parikalpitābhidhānalakṣyalakṣaṇābhidheyarahitā dehabhogapratiṣṭhāsamālayavijñānaviṣayagrāhyagrāhakavisaṃyuktaṃ nirābhāsagocaramutpādasthitibhaṅgavarjyaṃ svacittotpādānugataṃ vibhāvayiṣyanti,
S04bsu021_u:39_1: nacirātte mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃsāranirvāṇasamatāprāptā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:39_2: mahākaruṇopāyakauśalyānābhogagatena mahāmate prayogena sarvasattvamāyāpratibimbasamatayā anārabdhapratyayatayā adhyātmabāhyaviṣayavimuktatayā cittabāhyādarśanatayā animittādhiṣṭhānānugatā anupūrveṇa bhūmikramasamādhiviṣayānugamanatayā traidhātukasvacittatayā adhimuktitaḥ prativibhāvayamānā māyopamasamādhiṃ pratilabhante /
S04bsu021_u:39_3: svacittanirābhāsamātrāvatāreṇa prajñāpāramitāvihārānuprāptā utpādakriyāyogavirahitāḥ samādhivajrabimbopamaṃ tathāgatakāyānugataṃ tathatānirmāṇānugataṃ balābhijñāvaśitākṛpākaruṇopāyamaṇḍitaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetratīrthyāyatanopagataṃ cittamanomanovijñānarahitaṃ parāvṛttyānuśrayānupūrvakaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ mahāmate te bodhisattvāḥ [Vaidya_20] pratilapsyante /
S04bsu021_u:40_0: anādikālāprapañcadauṣṭhulyavikalpavāsanahetukaṃ tribhavaṃ paśyato nirābhāsabuddhabhūmyanutpādasmaraṇatayā pratyātmāryadharmagatiṃgataḥ svacittavaśavartī anābhogacaryāgatiṃgato viśvarūpamaṇisadṛśaḥ sūkṣmaiḥ sattvacittānupraveśakairnirmāṇavigrahaiścittamātrāvadhāraṇatayā bhūmikramānusaṃghau pratiṣṭhāpayati /
S04bsu021_u:40_1: tasmāttarhi mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svasiddhāntakuśalena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:41_0: punarapi mahāmatirāha - deśayatu me bhagavān cittamanomanovijñānapañcadharmasvabhāvalakṣaṇakusumadharmaparyāyaṃ buddhabodhisattvānuyātaṃ svacittadṛśyagocaravisaṃyojanaṃ sarvabhāṣyayuktitattvalakṣaṇavidāraṇaṃ sarvabuddhapravacanahṛdayaṃ laṅkāpurigirimalaye nivāsino bodhisattvānārabhyodadhitaraṃgālayavijñānagocaraṃ dharmakāyaṃ tathāgatānugītaṃ prabhāṣasva /
S04bsu021_u:42_0: atha khalu bhagavān punareva mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - caturbhirmahāmate kāraṇaiścakṣurvijñānaṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:42_4: evaṃ sarvandriyaparamāṇuromakūpeṣu yugapatpravṛttikramaviṣayādarśabimbadarśanavat udadheḥ pavanāhatā iva mahāmate viṣayapavanacittodadhitaraṃgā avyucchinnahetukriyālakṣaṇā anyonyavinirmuktāḥ karmajātilakṣaṇasuvinibaddharūpasvabhāvānavadhāriṇo mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyāḥ pravartante /
S04bsu021_u:42_5: saha taireva mahāmate pañcabhirvijñānakāyairhetuviṣayaparicchedalakṣaṇāvadhārakaṃ nāma manovijñānaṃ taddhetujaśarīraṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:42_6: na ca teṣāṃ tasya caivaṃ bhavati - vayamatrānyonyahetukāḥ svacittadṛśyavikalpābhiniveśapravṛttā iti /
S04bsu021_u:43_1: tathā ca pravartamānāḥ pravartante yathā samāpannasyāpi yoginaḥ sūkṣmagativāsanāpravṛttā na prajñāyante /
S04bsu021_u:43_2: yogināṃ caivaṃ bhavati - nirodhya vijñānāni samāpatsyāmahe iti /
S04bsu021_u:43_5: evaṃ sūkṣmo mahāmate ālayavijñānagatipracāro yattathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā bhūmipratiṣṭhitāṃśca bodhisattvān,
S04bsu021_u:43_9: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate yoginā kalyāṇamitrajinayoge yogaḥ prārabdhavyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:44_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.101_0: nīle rakte 'tha lavaṇe śaṅkhe kṣīre ca śārkare /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.102_0: na cānyena ca nānanyena taraṃgā hyudadhermatāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.102_1: vijñānāni tathā sapta cittena saha saṃyutāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.103_1: ālayaṃ hi tathā citraṃ vijñānākhyaṃ pravartate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.104_1: abhinnalakṣaṇā hyaṣṭau na lakṣyā na ca lakṣaṇam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.105_1: vijñānānāṃ tathā cittaiḥ pariṇāmo na labhyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.106_0: cittena cīyate karma manasā ca vicīyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.108_1: vṛttiśca varṇyate cittaṃ lakṣaṇārthaṃ hi bāliśān //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.109_0: na tasya vidyate vṛttiḥ svacittaṃ grāhyavarjitam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.109_1: grāhye sati hi vai grāhastaraṃgaiḥ saha sādhyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.111_1: ālayasya tathā vṛttiḥ kasmādbuddhyā na gamyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.113_1: tathā tvaṃ lokapradyota tattvaṃ deśesi bāliśān //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.114_1: bhāṣase yadi vā tattvaṃ citte tattvaṃ na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.115_0: udadheryathā taraṃgā hi darpaṇe supine yathā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.117_0: pañcānāṃ khyāyate dṛśyaṃ kramo nāsti samāhite /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.118_0: raṅge na vidyate citraṃ na bhūmau na ca bhājane /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.120_0: vicitrā hi yathā māyā dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.121_1: buddhā hi tadvatsattvānāṃ cittamātraṃ vadanti vai //
S04bsu021_u:45_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena svacittadṛśyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpagocaraṃ parijñātukāmena saṃgaṇikāasaṃsargamiddhanivaraṇavigatena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:46_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittavijñānaprajñālakṣaṇavyavasthāyāṃ sthitvā upariṣṭādāryajñānalakṣaṇatrayayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:46_1: tatropariṣṭādāryajñānalakṣaṇatrayaṃ mahāmate katamat? yaduta nirābhāsalakṣaṇaṃ sarvabuddhasvapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānalakṣaṇaṃ pratyātmāryajñānagatilakṣaṇaṃ [Vaidya_23] ca /
S04bsu021_u:46_2: yānyadhigamya yogī khañjagardabha iva cittaprajñājñānalakṣaṇaṃ hitvā jinasutāṣṭamīṃ prāpya bhūmiṃ taduttare lakṣaṇatraye yogamāpadyate /
S04bsu021_u:47_3: etanmahāmate āryāṇāṃ lakṣaṇatrayaṃ yenāryeṇa lakṣatrayeṇa samanvāgatā āryāḥ svapratyātmāryajñānagatigocaramadhigacchanti /
S04bsu021_u:48_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punareva tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaścittāśayavicāramājñāya āryajñānavastupravicayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhito bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchati sma - deśayatu me bhagavānāryajñānavastupravicayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyamaṣṭottarapadaśataprabhedāśrayam,
S04bsu021_u:48_1: yamāśritya tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitānāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvagatiprabhedaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu021_u:48_2: yena parikalpitasvabhāvagatiprabhedena suprativibhāgaviddhena pudgaladharmanairātmyapracāraṃ prativiśodhya bhūmiṣu kṛtavidyāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthakaradhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhamatikramya tathāgatācintyaviṣayapracāragatipracāraṃ pañcadharmasvabhāvagativinivṛttaṃ tathāgataṃ dharmakāyaṃ prajñājñānasunibaddhadharmaṃ māyāviṣayābhinivṛttaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetratuṣitabhavanākaniṣṭhālayopagaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ pratilabheran /
S04bsu021_u:49_0: bhagavānāha - iha mahāmate eke tīrthyātīrthyadṛṣṭayo nāstitvābhiniviṣṭā vikalpabuddhihetukṣayasvabhāvābhāvānnāsti śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ vikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:49_1: yathā śaśaviṣāṇaṃ nāsti, evaṃ sarvadharmāḥ / anye punarmahāmate bhūtaguṇāṇudravyasaṃsthānasaṃniveśaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāstiśaśaśṛṅgābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā asti gośṛṅgamiti kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:49_4: dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgativikalpamātre mahāmate śaśaśṛṅgaṃ nāstyastivinivṛttaṃ na kalpayettathā mahāmate sarvabhāvānāṃ nāstyastivinivṛttaṃ na kalpayitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:50_0: ye punarmahāmate nāstyastivinivṛttā nāsti śaśaśṛṅgaṃ na kalpayanti,
S04bsu021_u:51_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nanu bhagavan vikalpasyāpravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā anumimīmahe vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam /
S04bsu021_u:51_1: bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam /
S04bsu021_u:51_8: tadubhayabhāvābhāvātkasya kimapekṣya nāstitvaṃ bhavati? atha na bhavati mahāmate apekṣya nāstitvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya astitvamapekṣya nāstitvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ viṣamahetutvānmahāmate nāstyastitvam siddhirna bhavati nāstyastitvavādinām /
S04bsu021_u:51_9: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭayo rūpakāraṇasaṃsthānābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā ākāśabhāvāparicchedakuśalā rūpamākāśabhāvavigataṃ paricchedaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:51_13: bhūtāni mahāmate pravartamānāni parasparasvalakṣaṇabhedabhinnāni ākāśe cāpratiṣṭhitāni /
S04bsu021_u:51_14: na ca teṣvākāśaṃ nāsti / evameva śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ mahāmate goviṣāṇamapekṣya bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:51_15: goviṣāṇaṃ punarmahāmate aṇuśo vibhajyamānaṃ punarapyaṇavo vibhajyamānā aṇutvalakṣaṇe nāvatiṣṭhante /
S04bsu021_u:51_16: tasya kimapekṣya nāstitvaṃ bhavati? athānyadapekṣya vastu,
S04bsu021_u:52_0: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - śaśagośṛṅgākāśarūpapadṛṣṭivikalpavigatena mahāmate bhavitavyam,
S04bsu021_u:52_1: tadanyaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ / svacittadṛśyavikalpānugamamanasā ca mahāmate bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:53_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.123_0: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate cittaṃ cittaṃ dṛśyātpravartate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.126_0: aṇuśo bhajyamānaṃ hi naiva rūpaṃ vikalpayet /
S04bsu021_u:54_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi svacittadṛśyadhārāviśuddhyarthaṃ bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - kathaṃ bhagavan svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati yugapatkramavṛttyā vā? bhagavānāha - kramavṛttyā mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati na yugapat /
S04bsu021_u:54_1: tadyathā mahāmate āmraphalāni kramaśaḥ pacyante na yugapat,
S04bsu021_u:54_2: evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā sattvānāṃ kramaśo viśudhyati [Vaidya_25] na yugapat /
S04bsu021_u:54_3: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāraḥ kramaśo bhāṇḍāni kurute na yugapat,
S04bsu021_u:54_4: evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ kramaśo viśodhayati na yugapat /
S04bsu021_u:54_5: tadyathā mahāmate pṛthivyāṃ tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ kramavṛttyā virohanti na yugapat,
S04bsu021_u:54_6: evameva mahāmate sattvānāṃ tathāgataḥ kramaśaḥ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ viśodhayati na yugapat /
S04bsu021_u:54_7: tadyathā mahāmate hāsyalāsyagītavāditravīṇālekhyayogyāḥ kramaśaḥ pravartante na yugapat,
S04bsu021_u:54_8: evemeva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kramaśaḥ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ viśodhayati na yugapat /
S04bsu021_u:54_9: tadyathā mahāmate darpaṇāntargatāḥ sarvarūpāvabhāsāḥ saṃdṛśyante nirvikalpā yugapat,
S04bsu021_u:54_10: evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ yugapattathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ viśodhayati nirvikalpāṃ nirābhāsagocarām /
S04bsu021_u:54_11: tadyathā mahāmate somādityamaṇḍalaṃ yugapatsarvarūpāvabhāsān kiraṇaiḥ prakāśayati,
S04bsu021_u:54_12: evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ svacittadṛśyadauṣṭhulyavāsanāvigatānāṃ sattvānāṃ yugapadacintyajñānajinagocaraviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayati /
S04bsu021_u:54_14: evameva mahāmate niṣyandabuddho yugapatsattvagocaraṃ paripācya ākaniṣṭhabhavanavimānālayayogaṃ yogināmarpayati /
S04bsu021_u:55_3: tathā khyāyannapi mahāmate tadātmako na bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:55_4: evameva mahāmate paratantrasvabhāve parikalpitasvabhāve vividhavikalpacittavicitralakṣaṇaṃ khyāyate /
S04bsu021_u:55_14: punaraparaṃ mahāmate dvividhaṃ śrāvakayānanayaprabhedalakṣaṇaṃ yaduta pratyātmāryādhigamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca bhāvavikalpasvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:55_15: tatra mahāmate pratyātmāryādhigamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ katamat? yaduta śūnyatānātmaduḥkhānityaviṣayasatyavairāgyopaśamātskandhadhātvāyatanasvasāmānyalakṣaṇabāhyārthavināśalakṣaṇādyathābhūtaparijñānāccittaṃ [Vaidya_26] samādhīyate /
S04bsu021_u:55_16: svacittaṃ samādhāya dhyānavimokṣasamādhimārgaphalasamāpattivimuktivāsanācintyapariṇaticyutivigataṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhavihāraṃ mahāmate adhigacchanti śrāvakāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:55_18: etaddhi mahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyātmāryādhigamavihārasukhamadhigamya bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nirodhasukhaṃ samāpattisukhaṃ ca sattvakriyāpekṣayā pūrvasvapraṇidhānābhinirhṛtatayā ca na sākṣātkaraṇīyam /
S04bsu021_u:55_19: etanmahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhaṃ yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhe na śikṣitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:55_20: bhāvavikalpasvabhāvābhiniveśaḥ punarmahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ katamaḥ? yaduta nīlapītoṣṇadravacalakaṭhināni mahābhūtānyakriyāpravṛttāni svasāmānyalakṣaṇayuktyāgamapramāṇasuvinibaddhāni dṛṣṭvā tatsvabhāvābhiniveśavikalpaḥ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:56_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nityamacintyaṃ ca bhagavatā pratyātmāryagatigocaraṃ paramārthagocaraṃ ca prabhāṣitam /
S04bsu021_u:56_1: nanu bhagavaṃstīrthakarā api nityācintyavādinaḥ kāraṇānām? bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ kāraṇasya nityācintyatāṃ prāpnoti /
S04bsu021_u:56_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? tīrthakarāṇāṃ mahāmate nityācintyaṃ na hetusvalakṣaṇayuktam /
S04bsu021_u:56_4: tatkathaṃ kenābhivyajyate nityamacintyamiti? nityācintyavādaḥ punarmahāmate yadi hetusvalakṣaṇayuktaḥ syāt,
S04bsu021_u:56_6: mama tu mahāmate paramārthanityācintyaṃ paramārthalakṣaṇahetuyuktaṃ bhāvābhāvavigataṃ pratyātmāryādhigamalakṣaṇatvāllakṣaṇavatparamārthajñānahetutvācca hetumadbhāvābhāvavigatatvādakṛtakākāśanirvāṇanirodhadṛṣṭāntasādharmyānnityam /
S04bsu021_u:56_9: tasmāttarhi mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nityācintyapratyātmāryajñānādhigamāya yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:57_2: yadi punarmahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ nityācintyatā kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā anumānabuddhyā nityaṃ samāpyate,
S04bsu021_u:57_3: tenaiva hetunā mamāpi mahāmate kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā nityamahetūpadeśāt /
S04bsu021_u:58_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta vāgvikalpamātraṃ hi mahāmate śaśaviṣāṇaṃ svahetulakṣaṇābhāvāt /
S04bsu021_u:59_1: saṃsāranirvāṇayoraviśeṣajñāḥ sarvabhāvavikalpābhāvādindriyāṇāmanāgataviṣayoparamācca mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti na pratyātmagativijñānālayaṃ parāvṛttipūrvakaṃ mahāmate /
S04bsu021_u:59_4: ataste mahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ svacittadṛśyagocarānabhijñā bāhyacittadṛśyagocarābhiniviṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:60_6: dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgatisvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ mahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇena pravartamānaṃ bālā utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭidvayapatitāśayā utpādaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadasatorvikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:61_1: katamāni pañca? yaduta śrāvakayānābhisamayagotraṃ pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraṃ tathāgatayānābhisamayagotram aniyataikataragotram agotraṃ ca pañcamam /
S04bsu021_u:61_2: kathaṃ punarmahāmate śrāvakayānābhisamayagotraṃ pratyetavyam? yaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanasvasāmānyalakṣaṇaparijñānādhigame deśyamāne romāñcitatanurbhavati /
S04bsu021_u:61_6: yaḥ śrāvakayānābhisamayaṃ dṛṣṭvā ṣaṭpañcamyāṃ bhūmau paryutthānakleśaprahīṇo vāsanakleśāprahīṇo 'cintyācyutigataḥ samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati - kṣīṇā me jātiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:62_1: anye punarmahāmate kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇagatibuddhayo bhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:62_4: atra te mahāmate kudṛṣṭivyāvṛttyarthaṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:63_4: sa pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraka iti viditvā pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayānurūpā kathā karaṇīyā /
S04bsu021_u:64_0: tatra mahāmate tathāgatayānābhisamayagotraṃ trividham - yaduta svabhāvaniḥsvabhāvadharmābhisamayagotram,
S04bsu021_u:64_3: yadā punarmahāmate trayāṇāmapyeṣāmanyatame deśyamāne svacittadṛśyadehālabhogapratiṣṭhācintyaviṣaye deśyamāne notrasati na saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S04bsu021_u:65_0: aniyatagotrakaḥ punarmahāmate triṣvapyeteṣu deśyamāneṣu yatrānunīyate tatrānuyojyaḥ syāt /
S04bsu021_u:65_3: pratyātmālaye tu svakleśavāsanāśuddhasya dharmanairātmyadarśanātsamādhisukhavihāraṃ prāpya śrāvako jinakāyatāṃ pratilapsyate /
S04bsu021_u:66_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
S04bsu021_u:67_0: tatrecchantikānāṃ punarmahāmate anicchantikatāmokṣaṃ kena pravartate? yaduta sarvakuśalamūlotsargataśca sattvānādikālapraṇidhānataśca /
S04bsu021_u:67_1: tatra sarvakuśalamūlotsargaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta bodhisattvapiṭakanikṣepo 'bhyākhyānaṃ ca naite sūtrāntā vinayamokṣānukūlā iti bruvataḥ sarvakuśalamūlotsargatvānna nirvāyate /
S04bsu021_u:67_2: dvitīyaḥ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhavapraṇidhānopāyapūrvakatvānnāparinirvṛtaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ parinirvāsyāmīti tato na parinirvāti /
S04bsu021_u:68_0: punarapi mahāmatirāha - katamo 'tra bhagavan atyantato na parinirvāti? bhagavānāha - bodhisattvecchantiko 'tra mahāmate ādiparinirvṛtān sarvadharmān viditvā atyantato na parinirvāti /
S04bsu021_u:68_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta aparityaktā hi mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvasattvāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:69_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svabhāvalakṣaṇatrayakuśalena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:69_2: kathaṃ punarmahāmate parikalpitasvabhāvo nimittātpravartate? tatra mahāmate paratantrasvabhāvo vastunimittalakṣaṇākāraḥ khyāyate /
S04bsu021_u:69_4: parikalpitasvabhāvaṃ vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā nāmābhiniveśalakṣaṇena ca nāmavastunimittābhiniveśalakṣaṇena ca /
S04bsu021_u:69_6: nimittalakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ punaryaduta teṣveva ādhyātmikabāhyeṣu dharmeṣu svasāmānyalakṣaṇaparijñānāvabodhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:69_9: tatra mahāmate pariniṣpannasvabhāvaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta nimittanāmavastulakṣaṇavikalpavirahitaṃ tathatāryajñānagatimanapratyātmāryajñānagatigocaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:71_0: eṣa mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvalakṣaṇapravicayo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pratyātmāryajñānagatigocaraḥ,
S04bsu021_u:72_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nairātmyadvayalakṣaṇapravicayakuśalena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:72_1: tatra mahāmate katamannairātmyadvayalakṣaṇam? yaduta ātmātmīyarahitaskandhadhātvāyatanakadambamajñānakarmatṛṣṇāprabhavaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpādigrahaṇābhiniveśātpravartamānaṃ vijñānaṃ sarvendriyaiḥ svacittadṛśyabhājanadehālayasvacittavikalpavikalpitaṃ vijñāpayati /
S04bsu021_u:73_0: tatra mahāmate dharmanairātmyajñānaṃ katamat? yaduta skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇasvabhāvāvabodhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:73_1: yathā mahāmate skandhadhātvāyatanānyātmavirahitāni skandhasamūhamātraṃ hetukarmatṛṣṇāsūtropanibaddhamanyonyapratyayatayā pravartate nirīham,
S04bsu021_u:73_2: tathā skandhā api mahāmate svasāmānyalakṣaṇavirahitā abhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇavicitraprabhāvitā bālairvikalpyante na tvāryaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:73_3: [Vaidya_30] cittamanomanovijñānapañcadharmasvabhāvarahitān mahāmate sarvadharmān vibhāvayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanairātmyakuśalo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:73_4: dharmanairātmyakuśalaḥ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nacirātprathamāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ nirābhāsapravicayāṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu021_u:73_6: sa tasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito 'nekaratnamuktopaśobhite mahāpadmarāje padmakṛtau mahāratnavimāne māyāsvabhāvagocaraparicayābhinirvṛtte niṣaṇṇaḥ tadanurūpairjinaputraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrāgatairbuddhapāṇyabhiṣekaiścakravartiputravadabhiṣicyate /
S04bsu021_u:74_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - samāropāpavādalakṣaṇaṃ me bhagavān deśayatu yathāhaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvāḥ samāropāpavādakudṛṣṭivarjitamatayaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran /
S04bsu021_u:75_0: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmaterbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā imāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu021_u:76_0: atha khalu bhagavānetameva gāthārthamuddyotayan punarapyetadavocat - caturvidho mahāmate asatsamāropaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:77_0: apavādaḥ punarmahāmate katamaḥ? yaduta asyaiva kudṛṣṭisamāropasyānupalabdhipravicayābhāvādapavādo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:78_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate asallakṣaṇasamāropasya lakṣaṇaṃ katamat? yaduta skandhadhātvāyatanānāmasatsvasāmānyalakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ - idamevamidaṃ nānyatheti /
S04bsu021_u:80_0: asaddhetusamāropaḥ punarmahāmate yaduta ahetusamutpannaṃ prāgvijñānaṃ paścādabhūtvā māyāvadanutpannaṃ pūrvaṃ cakṣūrūpālokasmṛtipūrvakaṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:82_1: parikalpitasvabhāvā iva paratantrāśayā viśvarūpacintāmaṇisadṛśāḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣanmaṇḍalagatā māyāsvapnapratibhāsapratibimbodakacandragatisamānutpādabhaṅgaśāśvatocchedarahitān sarvadharmān saṃmukhaṃ sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānavirahān dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu021_u:82_3: yāvadanekāni samādhikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhyaḥ taiḥ samādhibhiḥ kṣetrātkṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti /
S04bsu021_u:82_4: buddhapūjābhiyuktāśca sarvopapattidevabhavanālayeṣu ratnatrayamupadeśya buddharūpamāsthāya śrāvakagaṇabodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvatāraṇatayā bāhyabhāvābhāvopadeśaṃ kurvanti sadasatpakṣavinivṛttyartham /
S04bsu021_u:84_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu bhagavān śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇām,
S04bsu021_u:84_1: yena śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇāvabodhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nāstyastivikalpavarjitāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran /
S04bsu021_u:85_0: atha khalu bhagavān mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu,
S04bsu021_u:85_1: tatsādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S04bsu021_u:85_2: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:85_6: yaduta lakṣaṇaśūnyatā bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā apracaritaśūnyatā pracaritaśūnyatā sarvadharmanirabhilāpyaśūnyatā paramārthāryajñānamahāśūnyatā itaretaraśūnyatā ca saptamī /
S04bsu021_u:86_0: [Vaidya_32] tatra mahāmate lakṣaṇaśūnyatā katamā? yaduta svasāmānyalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:87_0: bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta svayaṃ svabhāvābhāvotpattito mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhavati sarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:88_0: apracaritaśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta apracaritapūrvaṃ nirvāṇaṃ skandheṣu /
S04bsu021_u:89_0: pracaritaśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta skandhā ātmātmīyarahitā hetuyuktikriyākarmayogaiḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante /
S04bsu021_u:91_0: paramārthāryajñānamahāśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta svapratyātmāryajñānādhigamaḥ sarvadṛṣṭidoṣavāsanābhiḥ śūnyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:92_0: itaretaraśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta yadyatra nāsti tattena śūnyamityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:92_1: tadyathā mahāmate śṛgālamātuḥ prāsāde hastigavaiḍakādyā na santi /
S04bsu021_u:92_3: sa ca taiḥ śūnya ityucyate / na ca punarmahāmate prāsādaḥ prāsādabhāvato nāsti,
S04bsu021_u:92_5: na ca te 'nyatra hastigavaiḍakādyā bhāvā nāvatiṣṭhante /
S04bsu021_u:93_0: na svayamutpadyate, na ca punarmahāmate te notpadyante anyatra samādhyavasthāyām /
S04bsu021_u:94_0: advayalakṣaṇaṃ punarmahāmate katamat? yaduta cchāyātapavaddīrghahrasvakṛṣṇaśuklavanmahāmate dvayaprabhāviatā na pṛthakpṛthak /
S04bsu021_u:94_2: na yatra mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ tatra saṃsāraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:95_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.135_1: saṃsāraṃ svapnamāyākhyaṃ na ca karma vinaśyati //
S04bsu021_u:96_0: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - etaddhi mahāmate śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvasūtrāntagatam /
S04bsu021_u:96_5: tasyāṃ codakaṃ nāsti, evameva mahāmate sarvasūtrāntadeśanā dharmā bālānāṃ svavikalpasaṃtoṣaṇam,
S04bsu021_u:96_7: tasmāttarhi mahāmate arthānusāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ na deśanābhilāpābhiniviṣṭena /
S04bsu021_u:97_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tathāgatagarbhaḥ punarbhagavatā sūtrāntapāṭhe 'nuvarṇitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:97_1: sa ca kila tvayā prakṛtiprabhāsvaraviśuddhyādiviśuddha eva varṇyate dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ sarvasattvadehāntargataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:97_2: mahārghamūlyaratnaṃ malinavastupariveṣṭitamiva skandhadhātvāyatanavastuveṣṭito rāgadveṣamohābhūtaparikalpamalamalino nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ śāśvataśca bhagavatā varṇitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:97_3: tatkathamayaṃ bhagavaṃstīrthakarātmavādatulyastathāgatagarbhavādo na bhavati? tīrthakarā api bhagavan nityaḥ kartā nirguṇo vibhuravyaya ityātmavādopadeśaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu021_u:98_0: bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate tīrthakarātmavādatulyo mama tathāgatagarbhopadeśaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:98_1: kiṃ tu mahāmate tathāgatāḥ śūnyatābhūtakoṭinirvāṇānutpādānimittāpraṇihitādyānāṃ mahāmate padārthānāṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bālānāṃ nairātmyasaṃtrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ nirvikalpanirābhāsagocaraṃ tathāgatagarbhamukhopadeśena deśayanti /
S04bsu021_u:98_2: na cātra mahāmate anāgatapratyutpannaiḥ bodhisattvairmahāsattvairātmābhiniveśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:98_3: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāra ekasmānmṛtparamāṇurāśervividhāni bhāṇḍāni karoti hastaśilpadaṇḍodakasūtraprayatnayogāt,
S04bsu021_u:98_4: evameva mahāmate tathāgatāstadeva dharmanairātmyaṃ sarvavikalpalakṣaṇavinivṛttaṃ vividhaiḥ prajñopāyakauśalyayogairgarbhopadeśena vā nairātmyopadeśena vā kumbhakāravaccitraiḥ padavyañjanaparyāyairdeśayante /
S04bsu021_u:98_6: evaṃ hi mahāmate tathāgatagarbhopadeśamātmavādābhiniviṣṭānāṃ tīrthakarāṇāmākarṣaṇārthaṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśena nirdiśanti - kathaṃ bata abhūtātmavikalpadṛṣṭipatitāśayā vimokṣatrayagocarapatitāśayopetāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeranniti /
S04bsu021_u:98_7: etadarthaṃ mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu021_u:98_9: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivinivṛttyarthaṃ tathāgatanairātmyagarbhānusāriṇā ca te bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:100_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo 'nāgatāṃ janatāṃ samālokya punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān yogābhisamayaṃ yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:100_1: bhagavānāha - caturbhirmahāmate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:100_2: katamaiścaturbhiḥ? yaduta svacittadṛśyavibhāvanatayā ca utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjanatayā ca bāhyabhāvābhāvopalakṣaṇatayā ca svapratyātmāryajñānādhigamābhilakṣaṇatayā ca /
S04bsu021_u:100_3: ebhirmahāmate caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:101_0: tatra kathaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svacittadṛśyavibhāvanākuśalo bhavati? yaduta sa evaṃ pratyavekṣate - svacittamātramidaṃ traidhātukamātmātmīyarahitaṃ nirīhamāyūhaniyūhavigatamanādikālaprapañcadauṣṭhulyavāsanābhiniveśavāsitaṃ traidhātukavicitrarūpopacāropanibaddhaṃ dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgativikalpānugataṃ vikalpyate khyāyate ca /
S04bsu021_u:101_1: evaṃ hi mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svacittadṛśyavibhāvanākuśalo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:102_0: kathaṃ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjito bhavati? yaduta māyāsvapnarūpajanmasadṛśāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ svaparobhayābhāvānnotpadyante /
S04bsu021_u:102_1: svacittamātrānusāritvādbāhyabhāvābhāvadarśanādvijñānānāmapravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā pratyayānāmakūṭarāśitvaṃ ca vikalpapratyayodbhavaṃ traidhātukaṃ paśyanto 'dhyātmabāhyasarvadharmānupalabdhibhirniḥsvabhāvadarśanādutpādadṛṣṭivinivṛttau māyādidharmasvabhāvānugamādanutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhante /
S04bsu021_u:103_0: mahāmatirāha - manomayakāya iti bhagavan kena kāraṇena? bhagavānāha - manomaya iti mahāmate manovadapratihataśīghragābhitvānmanomaya ityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:103_1: tadyathā mahāmate mano 'pratihataṃ girikuḍyanadīvṛkṣādiṣvanekāni yojanaśatasahasrāṇi pūrvadṛṣṭānubhūtān viṣayānanusmaran svacittaprabandhāvicchinnaśarīramapratihatagati pravartate,
S04bsu021_u:103_2: evameva mahāmate manomayakāyasahapratilambhena māyopamasamena samādhinā balavaśitābhijñānalakṣaṇakusumitamāryagatinikāyasahajo mana iva pravartate 'pratihatagatiḥ pūrvapraṇidhānaviṣayānanusmaran sattvaparipākārtham /
S04bsu021_u:103_3: evaṃ hi mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjito bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:104_0: tatra kathaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bāhyabhāvābhāvopalakṣaṇakuśalo bhavati? yaduta marīcisvapnakeśoṇḍukaprakhyā mahāmate sarvabhāvāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:104_2: ebhirmahāmate caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:105_1: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān hetupratyayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇām,
S04bsu021_u:105_2: yena hetupratyayalakṣaṇāvabodhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā sadasaddṛṣṭivikalparahitāḥ sarvabhāvanākramaṃ yugapadutpattiṃ na kalpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:106_0: bhagavānāha - dviprakāraṃ mahāmate pratītyasamutpādahetulakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaduta bāhyaṃ ca ādhyātmikaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:106_4: tantubhyaḥ paṭāḥ, vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭāḥ, bījādaṅkuraḥ, manthādipuruṣaprayatnayogāddadhno navanīta utpadyate,
S04bsu021_u:106_5: evameva mahāmate bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pūrvottarottaro draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu021_u:107_0: tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo yaduta avidyā tṛṣā karmetyevamādyā mahāmate dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante /
S04bsu021_u:107_1: ebhya utpannā mahāmate skandhadhātvāyatanākhyā dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante /
S04bsu021_u:108_6: vyañjanahetuḥ punarmahāmate utpannasya vikalpasya bhāvasya lakṣaṇoddyotanakṛtyaṃ karoti pradīpavadrūpādīnām /
S04bsu021_u:109_0: ete hi mahāmate svavikalpakalpitā bālapṛthagjanairna kramavṛttyā na yugapatpravartante /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.139_1: yatra bālā vikalpanti pratyayaiḥ sa nivāryate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.141_1: tadā grāhaśca grāhyaṃ ca bhrāntiṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.142_0: na cotpādyaṃ na cotpannaḥ pratyayo 'pi na kiṃcana /
S04bsu021_u:111_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavān vāgvikalpalakṣaṇahṛdayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ yena vāgvikalpalakṣaṇahṛdayena bhagavan suprativibhāgavinibaddhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā abhilāpābhilāpyārthadvayagatiṃgatāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya abhilāpābhilāpyārthadvayagatiṃ sarvasattvānāṃ viśodhayeyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:111_3: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavan iti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:112_4: etaddhi mahāmate caturvidhaṃ vāgvikalpalakṣaṇamiti me yaduktam,
S04bsu021_u:113_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametamevārthamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān punarapi vāgvikalpābhivyaktigocaram /
S04bsu021_u:113_1: kutra kasmāt kathaṃ kena bhagavan nṛṇāṃ vāgvijñaptivikalpaḥ pravartate? bhagavānāha - śirauronāsākaṇṭhatālvoṣṭhajihvādantasamavāyānmahāmate vāk pravartamānā pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:113_2: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vāg vikalpādanyā uta ananyā? bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate vāg vikalpādanyā nānanyā /
S04bsu021_u:113_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta taddhetūtpattilakṣaṇatvānmahāmate vāgvikalpaḥ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:113_5: avikalpahetukī syāt / athānanyā syāt, arthābhivyaktitvādvāg na kuryāt /
S04bsu021_u:114_1: punarapi mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vacanameva paramārthaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:114_2: uta yadvacanenābhilapyate sa paramārthaḥ? bhagavānāha - na mahāmate vacanaṃ paramārthaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:114_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta paramārthāryasukhābhilāpapraveśitvātparamārthasya vacanaṃ na paramārthaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.144_2: bhavaṃ parīkṣeta na saṃsāre nāpi nirvāyāt //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.145_1: pralobhya krīḍayitvā ca bhūtān dadyāttato mṛgān //
S04bsu021_u:117_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavān nāstyastitvaikatvānyatvobhayanobhayanaivāstinanāstinityānityavarjitaṃ sarvatīrthyāgatipracāramāryapratyātmajñānagatigamyaṃ parikalpitasvasāmānyalakṣaṇavinivṛttaṃ paramārthatattvāvatāraṃ bhūmyanusaṃdhikramottarottaraviśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ tathāgatabhūmyanupraveśalakṣaṇamanābhogapūrvapraṇidhānaviśvarūpamaṇisadṛśaviṣayānantalakṣaṇapracāraṃ svacittadṛśyagocaragativibhāgalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:117_1: yathā ca ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evamādiṣu parikalpitasvabhāvasvasāmānya lakṣaṇavinivṛttadṛṣṭayaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpattīḥ paripūrayema /
S04bsu021_u:118_3: bahujanahitāya tvaṃ mahāmate pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:118_4: tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S04bsu021_u:118_5: bhāviṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ [Vaidya_38] pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:118_6: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - svacittadṛśyamātrānavabodhānmahāmate bālapṛthagjanā bāhyavicitrabhāvābhiniveśena ca nāstyastitvaikatvānyatvobhayanaivāstinanāstinityānityasvabhāvavāsanāhetuvikalpābhiniveśena vikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:118_7: tadyathā mahāmate mṛgatṛṣṇodakaṃ mṛgā udakabhāvena vikalpya grīṣmābhitaptāḥ pātukāmatayā pradhāvanti,
S04bsu021_u:118_9: evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā anādikālavividhaprapañcavikalpavāsitamatayo rāgadveṣamohāgnitāpitamanaso vicitrarūpaviṣayābhilāṣiṇaḥ utpādabhaṅgasthitidṛṣṭyāśayā ādhyātmikabāhyabhāvābhāvākuśalāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:118_15: tadyathā mahāmate kaścideva puruṣaḥ śayitaḥ svapnāntare strīpuruṣahastyaśvarathapadātigrāmanagaranigamagomahiṣavanodyānavividhagirinadītaḍāgopaśobhitaṃ janapadamantaḥpuraṃ praviśya prativibudhyeta /
S04bsu021_u:118_17: tatkiṃ manyase mahāmate - api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet,
S04bsu021_u:118_18: yastadabhūtaṃ svapnavaicitryamanusmaret? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S04bsu021_u:118_19: bhagavānāha - evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭidaṣṭāstīrthyamatayaḥ svapnatulyātsvacittadṛśyabhāvānna prativijānante,
S04bsu021_u:118_21: mahāmate citrakarakṛtapradeśā animnonnatāḥ santo nimnonnatā bālaiḥ kalpyante,
S04bsu021_u:118_23: te ekatvānyatvobhayānubhayavādābhiniviṣṭāḥ svayaṃ naṣṭā anyānapi sadasatpakṣaviviktānutpādavādino nāstikā iti vakṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:118_27: tadyathā mahāmate taimirikāḥ keśoṇḍukaṃ dṛṣṭvā parasparamācakṣate - iadaṃ citramidaṃ citramiti paśyantu bho mārṣāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:118_28: tacca keśoṇḍukamubhayānutpannatayā na bhāvo nābhāvo darśanādarśanataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:118_29: evameva mahāmate tīrthyakudṛṣṭivikalpāśayābhiniviṣṭāḥ sadasatpakṣaikatvānyatvobhayānubhayatvavādābhiniviṣṭāḥ saddharmāpavādakā ātmānaṃ parāṃśca vinipātayiṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:118_30: tadyathā mahāmate acakramalātacakraṃ bālaiścakrabhāvena parikalpyate na paṇḍitaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:118_31: evameva mahāmate kudṛṣṭitīrthyāśayapatitā ekatvānyatvobhayānubhayatvaṃ parikalpayiṣyanti sarvabhāvotpattau /
S04bsu021_u:118_32: tadyathā mahāmate deve pravarṣati jalabudbudakāḥ sphaṭikamaṇisadṛśāḥ khyāyante /
S04bsu021_u:118_34: te ca mahāmate udakabudbudakā na maṇayo nāmaṇayo grahaṇāgrahaṇataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:118_35: evameva mahāmate tīrthyadṛṣṭivikalpāśayavāsanāvāsitā asataścotpādaṃ varṇayiṣyanti pratyayaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:119_1: punaraparaṃ mahāmate pramāṇatrayāvayavapratyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā āryajñānapratyātmādhigamyaṃ svabhāvadvayavinirmuktaṃ vastu svabhāvato vidyata iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:119_2: na ca mahāmate cittamano manovijñānacittaparāvṛttyāśrayāṇāṃ svacittadṛśyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahīṇānāṃ tathāgatabhūmipratyātmāryajñānagatānāṃ yogināṃ bhāvābhāvasaṃjñā pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:119_4: sa evaiṣāmātmagrāhaḥ poṣagrāhaḥ puruṣagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāhaḥ syāt /
S04bsu021_u:119_10: sā ca na cchāyā nācchāyā vṛkṣasaṃsthānāsaṃsthānataḥ,
S04bsu021_u:119_12: tadyathā mahāmate darpaṇāntargatāni sarvarūpapratibimbakāni khyāyante yathāpratyayataḥ svavikalpanācca,
S04bsu021_u:119_14: atha ca te mahāmate svacittadṛśyavikalpāḥ khyāyante bālānāṃ bimbākṛtayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:119_17: sā ca na bhāvā nābhāvā ghoṣāghoṣaśravaṇataḥ,
S04bsu021_u:119_20: te ca na bhāvā nābhāvā lobhyālobhyataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:119_22: / tadyathā mahāmate vetālayantrapuruṣau niḥsattvau piśācayuktigātspandanakriyāṃ kurvāte /
S04bsu021_u:119_23: tatra ca asadvikalpe bālā abhiniviśante gamanāgamanataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:119_25: sa ca asadbhūtasamāropaḥ / tasmāttarhi mahāmate utpādasthitibhaṅgaikatvānyatvobhayānubhayanāstyastyāryapratyātmavastvadhigamavikalparahitena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.149_1: mṛgā gṛhṇanti pānīyaṃ na cāsyāṃ vastu vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.150_1: bālā gṛhṇanti jāyantaṃ timiraṃ taimirā yathā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.151_1: bālaḥ kīle yathā kīlaṃ pralobhya vinivartayet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.155_0: cittaṃ keśoṇḍukaṃ māyāṃ svapna gandharvameva ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.155_1: alātaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā ca asantaḥ khyāti vai nṛṇām //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.157_0: darpaṇe udake netre bhāṇḍeṣu ca maṇīṣu ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.157_1: bimbaṃ hi dṛśyate teṣu bimbaṃ nāsti ca kutracid //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.158_0: bhāvābhāsaṃ tathā cittaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
S04bsu021_u:122_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate kleśajñeyāvaraṇadvayaviśuddhyarthaṃ sārthavāhavadānupūrvyā aṣṭottare nirābhāsapadaśate pratiṣṭhāpayanti yānabhūmyaṅgasuvibhāgalakṣaṇe ca /
S04bsu021_u:123_2: arthapravicayaṃ dhyānam, tathatālambanaṃ dhyānam, tāthāgataṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam /
S04bsu021_u:123_3: tatra mahāmate bālopacārikaṃ dhyānaṃ katamat? yaduta śrāvakapratyekabuddhayogayogināṃ pudgalanairātmyabhāvasvasāmānyabimbasaṃkalānityaduḥkhāśubhalakṣaṇābhiniveśapūrvakam,
S04bsu021_u:123_4: evamidaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nānyatheti [Vaidya_41] paśyataḥ pūrvottarottarata ā saṃjñānirodhādbālopacārikaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:123_5: tatra arthapravicayadhyānaṃ punarmahāmate katamat? yaduta pudgalanairātmyasvasāmānyalakṣaṇabāhyatīrthakarasvaparobhayābhāvaṃ kṛtvā dharmanairātmyabhūmilakṣaṇārthaṃ pravicayānupūrvakamarthapravicayadhyānaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:123_6: tatra tathatālambanaṃ dhyānaṃ mahāmate katamat? yaduta parikalpitanairātmyadvayavikalpayathābhūtāvasthānādapravṛttervikalpasya tathatālambanamiti vadāmi /
S04bsu021_u:123_7: tāthāgataṃ punarmahāmate dhyānaṃ katamat? yaduta tāthāgatabhūmyākārapraveśaṃ pratyātmāryajñānalakṣaṇatrayasukhavihārācintyasattvakṛtyakaraṇatayā tāthāgataṃ dhyānamiti vadāmi /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.161_0: nimittāni ca citrāṇi tīrthamārgaṃ nayanti te /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.162_2: śiro hi tasya mārjanti nimittaṃ tathatānugam //
S04bsu021_u:125_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇamiti bhagavannucyate /
S04bsu021_u:125_1: kasyaitadbhagavannadhivacanaṃ yaduta nirvāṇamiti ? bhagavānāha - sarvavijñānasvabhāvavāsanālayamanomanovijñānadṛṣṭivāsanāparāvṛttirnirvāṇamityucyate sarvabuddhairmayā ca nirvāṇagatisvabhāvaśūnyatāvastugocaram /
S04bsu021_u:126_2: ato na śāśvatam / tatrānucchedo yaduta sarvārthā atītānāgatapratyutpannāḥ pratyātmamapi gacchanti,
S04bsu021_u:127_0: punarmahāmate mahāparinirvāṇaṃ na nāśo na maraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:127_4: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate mahāparinirvāṇaṃ na nāśaṃ na maraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:127_6: punaraparaṃ mahāmate mahāparinirvāṇamaprahīṇāsaṃprāptito 'nucchedāśāśvatato naikārthato nānārthato nirvāṇamityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:130_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate adhiṣṭhānadvayādhiṣṭhitā bodhisattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ caraṇayornipatya praśnān paripṛcchanti /
S04bsu021_u:130_2: tatra mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamāyāṃ bhūmau buddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā mahāyānaprabhāsaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpadyante /
S04bsu021_u:130_3: samanantarasamāpannānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahāyānaprabhāsaṃ bodhisattvasamādhim,
S04bsu021_u:130_4: atha daśadiglokadhātuvyavasthitāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā mukhānyupadarśya sarvakāyamukhavācāsaṃdarśanenādhiṣṭhānaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu021_u:130_5: yathā mahāmate vajragarbhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyeṣāṃ ca tādṛglakṣaṇaguṇasamanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S04bsu021_u:130_6: evaṃ mahāmate prathamāyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samādhisamāpattyadhiṣṭhānaṃ pratilabhante /
S04bsu021_u:130_7: kalpaśatasahasraṃ saṃcitaiḥ kuśalamūlairanupūrveṇa bhūmipakṣavipakṣalakṣaṇagatiṃgatāṃ dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau mahāpadmavimānāsanasthasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tadanurūpairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ parivṛtasya sarvaratnābharaṇavibhūṣitakirīṭasya haritālakanakacampakacandrāṃśumayūkhapadmasadṛśā daśadiglokadhātvāgatā jinakarāstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya padmavimānāsanasthasya mūrdhanyabhiṣiñcanti vaśavarticakravartīndrarājavatsarvakāyamukhapāṇyabhiṣekena /
S04bsu021_u:130_8: sa ca bodhisattvaste ca bodhisattvāḥ pāṇyabhiṣekādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā ityucyante /
S04bsu021_u:131_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yatkiṃcidbodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratibhāti samādhyṛddhideśanākāreṇa,
S04bsu021_u:131_2: yadi punarmahāmate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmadhiṣṭhānamantareṇa pratibhānaṃ pratibhāyāt,
S04bsu021_u:131_5: tṛṇagulmavṛkṣaparvatā api mahāmate vividhāni ca vādyabhāṇḍāni nagarabhavanagṛhavimānāsanasthānāni tathāgatapraveśādhiṣṭhānena pravādyante /
S04bsu021_u:131_6: kiṃ punarmahāmate sacetanā mūkāndhabadhirā api mahāmate svadoṣebhyo vimucyante /
S04bsu021_u:132_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavaṃstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samādhisamāpattyavasthānakāle viśeṣabhūmau ca abhiṣekādhiṣṭhānaṃ prakurvanti? [Vaidya_43] bhagavānāha - mārakarmakleśaviyuktārthaṃ śrāvakadhyānabhūmyaprapatanatayā ca tathāgatabhūmipratyātmādhigamanatayā ca prāptadharmādhigamavivṛddhaye ca /
S04bsu021_u:132_1: etena mahāmate kāraṇena tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmadhiṣṭhānairadhitiṣṭhanti /
S04bsu021_u:132_2: anadhiṣṭhitāśca mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kutīrthyaśrāvakamārāśayapatitā nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran /
S04bsu021_u:134_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - pratītyasamutpādaṃ punarbhagavatā deśayatā kāraṇavyapadeśa eva kṛto na svanayaprakṛtyavasthānakathā /
S04bsu021_u:134_1: tīrthakarā api bhagavan kāraṇata utpattiṃ varṇayanti,
S04bsu021_u:134_9: na sa hetuvādaḥ / yugapadvayavasthitānāṃ bhagavannetadbhavati - asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti,
S04bsu021_u:134_11: kiṃ tu tīrthakaravyapadeśa eva bhagavan viśiṣyate na tvadīyam /
S04bsu021_u:134_12: tatkasya hetoḥ? tīrthakarāṇāṃ hiṃ bhagavan kāraṇamapratītyasamutpannaṃ kāryamabhinirvartayati /
S04bsu021_u:134_13: tava tu bhagavan kāraṇamapi kāryāpekṣaṃ kāryamapi kāraṇāpekṣam /
S04bsu021_u:134_15: ahetutvaṃ ca bhagavan lokasya - asmin satīdaṃ bruvataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:134_16: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate mamāhetukakāraṇavādo hetupratyayasaṃkaraśca prasajyate - asmin satīdaṃ bruvataḥ,
S04bsu021_u:134_17: grāhyagrāhakābhāvāt, svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhāt / ye tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakābhiniviṣṭāḥ svacittadṛśyamātraṃ nāvabudhyante bāhyasvaviṣayabhāvābhāvatvena,
S04bsu021_u:135_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirāha - nanu bhagavan abhilāpasadbhāvātsanti sarvabhāvāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:135_2: abhilāpo na pravartate / pravartate ca / tasmādabhilāpasadbhāvādbhagavan santi sarvabhāvāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:135_5: te ca mahāmate na bhāvā nābhāvāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:135_6: abhilapyante ca / tadyadavocastvaṃ mahāmate - abhilāpasadbhāvātsanti sarvabhāvā iti,
S04bsu021_u:135_7: sa hi vādaḥ prahīṇaḥ / na ca mahāmate sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu prasiddho 'bhilāpaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:135_8: abhilāpo mahāmate kṛtakaḥ / kvacinmahāmate buddhakṣetre 'nimiṣaprekṣayā dharmo deśyate,
S04bsu021_u:135_9: kvacidiṅgitaiḥ, kvacidbhūvikṣepeṇa, kvacinnetrasaṃcāreṇa, kvacidāsyena, kvacidvijṛmbhitena, kvacidutkāsanaśabdena, [Vaidya_44] kvacitkṣetrasmṛtyā,
S04bsu021_u:135_10: kvacitspanditena / yathā mahāmate animiṣāyāṃ gandhasugandhāyāṃ ca lokadhātau samantabhadrasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre animiṣairnetraiḥ prekṣamāṇāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhante anyāṃśca samādhiviśeṣān,
S04bsu021_u:135_12: dṛṣṭaṃ caitanmahāmate / iha loke kṛmimakṣikaivamādyāḥ sattvaviśeṣā anabhilāpenaiva svakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.164_0: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca /
S04bsu021_u:137_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - nityaśabdaḥ punarbhagavan kvabhihitaḥ? bhagavānāha - bhrāntau mahāmate /
S04bsu021_u:137_3: na tu vidvadbhiḥ / na ca punarna khyāyante / sā punarbhrāntirmahāmate anekaprakārā khyāyāt /
S04bsu021_u:137_6: kathaṃ punarmahāmate bhāvābhāvavivarjitā bhrāntiḥ? yaduta sarvabālavicitragocaratvātsamudrataraṃgagaṅgodakavatpretānāṃ darśanādarśanataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:137_9: ato hyabhāvo na bhavati / evaṃ bhrāntirāryāṇāṃ viparyāsāviparyāsavarjitā /
S04bsu021_u:137_11: na hi mahāmate bhrāntirvividhavicitranimittavikalpena vikalpyamānā bhedamupayāti /
S04bsu021_u:137_13: kathaṃ punarmahāmate bhrāntistattvaṃ bhavati? yena punaḥ kāraṇena mahāmate āryāṇāmasyāṃ bhrāntau viparyāsabuddhirna pravartate,
S04bsu021_u:137_14: nāviparyāsabuddhiḥ / nānyatra mahāmate āryā asyāṃ bhrāntau yakiṃcitsaṃjñino bhavanti nāryajñānavastusaṃjñinaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:137_16: sā punarbhrāntirviparyāsāviparyāsena vikalpyamānā gotradvayāvahā bhavati yaduta āryagotrasya vā bālapṛthagjanagotrasya vā /
S04bsu021_u:137_18: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate bālairbhrāntirvikalpyamānā śrāvakayānagotraṃ janayati? yaduta mahāmate svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhiniveśenābhiniviśyamānā śrāvakayānagotrāya saṃvartate /
S04bsu021_u:137_19: evaṃ mahāmate sā bhrāntiḥ śrāvakayānagotrāvahā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:137_20: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate saiva bhrāntirvikalpyamānā pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati? yaduta tasyā eva mahāmate bhrānteḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhiniveśāsaṃsargataḥ pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:137_21: tatra kathaṃ [Vaidya_45] punarmahāmate paṇḍitaiḥ saiva bhrāntirvikalpyamānā buddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati? yaduta mahāmate svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādbāhyabhāvābhāvavikalpanatayā vikalpyamānā buddhayānagotrāavahā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:137_22: ata eva mahāmate gotram / eṣa gotrārthaḥ / vicitravastubhāvanā punarmahāmate bālairbhrāntirvikalpyamānā saṃsārayānagotrāvahā bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:137_23: evamidaṃ nānyatheti / ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate bhrāntirvicitravastutvena kalpyate bālaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:137_24: sā ca na vastu, nāvastu / saiva mahāmate bhrāntiravikalpyamānā āryāṇāṃ cittamanomanovijñānadauṣṭhulyavāsanāsvabhāvadharmaparāvṛttibhāvādbhrāntirāryāṇāṃ tathatetyucyate /
S04bsu021_u:137_25: ata etaduktaṃ bhavati mahāmate - tathatāpi cittavinirmukteti /
S04bsu021_u:137_26: asyaiva mahāmate padasyābhidyotanārthamidamuktaṃ mayā - kalpanaiśca vivarjitaṃ sarvakalpanāvirahitamiti yāvaduktaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:138_0: mahāmatirāha - bhrāntirbhagavan vidyate neti? bhagavānāha - māyāvanmahāmate na lakṣaṇābhiniveśato bhrāntirvidyate /
S04bsu021_u:138_10: sā na doṣāvahā bhavati / cittadṛṣṭimohamātrametanmahāmate bālānāṃ yatkiṃcidabhiniveśato na tvāryāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.166_0: āryo na paśyati bhrāntiṃ nāpi tattvaṃ tadantare /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.167_0: bhrāntiṃ vidhūya sarvāṃ hi nimittaṃ jāyate yadi /
S04bsu021_u:140_2: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vicitramāyābhiniveśalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāṇāṃ māyopamatvaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:140_3: atha vitathābhiniveśalakṣaṇena? tadyadi bhagavan vicitramāyābhiniveśalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāṇāṃ māyopamatvaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:140_6: na hi bhagavan kaściddheturasti yena rūpaṃ vicitralakṣaṇākāraṃ khyāyate māyāvat /
S04bsu021_u:141_1: kiṃ tarhi mahāmate vitathāśuvidyutsadṛśasādharmyeṇa sarvadharmā māyopamāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:141_2: tadyathā mahāmate [Vaidya_46] vidyullatā kṣaṇabhaṅgadṛṣṭanaṣṭadarśanaṃ punarbālānāṃ khyāyate,
S04bsu021_u:141_3: evameva mahāmate sarvabhāvāḥ svavikalpasāmānyalakṣaṇāḥ pravicayābhāvānna khyāyante rūpalakṣaṇābhiniveśataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:143_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - anutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā māyopamāśceti /
S04bsu021_u:143_1: nanu te bhagavan evaṃ bruvataḥ pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣaḥ prasajyate,
S04bsu021_u:143_3: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate mamānutpādaṃ bhāvānāṃ māyopamatvenābhilapataḥ pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:143_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta utpādānutpādasvacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhātsadasatorbāhyabhāvābhāvānutpattidarśanānna mahāmate pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣaḥ prasajyate /
S04bsu021_u:143_6: tīrthakaramohavargā hi mahāmate sadasatorbhāvānāmutpattimicchanti na svavikalpavicitrābhiniveśapratyayataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:143_9: bhāvopadeśaḥ punarmahāmate saṃsāraparigrahārthaṃ ca nāstītyucchedanivāraṇārthaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:143_11: māyābhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇanirdeśena mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇavyāvṛttyarthaṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ kṛdṛṣṭilakṣaṇapatitāśayānāṃ svacittadṛśyamātrānavadhāriṇāṃ hetupratyayakriyotpattilakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭhānāṃ nivāraṇārthaṃ māyāsvapnasvabhāvalakṣaṇān sarvadharmān deśayāmi /
S04bsu021_u:143_12: ete bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭilakṣaṇāśayābhiniviṣṭā ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca sarvadharmā yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanādvisaṃvādayiṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:143_13: tatra yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanaṃ mahāmate sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaduta svacittadṛśyamātrāvatāraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:145_1: yairnāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ sūpalakṣitairbodhisattvā mahāsattvā arthapadavyañjanānusāriṇaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya tathaiva sarvasattvānavabodhayiṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:145_2: tatra mahāmate kāyo nāma yaduta yadvastvāśritya nāma kriyate,
S04bsu021_u:145_4: eṣa mahāmate nāmakāyaḥ / padakāyaḥ punarmahāmate yaduta padārthakāyasadbhāvo niścayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:146_2: nāma punarmahāmate yaduta akṣarāṇāṃ ca nāmasvabhāvabhedo 'kārādyāvaddhakāraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:146_4: tatra padakāyāḥ punarmahāmate ye padavīthīgāmino hastyaśvanaramṛgapaśugomahiṣājaiḍakādyāḥ padakāyasaṃjñāṃ labhante /
S04bsu021_u:146_5: nāma ca vyañjanaṃ ca punarmahāmate catvāra arūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.170_0: vyañjane padakāye ca nāmni cāpi viśeṣataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.170_1: bālāḥ sajjanti durmedhā mahāpaṅke yathā gajāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:148_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yuktihetubuddhivaikalyātkutārkikā durvidagdhamatayo 'nāgate 'dhvani pṛṣṭā vidvadbhirekatvānyatvobhayānubhayadṛṣṭilakṣaṇavinirmuktamantadvayavidhiṃ pṛcchadbhirevaṃ vakṣyanti - apraśnamidaṃ nedaṃ yoniśa iti,
S04bsu021_u:148_2: evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskārebhyo lakṣaṇāllakṣaṇaṃ guṇebhyo guṇī bhūtebhyo bhautikaṃ dṛśyāddarśanaṃ pāṃśubhyo 'ṇavo jñānādyoginaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:148_3: evamādyenottarottarakramalakṣaṇavidhinā avyākṛtāni pṛṣṭāḥ sthāpanīyaṃ bhagavatā avyākṛtamiti vakṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:148_4: na tu te mohapuruṣā evaṃ jñāsyanti yathā śrotṝṇāṃ buddhivaikalyāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā utrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na vyākurvanti /
S04bsu021_u:148_5: avyākṛtānyapi ca mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivādavyudāsārthaṃ nopadiśyante tathāgataiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:148_6: tīrthakarā hi mahāmate evaṃvādinaḥ - yaduta sa jīvastaccharīram,
S04bsu021_u:148_7: anyo jīvo 'nyaccharīram, ityevamādye 'vyākṛtavādaḥ / tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate kāraṇavisaṃmūḍhānāmavyākṛtaṃ na tu matpravacane /
S04bsu021_u:148_8: matpravacane tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakavisaṃyukte vikalpo na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:148_9: teṣāṃ kathaṃ sthāpyaṃ bhavet? ye tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakābhiniviṣṭāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrānavadhāritamatayasteṣāṃ sthāpyaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:148_10: caturvidhapadapraśnavyākaraṇena mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu021_u:148_11: sthāpanīyamiti mahāmate kālāntaradeśanaiṣā mayā kṛtā aparipakvendriyāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:149_2: niḥsvabhāvāḥ punarmahāmate sarvabhāvāḥ kena kāraṇenaḥ? yasmānmahāmate svabuddhyā vicāryamāṇānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhāvā nāvadhāryante,
S04bsu021_u:149_4: tatra anāyūhāniryūhāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇena? yasmānmahāmate svasāmānyalakṣaṇamāyūhyamānaṃ nāyuhyate,
S04bsu021_u:149_7: aniruddhāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇena? yaduta bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇāsattvātsarvadharmā nopalabhyante /
S04bsu021_u:149_9: tatra [Vaidya_48] anityāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇenocyante? yaduta lakṣaṇotpattyanityabhāvāt /
S04bsu021_u:149_11: tatra nityāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇena? yaduta lakṣaṇotpannānutpannābhāvādanityatayā nityāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:151_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavān srotaāpannānāṃ srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:151_1: yena srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ srotaāpannānāṃ srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇakuśalā uttarottarasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvopāyalakṣaṇavidhijñāstathā sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
S04bsu021_u:151_2: yathā nairātmyalakṣaṇadvayamāvaraṇadvayaṃ ca prativiśodhya bhūmerbhūmilakṣaṇātikramagatiṃgatāstathāgatācintyagativiṣayagocaraṃ pratilabhya viśvarūpamaṇisadṛśāḥ sarvasattvopajīvyatāmadhigaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu021_u:152_2: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:152_3: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - traya ime mahāmate srotaāpannānāṃ srotaāpattiphalaprabhedāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:152_4: katame trayaḥ? yaduta hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭāḥ tatra mahāmate hīnaḥ saptajanmabhavaparamaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:152_7: eṣāṃ tu mahāmate trayāṇāṃ trīṇi saṃyojanāni mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇyeva bhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:152_8: tatra mahāmate katamāni trīṇi saṃyojanāni? yaduta satkāyadṛṣṭirvicikitsā śīlavrataparāmarśaśca /
S04bsu021_u:152_9: etāni mahāmate trīṇi saṃyojanāni viśeṣottarottareṇa arhatāmarhatphalībhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:152_10: tatra mahāmate satkāyadṛṣṭirdvividhā yaduta sahajā ca parikalpitā ca,
S04bsu021_u:152_13: sa ca tatra na sannāsanna sadasan,
S04bsu021_u:152_14: abhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇatvāt / atha ca bālairvikalpyate vicitrasvabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniveśena mṛgatṛṣṇikeva mṛgaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:152_17: sahajā punarmahāmate srotaāpannasya satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ svaparakāyasamatayā catuḥskandharūpalakṣaṇatvādrūpasyotpattibhūtabhautikatvātparasparahetulakṣaṇatvādbhūtānāṃ [Vaidya_49] rūpasyāsamudaya iti kṛtvā srotaāpannasya sadasatpakṣadṛṣṭidarśanātsatkāyadṛṣṭiḥ prahīṇā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:152_18: ata eva satkāyadṛṣṭiprahīṇasya rāgo na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:153_0: vicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ punarmahāmate yaduta prāptidharmādhigamasudṛṣṭilakṣaṇatvātpūrvaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭidvayavikalpaprahīṇatvācca vicikitsā dharmeṣu na bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:154_0: śīlaṃ punarmahāmate kathaṃ na parāmṛśati srotaāpannaḥ? yaduta duḥkhopapattyāyatanalakṣaṇasaṃdṛṣṭatvānna parāmṛśati /
S04bsu021_u:154_1: parāmṛṣṭiḥ punarmahāmate yaduta śīlavratataponiyamairbālapṛthagjanā bhogasukhābhilāṣiṇo bhavotpattiṃ prārthayante,
S04bsu021_u:154_2: na ca parāmṛśanti / evamanyatra svapratyātmādhigamaviśeṣagāmitāyāṃ pariṇāmayanti /
S04bsu021_u:154_5: na tu mahāmate srotaāpannasya trisaṃyojanaprahīṇasya rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
S04bsu021_u:155_1: tatkatamastasyātra rāgaḥ prahīṇo bhavati? bhagavānāha - viṣayakāmendriyaḥ strīsaṃyogarāgaḥ pratyutpannasukhaḥ āyatyāṃ duḥkhajanmahetukaḥ khaṭacapeṭaliṅgitacumbitapariṣvaktāghrātakaṭākṣekṣitaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:156_0: sakṛdāgāmiphalalakṣaṇaṃ punarmahāmate katamat? yaduta sakṛdrūpalakṣaṇābhāsavikalpaḥ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:156_2: tenocyate sakṛdāgāmīti / tatra anāgāmīti mahāmate kathaṃ bhavati? yaduta atītānāgatapratyutpannasya rūpalakṣaṇabhāvābhāvapravṛtterdṛṣṭidoṣānuśayavikalpasya anāgāmitvādanāgāmirūpaprahīṇatvācca saṃyojanānāmanāgāmītyucyate /
S04bsu021_u:157_1: tatkatamasyāyaṃ bhagavannarhacchabdo nipātyate? kiṃ bhagavan śamaikāyanamārgapratilambhikasya,
S04bsu021_u:157_3: uta nirmitanairmāṇikasya? bhagavānāha - śamaikāyanamārgapratilambhikasya mahāmate śrāvakasya,
S04bsu021_u:157_4: na tvanyeṣām / anye punarmahāmate bodhisattvacaryācaritāvino buddhanirmitanairmāṇikāśca upāyakuśalamūlapraṇidhānapūrvakatvātparṣanmaṇḍaleṣūpapattiṃ darśayanti buddhaparṣanmaṇḍalopaśobhanārtham /
S04bsu021_u:157_6: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yadi [Vaidya_50] srotaāpannasyaitadabhaviṣyat - imāni saṃyojanāni,
S04bsu021_u:157_7: ahamebhirna saṃyukta iti, taddvitvaprasaṅga ātmadṛṣṭipatitaḥ syādaprahīṇasaṃyojanaśca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.176_0: dhyātā dhyānaṃ ca dhyeyaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ satyadarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:160_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate dviprakārā buddhiḥ pravicayabuddhiśca vikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśapratiṣṭhāpikā ca /
S04bsu021_u:160_1: tatra mahāmate pravicayabuddhirnāma yaduta yayā buddhyā bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ pravicīyamānaṃ catuṣkoṭikārahitaṃ nopalabhyate,
S04bsu021_u:160_2: sā pravicayabuddhiḥ / tatra mahāmate catuṣkoṭikā yaduta ekatvānyatvobhayanobhayāstināstinityānityarahitāṃ catuṣkoṭikāmiti vadāmi /
S04bsu021_u:160_3: etayā catuṣkoṭikayā mahāmate rahitāḥ sarvadharmā ityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:160_5: tatra mahāmate vikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśapratiṣṭhāpikā buddhiḥ katamā? yaduta yena mahāmate cittavikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśena uṣṇadravacalakaṭhinānabhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇān mahābhūtān pratijñāhetulakṣaṇadṛṣṭāntābhiniveśādasadbhūtasamāropeṇa samāropayati,
S04bsu021_u:160_7: etanmahāmate buddhidvayasya lakṣaṇaṃ yena buddhidvayalakṣaṇena samanvāgatā bodhisattvā dharmapudgalanairātmyalakṣaṇagatiṃgatā nirābhāsabuddhipravicayacaryābhūmikuśalāḥ prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhante,
S04bsu021_u:160_11: kṣetraśataṃ cāvabhāsayanti / kṣetraśataṃ cāvabhāsya uttarottarabhūmilakṣaṇavidhijñāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanto dharmameghābhiṣekābhiṣiktāstathāgatapratyātmabhūmimadhigamya daśaniṣṭhāpadasunibaddhadharmāṇaḥ sattvaparipākāya vicitrairnirmāṇakiraṇairvirājante pratyātmagatisukhasamāhitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:161_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahābhūtabhautikakuśalena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:161_1: kathaṃ ca mahāmate bodhisattvo mahābhūtabhautikakuśalo bhavati? tatra mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaḥ pratisaṃśikṣate tatsatyaṃ yatra mahābhūtānāmasaṃbhavo 'saṃbhūtāni cemāni mahāmate bhūtānīti prativipaśyati /
S04bsu021_u:161_2: evaṃ prativipaśyan nāma vikalpamātraṃ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādbāhyabhāvābhāvānnāma cittadṛśyavikalpamātramidaṃ yaduta traidhātukaṃ mahābhūtabhautikarahitaṃ prativipaśyati cātuṣkoṭikanayaviśuddhimātmātmīyarahitaṃ yathābhūtasvalakṣaṇāvasthānāvasthitamanutpādasvalakṣaṇasiddham /
S04bsu021_u:161_3: [Vaidya_51] tatra mahāmate mahābhūteṣu kathaṃ bhautikaṃ bhavati? yaduta snehavikalpamahābhūtaṃ mahāmate abdhātuṃ niṣpādayatyadhyātmabāhyam /
S04bsu021_u:161_10: na tu mahābhūtānām / tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta bhāvaliṅgalakṣaṇagrahaṇasaṃsthānakriyāyogavatāṃ mahāmate kriyāsaṃyogotpattirbhavati nāliṅgavatām /
S04bsu021_u:161_11: tasmādetanmahāmate mahābhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaṃ tīrthakarairvikalpyate na tu mayā /
S04bsu021_u:162_3: tatra mahāmate catvāraḥ skandhā arūpiṇo vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:162_6: na ca mahāmate arūpiṇāṃ catuṣkasaṃkhyā bhavatyākāśavat /
S04bsu021_u:162_9: evameva mahāmate skandhāḥ saṃkhyālakṣaṇagaṇanātītā bhāvābhāvavivarjitāścātuṣkoṭikarahitāḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanānirdeśena nirdiśyante bālairna tvāryaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:163_5: sarvabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu tīrthyadṛṣṭinivāraṇāya viviktadharmopadeśena mahāmate kriyamāṇena dharmanairātmyadarśanaṃ viśudhyate,
S04bsu021_u:163_11: evameva mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvopajīvyo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:164_1: katamaccaturvidham? yaduta bhāvasvabhāvābhāvanirvāṇaṃ lakṣaṇavicitrabhāvābhāvanirvāṇaṃ svalakṣaṇabhāvābhāvāvabodhanirvāṇaṃ skandhānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇasaṃtatiprabandhavyucchedanirvāṇam /
S04bsu021_u:164_2: etanmahāmate caturvidhaṃ tīrthakarāṇāṃ nirvāṇaṃ na tu matpravacane /
S04bsu021_u:165_0: mahāmatirāha - nanu bhagavatā aṣṭau vijñānāni vyavasthāpitāni? bhagavānāha - vyavasthāpitāni mahāmate /
S04bsu021_u:165_2: tatkathaṃ manovijñānasyaiva [Vaidya_52] vyāvṛttirbhavati na tu saptānāṃ vijñānānām? bhagavānāha - taddhetvālambanatvānmahāmate saptānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pravṛttirbhavati /
S04bsu021_u:165_3: manovijñānaṃ punarmahāmate viṣayaparicchedābhiniveśena pravartamānaṃ vāsanābhirālayavijñānaṃ prapuṣṇāti /
S04bsu021_u:165_6: udadhitaraṃgā iva mahāmate svacittadṛśyaviṣayapavaneritāḥ pravartante nivartante ca /
S04bsu021_u:165_7: atastena mahāmate manovijñānena vyāvṛttena saptānāṃ vijñānānāṃ vyāvṛttirbhavati /

S04bsu021_u:167_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate parikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇamupadekṣyāmo yena parikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇena suprativibhāgaviddhena tvaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vikalpakalparahitāḥ pratyātmāryasvagatitīrthyanayagatisudṛṣṭabuddhayo grāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahīṇāḥ paratantravividhavicitralakṣaṇaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvākāraṃ na prativikalpayiṣyanti /
