S04bsu021_u:167_1: tatra mahāmate katamatparikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇam? yaduta abhilāpavikalpo 'vidheyavikalpo lakṣaṇavikalpo 'rthavikalpaḥ svabhāvavikalpo hetuvikalpo dṛṣṭivikalpo yuktivikalpa utpādavikalpo 'nutpādavikalpaḥ saṃbandhavikalpo bandhābandhavikalpaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:168_0: tatra mahāmate abhilāpavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta vicitrasvaragītamādhuryābhiniveśaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:168_2: tatra mahāmate abhidheyavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta asti tatkiṃcidabhidheyavastu svabhāvakamāryajñānagatigamyaṃ yadāśrityābhilāpaḥ pravartate iti vikalpayati /
S04bsu021_u:168_3: tatra lakṣaṇavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta tasminnevābhidheye mṛgatṛṣṇākhye lakṣaṇavaicitryābhiniveśenābhiniveśate yaduta uṣṇadravacalakaṭhinalakṣaṇātsarvabhāvān vikalpayati /
S04bsu021_u:168_5: tatra svabhāvavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta bhāvasvabhāvāvadhāraṇamidamevamidaṃ nānyatheti tīrthyavikalpadṛṣṭyā vikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:168_6: tatra hetuvikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta yadyena hetupratyayena sadasatorvibhajyate hetulakṣaṇotpattitaḥ sa hetuvikalpaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:168_9: tatra utpādavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta pratyayaiḥ sadasatorbhāvasyotpādābhiniveśaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:168_10: tatra anutpādavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta anutpannapūrvāḥ sarvabhāvā abhūtvā pratyayairbhavantyahetuśarīrāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:168_11: tatra saṃbandhavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta saha saṃbadhyate suvarṇatantuvat /
S04bsu021_u:168_13: yathā puruṣaḥ pāśasaṃyogādrajjugranthiḥ kriyate mucyate ca /
S04bsu021_u:168_19: yadyanyā syāt, vaicitryaṃ māyāhetukaṃ na syāt /
S04bsu021_u:168_21: sa ca dṛṣṭo vibhāgaḥ / tasmānnānyā nānanyā / ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairmāyā nāstyastitvena nābhiniveṣṭavyā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.180_1: nirābhāse viśeṣe ca prajñā vai saṃpravartate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.181_1: kalpitaṃ gṛhyate bhrāntyā paratantraṃ na kalpyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.182_1: nimittaṃ hi tathā citraṃ kalpyamānaṃ na sidhyati //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.186_0: yathā hi yogināṃ vastu citramekaṃ virājate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.186_1: na hyasti citratā tatra tathā kalpitalakṣaṇam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.187_1: timiraṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ paratantraṃ tathābudhaiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.188_0: haimaṃ syāttu yathā śuddhaṃ jalaṃ kaluṣavarjitam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.189_0: nāsti vai kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraśca vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.194_0: pañca dharmā bhavettattvaṃ svabhāvā hi trayastathā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.196_0: buddhyā vivecyamānaṃ tu na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.196_1: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhyā vikalpyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.197_1: bhāvābhāvavinirmukto dvau svabhāvau kathaṃ nu tau //
S04bsu021_u:170_0: punarapi mahāmatirāha - deśayatu me bhagavān pratyātmāryajñānagatilakṣaṇamekayānaṃ ca,
S04bsu021_u:170_1: yena bhagavan pratyātmaikayānagatilakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pratyātmāryajñānaikayānakuśalā aparapraṇeyā bhaviṣyanti buddhadharmeṣu /
S04bsu021_u:171_2: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:171_3: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - pramāṇāptopadeśavikalpābhāvānmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva ekākī rahogataḥ svapratyātmabuddhyā vicārayatyaparapraṇeyo dṛṣṭivikalpavivarjita uttarottaratathāgatabhūmipraveśanatayā vyāyamate /
S04bsu021_u:171_5: tatra ekayānagatilakṣaṇaṃ katamat? [Vaidya_55] yaduta ekayānamārgādhigamāvabodhādekayānamiti vadāmi /
S04bsu021_u:171_6: ekayānamārgādhigamāvabodhaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta grāhyagrāhakavikalpayathābhūtāvasthānādapravṛttervikalpasya ekayānāvabodhaḥ kṛto bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:172_1: ekayānaṃ nopadiśyate? bhagavānāha - svayamaparinirvāṇadharmatvānmahāmate sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmekayānaṃ na vadāmi /
S04bsu021_u:173_2: yadā teṣāṃ mahāmate sarvadoṣavāsanāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti dharmanairātmyāvabodhāt,
S04bsu021_u:173_4: punarapi lokottarānāsravadhātuparyāpannān saṃbhārān paripūrya acintyadharmakāyavaśavartitāṃ pratilapsyante /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.202_0: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.202_1: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāninaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.205_1: tathā hi śrāvako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.207_0: niṣṭhāgatirna tasyāsti na ca bhūyo nivartate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_2.208_1: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam //
S04bsu021_u:175_0: iti laṅkāvatāre ṣaṭtriṃśatsāhasrasarvadharmasamuccayo nāma dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:180_0: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - manomayakāyagatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇaṃ mahāmate upadekṣyāmi /
S04bsu021_u:180_1: tacchṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu021_u:180_2: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:180_6: tatra katamo mahāmate samādhisukhasamāpattimanomayaḥ kāyaḥ? yaduta tricaturthapañcamyāṃ bhūmau svacittavividhavivekavihāreṇacittodadhipravṛttitaraṃgavijñānalakṣaṇasukhasamāpattimanaso 'pravṛttiḥ svacittadṛśyaviṣayābhāvābhāvaparijñānānmanaso manomayaḥ kāya ityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:180_7: tatra dharmasvabhāvāvabodhamanomayaḥ kāyaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau māyādidharmanirābhāsapravicayāvabodhena cittāśrayaparāvṛttasya māyopamasamādhipratilambhādanyeṣāṃ ca samādhimukhānāṃ pratilambhādanekalakṣaṇavaśitābhijñākusumitaṃ manojavasadṛśaṃ māyāsvapnabimbaprakhyamabhautikaṃ bhūtabhautikasadṛśaṃ sarvarūpaviciatrāṅgasamuditaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣanmaṇḍalānugataṃ kāyaṃ dharmasvabhāvagatiṃgatatvānmanomaya ityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:180_8: tatra nikāyasahajasaṃskārakriyāmanomayaḥ kāyaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta sarvabuddhadharmapratyātmādhigamasukhalakṣaṇāvabodhānnikāyasahajasaṃskārakriyāmanomaya ityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:180_9: atra te mahāmate kāyatrayalakṣaṇapravicayāvabodhe yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.1_0: na me yānaṃ mahāyānaṃ na ghoṣo na ca akṣarāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.1_1: na satyā na vimokṣā vai na nirābhāsagocaram //
S04bsu021_u:182_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - pañcānantaryāṇi bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni /
S04bsu021_u:182_1: katamāni tāni bhagavan pañcānantaryāṇi yānyadhyāpadya kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā avīciko bhavati? bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu,
S04bsu021_u:182_3: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:182_4: bhagavānetadavocat - tatra mahāmate pañcānantaryāṇi katamāni? yaduta mātṛpitrarhadvadhasaṃghabhedāstathāgatakāye duṣṭacittarudhirotpādaśca /
S04bsu021_u:183_0: tatra mahāmate mātā katamā sattvānām? yaduta tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā mātṛtvenottiṣṭhate /
S04bsu021_u:183_4: tatra saṃdhabhedaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta bhinnānyonyalakṣaṇasya skandhasaṃghātasyātyantamūlopaghātātsaṃghabheda ityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:183_6: etāni mahāmate ādhyātmikāni pañcānantaryāṇi yānyadhyāpadya kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ānantaryakārī bhavatyabhisamitadharmaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:184_1: yairupadiṣṭaistvaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā anāgate 'dhvani saṃmohaṃ na gamiṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:184_2: tatra katamāni tāni? yaduta yāni deśanāpāṭhe 'nusaṃvarṇitānyānantaryāṇi,
S04bsu021_u:184_3: yānyadhyāpadya tisṝṇāṃ vimuktīnāmanyatarānyatarasyāṃ nābhisametā bhavanti anyatra nirmitādhiṣṭhānābhisamayāt /
S04bsu021_u:184_4: nirmitādhiṣṭhānaśrāvako hi mahāmate bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānena vā tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena vā /
S04bsu021_u:184_5: yasya kasyacidanyasyānantaryakāriṇaḥ kaukṛtyaṃ tasya kaukṛtyadṛṣṭivinivartanārthaṃ nikṣiptadhurasya kaukṛtyadṛṣṭyabhāvārtham /
S04bsu021_u:184_6: punarapi protsāhanāṃ kariṣyata iti kṛtvā nirmitādhiṣṭhānābhisamayaḥ pradarśyate mayā /
S04bsu021_u:184_7: nāstyekāntena mahāmate ānantaryakāriṇo 'bhisamayaḥ anyatra svacittadṛśyabhāvanāmātratāvabodhāddehabhogapratiṣṭhāgativikalpātmātmīyagrāhaviviktadarśanātkadā - citkarhicitkalyāṇamitramāsādya anyagatisaṃdhau svavikalpadoṣairvimucyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.3_0: tṛṣṇā hi mātā ityuktā avidyā ca pitā tathā /
S04bsu021_u:186_0: punarapi mahāmatirāha - deśayatu me bhagavān buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kathaṃ bhagavan buddhānāṃ buddhatā bhavati? bhagavānāha - dharmapudgalanairātmyāvabodhānmahāmate āvaraṇadvayaparijñānāvabodhācca cyutidvayādhigamātkleśadvayaprahāṇācca mahāmate buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhatā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:188_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ saṃdhāya bhagavatā parṣanmadhyagatena vāgbhāṣitā - ahameva sarvabuddhā ye 'tītā jātakopapattivaicitryaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:188_1: ahameva ca tena kālena tena samayena rājā māṃdhātā /
S04bsu021_u:188_3: [Vaidya_58] ityevamādyāni bhagavatā jātakaśatasahasrāṇyupadiṣṭāni? bhagavānāha - caturvidhāṃ samatāṃ saṃghāya mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parṣanmadhyagatā vācaṃ niścārayanti yaduta ahameva tena kālena tena samayena krakucchandaḥ kanakamuniḥ kāśyapaścābhavam /
S04bsu021_u:188_4: katamāṃ caturvidhasamatāṃ saṃdhāya? yaduta akṣarasamatāṃ vāksamatāṃ dharmasamatāṃ kāyasamatāṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:188_5: imāṃ mahāmate caturvidhāṃ samatāṃ saṃghāya tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parṣanmadhyagatā vācaṃ niścārayanti /
S04bsu021_u:188_6: tatra mahāmate katamā akṣarasamatā? yaduta yairakṣarairmama nāma buddha iti,
S04bsu021_u:188_7: tairevākṣaraisteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tānyakṣarāṇi mahāmate nirviśiṣṭānyakṣarāṇyakṣarasvabhāvatvena /
S04bsu021_u:188_8: iyaṃ mahāmate akṣarasamatā / tatra mahāmate katamā vāksamatā tathāgatānāmarhatā samyaksaṃbuddhānām? yaduta mamāpi catuṣṣaṣṭyākāro brahmasvararutaghoṣavāgvikalpaḥ pravartate,
S04bsu021_u:188_9: teṣāmapi mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevameva catuṣṣaṣṭyākāro brahmasvararutaghoṣo vāgvikalpaḥ pravartate 'nūnānadhikā nirviśiṣṭāḥ kalaviṅkabrahmasvararutaghoṣasvabhāvena /
S04bsu021_u:188_10: tatra katamā kāyasamatā? yaduta ahaṃ ca te ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmakāyena ca rūpalakṣaṇānuvyañjanakāyena ca samā nirviśiṣṭā anyatra vaineyavaśamupādāya /
S04bsu021_u:188_12: tatra dharmasamatā mahāmate katamā? yaduta te ca ahaṃ ca saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmadhigantāraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:188_13: imāṃ mahāmate caturvidhāṃ samatāṃ saṃdhāya tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parṣanmadhyagatā vācaṃ niścārayanti /
S04bsu021_u:190_0: punarapi mahāmatirāha - yadidamuktaṃ bhagavatā - yāṃ ca rātriṃ tathāgato 'bhisaṃbuddho yāṃ ca rātriṃ parinirvāsyati,
S04bsu021_u:190_2: na pravyāhariṣyati, avacanaṃ buddhavacanamiti, tatkimidaṃ saṃdhāyoktaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena avacanaṃ buddhavacanamiti? bhagavānāha - dharmadvayaṃ mahāmate saṃdhāya mayaitaduktam /
S04bsu021_u:190_3: katamaddharmadvayam? yaduta pratyātmadharmatāṃ ca saṃdhāya paurāṇasthitidharmatāṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:190_5: tatra svapratyātmadharmatānusaṃdhiḥ katamaḥ? yattaistathāgatairadhigataṃ tanmayāpyadhigatamanūnamanadhikaṃ svapratyātmagatigocaraṃ vāgvikalparahitamakṣaragatidvayavinirmuktam /
S04bsu021_u:190_6: tatra paurāṇasthitidharmatā katamā? yaduta paurāṇamidaṃ mahāmate dharmatāvanme hiraṇyarajatamuktākaravanmahāmate dharmadhātusthititā - utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā /
S04bsu021_u:190_8: tadyathā mahāmate kaścideva puruṣo 'ṭavyāṃ paryaṭan paurāṇaṃ nagaramanupaśyedavikalapathapraveśam /
S04bsu021_u:190_9: sa taṃ nagaramanupraviśet / tatra praviśya pratiniviśya [Vaidya_59] nagaraṃ nagarakriyāsukhamanubhavet /
S04bsu021_u:190_10: tatkiṃ manyase mahāmate api nu tena puruṣeṇa sa panthā utpādito yena pathā taṃ nagaramanupraviṣṭo nagaravaicitryaṃ ca (anubhūtam)? āha - no bhagavan /
S04bsu021_u:190_11: bhagavānāha - evameva mahāmate yanmayā taiśca tathāgatairadhigatam - sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathatā bhūtatā satyatā /
S04bsu021_u:190_12: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate mayedamuktam - yāṃ ca rātriṃ tathāgato 'bhisaṃbuddho yāṃ ca rātriṃ parinirvāsyati,
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.7_0: yasyāṃ ca rātryāṃ dhigamo yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.8_1: taiśca buddhairmayā caiva na ca kiṃcidviśeṣitam //
S04bsu021_u:192_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavānnāstyastitvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathā ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nāstyastitvavarjitāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran /
S04bsu021_u:192_2: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S04bsu021_u:192_3: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:192_4: bhagavānetadavocat - dvayaniśrito 'yaṃ mahāmate loko yaduta astitvaniśritaśca nāstitvaniśritaśca /
S04bsu021_u:192_6: tatra mahāmate kathamastitvaniśrito lokaḥ? yaduta vidyamānairhetupratyayairloka utpadyate nāvidyamānaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:192_8: sa caivaṃ bruvan mahāmate bhāvānāmastitvahetupratyayānāṃ lokasya ca hetvastivādī bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:192_9: tatra mahāmate kathaṃ nāstitvaniśrito bhavati? yaduta rāgadveṣamohābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā punarapi rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhāvaṃ vikalpayati /
S04bsu021_u:192_12: katamo 'tra mahāmate vaināśiko bhavati? mahāmatirāha - ya eṣa bhagavan abhyupagamya rāgadveṣamohān na punarabhyupaiti /
S04bsu021_u:192_15: yastvamevaṃ prabhāṣitaḥ / kevalaṃ mahāmate na rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhāvādvaināśiko bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:192_21: bandhye sati mahāmate bandho bhavati bandhahetuśca /
S04bsu021_u:192_24: idaṃ ca mahāmate saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā - varaṃ khalu sumerumātrā
S04bsu021_u:192_28: apratijñānādbāhyabhāvānnityadarśanātkṣaṇaparaṃparābhedabhinnāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni saṃtatiprabandhena vinivṛtya vinivartanta iti kalpākṣararahitāni prativikalpayan punarapi vaināśiko bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.10_0: viṣaye grahaṇābhāvānnirodho na ca nāsti ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.11_0: abhūtvā yasya utpādo bhūtvā vāpi vinaśyati /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.11_1: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.12_0: na tīrthakairna buddhaiśca na mayā na ca kenacit /
S04bsu021_u:194_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate - deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:194_1: deśayatu me sugataḥ, deśayatu me tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vadatāṃ variṣṭhaḥ siddhāntanayalakṣaṇam,
S04bsu021_u:194_2: yena siddhāntanayalakṣaṇena suprativibhāgaviddhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ siddhāntanayalakṣaṇagatiṃgatāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,
S04bsu021_u:194_6: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:194_7: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - dvividhaṃ mahāmate siddhāntanayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ yaduta siddhāntanayaśca deśanānayaśca /
S04bsu021_u:194_8: tatra siddhāntanayo mahāmate yaduta pratyātmādhigamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vāgvikalpākṣararahitamanāsravadhātugatiprāpakaṃ pratyātmagatibhūmigatisvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvatarkatīrthyamāravarjitam /
S04bsu021_u:194_11: tatra deśanānayaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta navāṅgaśāsanavicitropadeśo 'nyānanyasadasatpakṣavarjitaḥ upāyakuśalavidhipūrvakaḥ sattveṣu darśanāvatāraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:194_14: atra mahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.15_1: ye paśyanti vibhāgajñā na te tarkavaśaṃ gatāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.16_0: na bhāvo vidyate satyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.16_1: abhāvena tu vai mokṣaṃ kathaṃ necchanti tārkikāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.19_0: rāgo na vidyate dveṣo mohaścāpi na pudgalaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:196_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:196_2: kathaṃ kiṃ kena kasya bhagavan abhūtaparikalpaḥ pravartamānaḥ pravartate? abhūtaparikalpo 'bhūtaparikalpa iti bhagavannucyate /
S04bsu021_u:196_3: katamasyaitadbhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta abhūtaparikalpa iti? kiṃ vā prativikalpayan abhūtaparikalpo bhavati? bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu mahāmate /
S04bsu021_u:196_6: bahujanahitāya tvaṃ mahāmate pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:196_7: tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu021_u:196_8: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:196_10: nṛṇāṃ grāhyagrāhakābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭānāṃ ca mahāmate svacittadṛśyamātrānavadhāritamatīnāṃ ca sadasaddṛṣṭipakṣapatitānāṃ ca mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭiprativikalpavāsanāpratipuṣṭānāṃ bāhyavicitrārthopalambhābhiniveśāccittacaittakalāpo vikalpasaṃśabditaḥ pravartamānaḥ pravartate ātmātmīyābhiniveśāt /
S04bsu021_u:196_11: mahāmatirāhatadyadi bhagavannarthavividhavaicitryābhūtaparikalpābhiniveśānnṛṇāṃ vikalpaḥ pravartamānaḥ pravartate sadasaddṛṣṭipakṣapatitānāṃ grāhyagrāhakatīrthakaradṛṣṭiprativikalpapuṣṭānāṃ bāhyavicitrārthopalambhābhiniveśāccittacaittakalāpo vikalpasaṃśabditaḥ svacittadṛśyamātrānavabodhātsantāsantavicitrabhāvābhiniveśātpravartamānaḥ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:196_12: tadyathaiva bhagavan bāhyārthavicitralakṣaṇaḥ sadasatpakṣapatitalakṣaṇo bhāvābhāvavivikto dṛṣṭilakṣaṇavinivṛttaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:196_15: na punaḥ paramārthalakṣaṇābhiniveśaṃ prativikalpayan pravartate vikalpaḥ? nanu bhagavan viṣamahetuvādastava
S04bsu021_u:196_16: prasajyate ekatra pravartate ekatra neti bruvataḥ,
S04bsu021_u:196_17: sadasatpakṣāśrayābhiniveśaśca abhūtaprativikalpadṛṣṭipravṛttiṃ bruvato vividhamāyāṅgapuruṣavaicitryānniṣpannaikarūpavatprativikalpayan vikalpena lakṣaṇavaicitryabhāvābhāvaṃ ca vikalpasya vinivṛtterlokāyatikadṛṣṭyāśayapatitaśca /
S04bsu021_u:196_18: [Vaidya_62] bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate vikalpaḥ pravartate nivartate vā /
S04bsu021_u:196_19: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta sadasato vikalpasyāpravṛttitvādbāhyadṛśyabhāvābhāvātsvacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhānmahāmate vikalpo na pravartate na nivartate /
S04bsu021_u:196_22: kathaṃ khalu mahāmate bālapṛthagjanāḥ svavikalpacittamātrāvabodhādātmātmīyābhivinivṛttadṛṣṭayaḥ kāryakāraṇapratyayavinivṛttadoṣāḥ svacittamātrāvabodhātparāvṛttacittāśrayāḥ sarvāsu bhūmiṣu kṛtavidyāstathāgatasvapratyātmagatigocaraṃ pañcadharmasvabhāvavastudṛṣṭivikalpavinivṛttiṃ pratilabheran? ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate idamucyate mayā - vikalpo 'bhūtārthavaicitryādabhiniveśātpravartate,
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.21_0: asanna jāyate loko na sanna sadasan kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.23_1: kāryaṃ hi pratyayāḥ sarve na kāryājjāyate bhavaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.24_0: kāryānna jāyate kāryaṃ dvitvaṃ kārye prasajyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.26_1: niṣṭhābhāvaḥ paraṃ brahma etāṃ mātrāṃ vadāmyaham //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.27_1: skandhānāṃ skandhatā tadvatprajñaptyā na tu dravyataḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.33_0: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate bāhyaṃ cittaṃ citraṃ hi dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:198_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - yathārutārthagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anyaiśceti /
S04bsu021_u:198_1: kathaṃ na bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathārutārthagrāhī na bhavati? kiṃ ca rutam? ko 'rthaḥ? bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu,
S04bsu021_u:198_2: sādhu ca suṣṭhu na ca manasi kuru /
S04bsu021_u:198_3: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:198_4: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - tatra rutaṃ mahāmate katamat? yaduta vāgakṣarasaṃyogavikalpo dantahanutālujihvauṣṭhapuṭaviniḥsṛtaparasparajalpo vikalpavāsanāhetuko rutamityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:198_5: tatra arthaḥ punarmahāmate katamaḥ? yaduta śrutacintābhāvanāmayyā prajñayā eko rahogato nirvāṇapuragāmimārgaḥ svabuddhyā vāsanāśrayaparāvṛttipūrvakaḥ svapratyātmagatigocarabhūmisthānāntaraviśeṣārthalakṣaṇagatiṃ pravicārayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'rthakuśalo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:199_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate rūtārthakuśalo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rutamarthādanyannānyaditi samanupaśyati,
S04bsu021_u:199_1: arthaṃ ca rutāt / yadi ca punarmahāmate artho rutādanyaḥ syāt,
S04bsu021_u:199_4: tadyathā mahāmate kaścideva puruṣaḥ pradīpaṃ gṛhītvā dhanamavalokayet - idaṃ me dhanamevaṃvidhamasmin pradeśe iti /
S04bsu021_u:199_5: evameva mahāmate vāgvikalparutapradīpena bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vāgvikalparahitāḥ svapratyātmāryagatimanupraviśanti /
S04bsu021_u:200_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate aniruddhā anutpannāḥ prakṛtiparinirvṛtāstriyānamekayānaṃ ca pañcacittasvabhāvādiṣu yathārutārthābhiniveśaṃ pratītya abhiniveśataḥ samāropāpavādadṛṣṭipatito bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:200_2: tadyathā mahāmate anyathā hi māyāvaicitryaṃ draṣṭavyamanyathā pratikalpyate bālairna tvāryaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.35_0: na hyātmā vidyate skandhaiḥ skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.35_1: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca te vai na santi ca //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.37_1: na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca //
S04bsu021_u:202_1: yena jñānavijñānalakṣaṇena suprativibhāgaviddhena tvaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā jñānavijñānalakṣaṇagatiṃgatāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
S04bsu021_u:202_2: tatra mahāmate triprakāraṃ jñānaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ ca lokottaratamaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:202_4: anutpannapradhvaṃsi jñānam / punaraparaṃ mahāmate nimittānimittapatitaṃ vijñānaṃ nāstyastivaicitryalakṣaṇahetukaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:202_7: apacayalakṣaṇaṃ jñānam / tatra trividhaṃ jñānaṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇāvadhārakaṃ ca utpādavyayāvadhārakaṃ ca anutpādānirodhāvadhārakaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:202_8: tatra laukikaṃ jñānaṃ sadasatpakṣābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sarvatīrthakarabālapṛthagjanānāṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:202_9: tatra lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitāśayābhiniviṣṭānām /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.38_0: cittena cīyate karma jñānena ca vidhīyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.39_1: nirābhāse viśeṣe ca prajñā vai saṃpravartate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.41_0: śānte kṣāntiviśeṣe vai jñānaṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.42_0: prajñā hi trividhā mahyaṃ āryā yena prabhāvitā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.42_1: lakṣaṇaṃ kalpyate yena yaśca bhāvān vṛṇoti ca //
S04bsu021_u:206_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate navavidhā pariṇāmavādināṃ tīrthakarāṇāṃ pariṇāmadṛṣṭirbhavati yaduta saṃsthānapariṇāmo lakṣaṇapariṇāmo hetupariṇāmo yuktipariṇāmo dṛṣṭipariṇāma utpādapariṇāmo bhāvapariṇāmaḥ pratyayābhivyaktipariṇāmaḥ kriyābhivyaktipariṇāmaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:207_2: tadyathā mahāmate suvarṇaṃ kaṭakarucakasvastyādipariṇāmena pariṇāmyamānaṃ vicitrasaṃsthānapariṇataṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:207_4: evameva mahāmate sarvabhāvānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ kaiścittīrthakarairvikalpyate anyaiśca kāraṇataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:207_5: na ca te tathā, na cānyathā parikalpamupādāya /
S04bsu021_u:207_7: tadyathā mahāmate evaṃ dadhikṣīramadyaphalādīnāmekaikasya pariṇāmo vikalpasya pariṇāmo vikalpyate tīrthakaraiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:207_10: nātra mahāmate kaściddharmaḥ pravartate vā nivartate vā,
S04bsu021_u:207_12: tadyathā mahāmate svapne pravṛttinivṛttī upalabhyete vandhyāputramṛtajanmavat /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.44_1: antarābhavasaṃgrāhyo ye kalpenti na te budhāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.45_0: na pratītyasamutpannaṃ lokaṃ kalpenti vai jināḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.45_1: kiṃ tu pratyaya evedaṃ lokaṃ gandharvasaṃnibham //
S04bsu021_u:209_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantaṃ sarvadharmasaṃdhyarthaparimocanārthamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:209_1: deśayatu me tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃdhyasaṃdhilakṣaṇam,
S04bsu021_u:209_2: yena saṃdhyasaṃdhilakṣaṇena suprativibhāgābhividdhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasaṃdhyasaṃdhyupāyakuśalā yathārutārthābhiniveśasaṃdhau na prapateyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:209_3: sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃdhyasaṃdhikauśalena vāgakṣaraprativikalpanaṃ ca vinihatya buddhyā sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣaccāriṇo balavaśitābhijñādhāraṇīmudrāsumudritā vicitrairnirmāṇakiraṇairdaśaniṣṭhāpāde
S04bsu021_u:210_0: sunibaddhabuddhayo 'nābhogacandrasūryamaṇimahābhūtacaryāgatisamāḥ sarvabhūmiṣu svavikalpalakṣaṇavinivṛttadṛṣṭayaḥ svapnamāyādisarvadharmānudarśanādbuddhabhūmyāśrayānupraviṣṭāḥ sarvasattvadhātuṃ yathārhattvadharmadeśanayā [Vaidya_66] ākṛṣya svapnamāyādisarvadharmasadasatpakṣavarjite bhaṅgotpādavikalparahite rutānyathāparyāyavṛttyāśrayatayā pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:210_2: tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu021_u:210_3: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:210_13: ete cānye ca mahāmate bālapṛthagjanānāṃ svavikalpasaṃdhayaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:210_14: yāṃ saṃdhiṃ saṃdhāya bālapṛthagjanāḥ prativikalpayamānāḥ kauśeyakrimaya iva svavikalpadṛṣṭisaṃdhisūtreṇa ātmānaṃ parāṃśca svavikalpadṛṣṭisaṃdhisūtrarocanatayā pariveṣṭayanti bhāvābhāvasaṃdhilakṣaṇābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:210_15: na cātra mahāmate kaścitsaṃdhirna saṃdhilakṣaṇaṃ viviktadarśanātsarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:210_16: vikalpasyāpravṛttatvānmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu viviktadarśī viharati /
S04bsu021_u:211_1: nātra kaścinmahāmate badhyate na ca mucyate,
S04bsu021_u:212_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate trayaḥ saṃdhayo bālānāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ yaduta rāgo dveṣo mohaśca /
S04bsu021_u:212_1: tṛṣṇā ca paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā yāṃ saṃdhāya gatisaṃdhayaḥ prajāyante /
S04bsu021_u:212_2: tatra saṃdhisaṃdhānaṃ sattvānāṃ gatipañcakaṃ saṃdhervyucchedānmahāmate nasaṃdhirnāsaṃdhilakṣaṇaṃ prajñāyate /
S04bsu021_u:214_0: punarapi mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - yena yena vikalpena ye ye bhāvā vikalpyante,
S04bsu021_u:214_1: na hi sa teṣāṃ svabhāvo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:214_2: parikalpita evāsau / tadyadi bhagavan parikalpita [Vaidya_67] evāsau na bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇāvadhāraṇam,
S04bsu021_u:214_3: nanu te bhagavan evaṃ bruvataḥ saṃkleśavyavadānābhāvaḥ prasajyate parikalpitasvabhāvabhāvitatvātsarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:214_6: tathā bhavati / parikalpita evāsau mahāmate, na bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇāvadhāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:214_7: kiṃ tu yathā mahāmate āryairbhāvasvabhāvo 'vadhāryate āryeṇa jñānena āryeṇa darśanena āryeṇa prajñāacakṣuṣā tathā bhāvasvabhāvo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:215_0: mahāmatirāha - tadyadi bhagavan yathā āryairāryeṇa jñānena āryeṇa darśanena āryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā na divyamāṃsacakṣuṣā bhāvasvabhāvo 'vadhāryate tathā bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:215_2: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bālapṛthagjanānāṃ vikalpavyāvṛttirbhaviṣyati āryabhāvavastvanavabodhāt? na ca te bhagavan viparyastāḥ nāviparyastāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:215_6: sa teṣāmapi bhagavan bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ parikalpitasvabhāva eva khyāyate hetvahetuvyapadeśāt /
S04bsu021_u:215_7: yaduta bhāvasvalakṣaṇadṛṣṭipatitatvādanyeṣāṃ gocaro bhavati na yathā teṣām /
S04bsu021_u:215_10: sa ca kathaṃ parikalpena prativikalpyamāno na tathā bhaviṣyati yathā parikalpyate? anyadeva bhagavan prativikalpasya lakṣaṇam,
S04bsu021_u:215_11: anyadeva svabhāvalakṣaṇam / visadṛśahetuke ca bhagavan vikalpasvabhāvalakṣaṇe /
S04bsu021_u:215_12: te ca parasparaṃ parikalpyamāne bālapṛthagjanairna tathā bhaviṣyataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:215_14: yathā prativikalpena vikalpyante tathā na vidyante /
S04bsu021_u:216_0: kimidaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ tvayā nāstyastitvadṛṣṭiṃ vinivārya vastusvabhāvābhiniveśena āryajñānagocaraviṣayābhiniveśānnāstitvadṛṣṭiḥ punarnipātyate,
S04bsu021_u:216_1: viviktadharmopadeśābhāvaśca kriyate āryajñānasvabhāvavastudeśanayā? bhagavānāha - na mayā mahāmate viviktadharmopadeśābhāvaḥ kriyate,
S04bsu021_u:216_3: kiṃ tu utrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mahāmate mayā anādikālabhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭānāmāryajñānavastusvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇadṛṣṭyā viviktadharmopadeśaḥ kriyate /
S04bsu021_u:216_7: bhrānternirnimittadṛṣṭayo vimokṣatrayādhigatayāthātathyamudrāsumudritā bhāvasvabhāveṣu pratyātmādhigatayā buddhyā pratyakṣavihāriṇo bhaviṣyanti nāstyastitvavastudṛṣṭivivarjitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:217_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratijñā na karaṇīyā /
S04bsu021_u:217_2: anutpannān [Vaidya_68] sarvadharmān pratijñāya pratibruvan mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratijñāyā hīyate /
S04bsu021_u:217_6: anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti sa vādaḥ prahīyate /
S04bsu021_u:217_8: sā hi mahāmate pratijñā sarvabhāvābhyantarā sadasatoranutpattilakṣaṇāt /
S04bsu021_u:217_9: yadi mahāmate tayā pratijñayā anutpannayā anutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti pratijñāṃ kurvanti,
S04bsu021_u:217_12: anutpannasvabhāvalakṣaṇā hi mahāmate teṣāṃ pratijñā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:217_14: bahudoṣaduṣṭatvādavayavānāṃ parasparahetuvilakṣaṇakṛtakatvācca avayavānāṃ pratijñā na karaṇīyā - yaduta anutpannāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:217_15: evaṃ śūnyā asvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratijñā na karaṇīyā /
S04bsu021_u:217_16: kiṃ tu mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māyāsvapnavatsarvabhāvopadeśaḥ karaṇīyo dṛśyādṛśyalakṣaṇatvāt /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.48_0: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna vastu na ca ālayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.49_1: na hi kasyacidutpannā bhāvā vai pratyayānvitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.53_0: nimittaṃ vastu vijñaptiṃ manovispanditaṃ ca tat /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.53_1: atikramya tu putrā me nirvikalpāścaranti te //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.54_0: ajale ca jalagrāho mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.54_1: dṛśyaṃ tathā hi bālānāmāryāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.56_2: kathaṃ hyabhāvo bhāvānāṃ kurute samatāṃ katham //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.57_0: yadā cittaṃ na jānāti bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ calam /
S04bsu021_u:220_0: punarapi mahāmatirāha - yatpunaridamuktaṃ bhagavatā - yadā tvālambyamarthaṃ nopalabhate jñānaṃ tadā vijñaptimātravyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:220_3: tatkiṃ punarbhagavan bhāvānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇānanyavaicitryānavabodhānnopalabhate jñānam? atha svasāmānyalakṣaṇavaicitryabhāvasvabhāvābhibhavānnopalabhate jñānam /
S04bsu021_u:220_11: jñeye sati bhagavan jñānaṃ pravartate nābhāvāt /
S04bsu021_u:220_14: tadyadevaṃ nopalabhate, na tadbhagavan jñānam / ajñānameva tadvidyamānamarthaṃ buddhivaikalyāt /
S04bsu021_u:221_0: bhagavānāha - na hi tanmahāmate evamajñānaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:221_1: jñānameva tanmahāmate, nājñānam / na caitatsaṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā - yadā tvālambyamarthaṃ nopalabhate jñānaṃ tadā vijñaptimātravyavasthānaṃ bhavatīti /
S04bsu021_u:221_5: na ca tārkikā anādikālabhāvābhāvaprapañcavāsitamataya evaṃ prajānanti /
S04bsu021_u:221_6: te cāprajānanto bāhyadravyasaṃsthānalakṣaṇabhāvābhāvaṃ kṛtvā vikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ cittamātratāṃ nirdekṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.58_0: vidyamānaṃ hi ālambyaṃ yadi jñānaṃ na paśyati /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.58_1: ajñānaṃ taddhi na jñānaṃ tārkikāṇāmayaṃ nayaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:223_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā anādikālaprapañcadauṣṭhulyasvaprativikalpanā nāṭake nṛtyantaḥ svasiddhāntanayadeśanāyāmakuśalāḥ svacittadṛśyabāhyabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭā upāyadeśanāpāṭhamabhiniviśante,
S04bsu021_u:223_3: deśayatu me bhagavān deśanāsiddhāntanayalakṣaṇaṃ yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anāgate 'dhvani deśanāsiddhāntanayakuśalā na vipralabhyeran kutārkikaistīrthakaraśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:223_6: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:223_7: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - dviprakāro mahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmanayo yaduta deśanānayaśca siddhāntapratyavasthānanayaśca /
S04bsu021_u:223_10: tatra siddhāntanayaḥ punarmahāmate katamaḥ? yena yoginaḥ svacittadṛśyavikalpavyāvṛttiṃ kurvanti yaduta ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvapakṣāpatanatācittamanomanovijñānātītaṃ svapratyātmāryagatigocaraṃ hetuyuktidṛṣṭilakṣaṇavinivṛttamanālīḍhaṃ sarvakutārkikaistīrthakaraśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikairnāstyastitvāntadvayapatitaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:223_12: etanmahāmate siddhāntanayadeśanālakṣaṇaṃ yatra tvayā ca anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.61_0: nayo hi dvividho mahyaṃ siddhānto deśanā ca vai /
S04bsu021_u:225_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - uktametadbhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ekasmin kāle ekasmin samaye yathā lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāno na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:225_1: yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti /
S04bsu021_u:225_3: yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgrahaḥ? bhagavānāha - vicitramantrapratibhāno mahāmate lokāyatiko vicitrairhetupadavyañjanairbālān vyāmohayati na yuktiyuktaṃ nārthopasaṃhitam /
S04bsu021_u:225_5: etena mahāmate kāraṇena lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāna ityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:225_10: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate lokāyatiko [Vaidya_71] vicitramantrapratibhāno 'parimukta eva jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsādibhyo vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairhetudṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairbālān vyāmohayati /
S04bsu021_u:226_1: tacchiṣyeṇa nāgaveśarūpadhāriṇā svarge indasabhāyāṃ pratijñāṃ kṛtvā tava vā sahasrāro ratho bhajyatāṃ mama vā ekaikanāgabhāvasya phaṇācchedo bhavatviti /
S04bsu021_u:226_2: sahadharmeṇa ca nāgaveśadhāriṇā lokāyatikaśiṣyeṇa devānāmindraṃ vijitya sahasrāraṃ rathaṃ bhaṅktvā punarapīmaṃ lokamāgataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:226_3: evamidaṃ mahāmate lokāyatikavicitrahetudṛṣṭāntopanibaddhaṃ yena tiryañco 'pyadhītya devāsuralokaṃ vicitrapadavyañjanairvyāmohayati /
S04bsu021_u:226_6: na sevitavyo na bhajitavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:226_7: śarīrabuddhiviṣayopalabdhimātraṃ hi mahāmate lokāyatikairdeśyate vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:226_9: kiṃ tu paścime loke paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ bhaviṣyati kutarkahetudṛṣṭipraṇītatvāt /
S04bsu021_u:226_11: evadeva mahāmate lokāyataṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ vicitrahetūpanibaddhaṃ tīrthakarairdeśyate svakāraṇābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:226_12: na svanayaḥ / na ca mahāmate kasyacittīrthakarasya svaśāstranayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:226_14: na svanayaṃ ca na prajānanti mohohāllokāyatamidamiti /
S04bsu021_u:227_0: mahāmatirāha - yadi bhagavan sarvatīrthakarā lokāyatameva vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairdṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśayanti,
S04bsu021_u:227_2: atha kiṃ bhagavānapi lokāyatameva deśayati āgatāgatānāṃ nānādeśasaṃnipatitānāṃ devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:227_3: na svamataṃ sarvatīrthyamatopadeśābhyantaratvāt? bhagavānāha - nāhaṃ mahāmate lokāyataṃ deśayāmi na cāyavyayam /
S04bsu021_u:227_5: tatra āyo nāma mahāmate utpādarāśiḥ samūhāgamādutpadyate /
S04bsu021_u:228_1: atha yenāhaṃ tena lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:228_2: upasaṃkramya akṛtāvakāśa eva māmevamāha - sarvaṃ bho gautama kṛtakam /
S04bsu021_u:228_3: tasyāhaṃ mahāmate evamāha - sarvaṃ bho brāhmaṇa yadi kṛtakam,
S04bsu021_u:228_4: idaṃ prathamaṃ lokāyatam / sarvaṃ bho gautama akṛtakam /
S04bsu021_u:228_6: idaṃ dvitīyaṃ lokāyatam / evaṃ sarvamanityaṃ sarvaṃ nityaṃ sarvamutpādyaṃ sarvamanutpādyam /
S04bsu021_u:228_8: punarapi mahāmate māmevamāha brāhmaṇo lokāyatikaḥ - sarvaṃ bho gautama ekatvaṃ sarvamanyatvaṃ sarvamubhayatvaṃ sarvamanubhayatvaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇādhīnaṃ vicitrahetūipapattidarśanāt /
S04bsu021_u:228_10: punarapi bho gautama sarvamavyākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vyākṛtam,
S04bsu021_u:228_11: astyātmā nāstyātmā, astyayaṃ loko nāstyayaṃ lokaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:228_12: asti paro loko nāsti paro lokaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:228_13: nāstyasti ca paro lokaḥ, asti mokṣo nāsti mokṣaḥ, sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ sarvamakṣaṇikam,
S04bsu021_u:228_16: tasyaitaduktaṃ mahāmate mahā - yadi bho brāhmaṇa evam,
S04bsu021_u:228_22: ahaṃ bhe brāhmaṇa na hetuvādī nāhetuvādī anyatra vikalpameva grāhyagrāhakabhāvena prajñāpya pratītyasamutpādaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu021_u:228_23: na ca tvādṛśā anye vā budhyante ātmagrāhapatitayā saṃtatyā /
S04bsu021_u:229_0: punarapi mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa evamāha - ajñānatṛṣṇākarmahetukamidaṃ bho gautama tribhavam,
S04bsu021_u:230_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇo māmetadavocat - asti bho gautama kiṃcidyanna lokāyatam? madīyameva bho gautama sarvatīrthakaraiḥ prasiddhaṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairhetudṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśyate /
S04bsu021_u:230_1: asti bho brāhmaṇa yanna tvadīyaṃ na ca na prasiddhaṃ deśyate na ca na vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairna ca nārthopasaṃhitameva /
S04bsu021_u:230_2: kiṃ tadalokāyataṃ yanna prasiddhaṃ deśyate ca? asti ca bho brāhmaṇa alokāyataṃ yatra sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ tava ca buddhirna gāhate bāhyabhāvādasadbhūtavikalpaprapañcābhiniviṣṭānām /
S04bsu021_u:230_3: yaduta vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ sadasataḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādvikalpo na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:230_9: saṃkṣepato brāhmaṇa yatra vijñānasyāgatirgatiścyutirupapattiḥ prārthanābhiniveśābhiṣvaṅgo darśanaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sthānaṃ parāmṛṣṭirvicitralakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ saṃgatiḥ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kāraṇābhiniveśaśca /
S04bsu021_u:230_10: etadbho brāhmaṇa tvadīyaṃ lokāyataṃ na madīyam /
S04bsu021_u:231_1: atha khalu kṛṣṇapakṣiko nāgarājo brāhmaṇarūpeṇāgatya bhagavantametadavocat - tena hi gautama paraloka eva na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu021_u:231_2: tena hi māṇava kutastvamāgataḥ? ihāhaṃ gautama śvetadvīpādāgataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:231_3: sa eva brāhmaṇa paro lokaḥ / atha māṇavo niṣpratibhāno nigṛhīto 'ntarhito 'pṛṣṭvaiva māṃ svanayapratyavasthānakathāṃ cintayan śākyaputro mannayabahirdhā varāko 'pravṛttilakṣaṇahetuvādī svavikalpadṛśyalakṣaṇāvabodhādvikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ varṇayati /
S04bsu021_u:231_4: tvaṃ caitarhi mahāmate māṃ pṛcchasi - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ lokāyatikavicitramantrapratibhānaṃ sevyamānasyāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti /
S04bsu021_u:231_5: mahāmatirāha - atha dharmāmiṣamiti bhagavan kaḥ padārthaḥ? bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu mahāmate /
S04bsu021_u:231_6: padārthadvayaṃ prati mīmāṃsā pravṛttā anāgatāṃ janatāṃ samālokya /
S04bsu021_u:231_7: tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S04bsu021_u:231_8: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:232_0: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - tatra āmiṣaṃ mahāmate katamat? yaduta āmiṣamāmṛśamākarṣaṇaṃ nirmṛṣaṃ parāmṛṣṭiḥ svādo bāhyaviṣayābhiniveśo 'ntadvayapraveśaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:232_1: kudṛṣṭyā punaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsapravṛttistṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā ādiṃ kṛtvā /
S04bsu021_u:232_3: eṣa mahāmate āmiṣasaṃgraho na dharmasaṃgraho yaṃ lokāyatikaṃ sevamāno labhate lokāyatam /
S04bsu021_u:233_0: tatra mahāmate dharmasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta svacittadharmanairātmyadvayāva - bodhāddharmapudgalanairātmyalakṣaṇadarśanādvikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:233_4: prāyeṇa hi mahāmate tīrthakaravādo bālānantadvaye pātayati na tu viduṣām,
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.65_0: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti dvidhā cittaṃ hi dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:235_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇamiti bhagavannucyate /
S04bsu021_u:235_1: kasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yaduta nirvāṇamiti yatsarvatīrthakarairvikalpyate? bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu,
S04bsu021_u:235_3: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / yathā tīrthakarā nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti,
S04bsu021_u:235_4: na ca bhavati teṣāṃ vikalpānurupaṃ nirvāṇam /
S04bsu021_u:235_5: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:235_6: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - tatra kecittāvanmahāmate tīrthakarāḥ skandhadhātvāyatananirodhādviṣayavairāgyānnivaidharmyādarśanāccittacaittakalāpo na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:236_0: anye punardeśāntarasthānagamanaṃ mokṣa iti varṇayanti viṣayavikalpoparamādiṣu pavanavat /
S04bsu021_u:236_3: anye punarvarṇayanti vividhanimittavikalpo duḥkhajanmavāhaka iti svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:237_1: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakarā durvidagdhabuddhayaḥ prakṛtipuruṣāntaradarśanādguṇapariṇāmakartṛtvācca nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:237_2: anye puṇyāpuṇyaparikṣayāt / anye kleśakṣayājjñānena ca / anye īśvarasvatantrakartṛtvadarśanājjagato nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:237_3: anye anyonyapravṛtto 'yaṃ saṃbhavo jagata iti na kāraṇataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:237_4: sa ca kāraṇābhiniveśa eva, na cāvabudhyante mohāt, tadanavabodhānnirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:237_7: anye svabhāvataḥ pravṛttito mayūravaicitryavividharatnākarakaṇṭakataikṣṇyavadbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:237_11: anye punarmahāmate bhavena, anye 'bhavena, anye bhavābhavaparijñayā, anye bhavanirvāṇāviśeṣadarśanena nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:237_12: anye punarmahāmate varṇayanti sarvajñasiṃhanādanādino yathā svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādbāhyabhāvābhāvānabhiniveśāccātuṣkoṭikarahitād yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanātsvacittadṛśyavikalpasyāntadvayāpatanatayā grāhyagrāhakānupalabdheḥ sarvapramāṇāgrahaṇāpravṛttidarśanāttattvasya vyāmohakatvādagrahaṇaṃ tattvasya,
S04bsu021_u:237_14: evamanyānyapi yāni tārkikaiḥ kutīrthyapraṇītāni tānyayuktiyuktāni vidvadbhiḥ parivarjitāni /
S04bsu021_u:237_15: sarve 'pyete mahāmate antadvayapatitayā saṃtatyā nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:237_17: na cātra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā /
S04bsu021_u:237_22: atra tvayā mahāmate śikṣitvā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatīrthakaranirvāṇadṛṣṭirvyāvartanīyā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.70_1: tīrthyā mokṣaṃ vikalpenti na ca mokṣo hi vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.73_0: jalpaprapañcābhiratā hi bālāstattve na kurvanti matiṃ viśālām /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.73_1: jalpo hi traidhātukaduḥkhayonistattvaṃ hi duḥkhasya vināśahetuḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.74_0: yathā hi darpaṇe rūpaṃ dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.77_1: vikalpaṃ dṛśyate citraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate //
S04bsu021_u:239_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svabuddhabuddhatām,
S04bsu021_u:239_1: yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatasvakuśalāḥ svamātmānaṃ parāṃścāvabodhayeyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:239_2: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate tvameva paripṛccha /
S04bsu021_u:239_3: yathā te kṣamate, tathā visarjayiṣyāmi / mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'kṛtakaḥ kṛtakaḥ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇamabhidhānamabhidheyaṃ buddhirboddhavyaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:240_0: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha evamādyaiḥ padaniruktairakṛtako na kṛtakaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:240_2: yadi hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ kṛtakaḥ syāt,
S04bsu021_u:240_3: anityatvaṃ syāt / anityatvātsarvaṃ hi kāryaṃ tathāgataḥ syāt /
S04bsu021_u:240_4: aniṣṭaṃ caitanmama ca anyeṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām /
S04bsu021_u:240_7: yacca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tanna sannāsat /
S04bsu021_u:240_8: yacca na sannāsat, taccātuṣkoṭikabāhyam / cātuṣkoṭikaṃ ca mahāmate lokavyavahāraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:240_10: vandhyāputro hi mahāmate vāgmātraṃ na cātuṣkoṭikapatitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:240_16: svātmanā sarvadharmā vidyante na parātmanā gośvavat /
S04bsu021_u:240_17: tadyathā mahāmate na gobhāvo 'śvātmako na cāśvabhāvo gavātmakaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:240_18: na sannāsat, na ca tau svalakṣaṇato na, vidyete eva tau svalakṣaṇataḥ,
S04bsu021_u:240_19: evameva mahāmate sarvadharmā na ca svalakṣaṇena na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu021_u:240_20: vidyanta eva / tena ca bālapṛthagjanairnirātmārthatā avabudhyate vikalpamupādāya,
S04bsu021_u:240_21: na tvavikalpam / evaṃ śūnyānutpādāsvābhāvyaṃ sarvadharmaṇāṃ pratyavagantavyam /
S04bsu021_u:240_25: athānyaḥ syāt, dvaye satyanyathā bhavati goviṣāṇavat /
S04bsu021_u:241_11: ato nānyo nānanyaḥ / evaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyānnānyannānanyat /
S04bsu021_u:241_12: yaddhi mahāmate na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na buddhirna boddhavyaṃ na lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ na skandhā na skandhebhyo 'nyat nābhidheyaṃ nābhidhānaṃ naikatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvasaṃbaddham,
S04bsu021_u:241_17: ākāśaṃ ca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:241_18: yacca na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tannirālambyam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.80_0: skandhān pratītya saṃbuddho na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacitkvacit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.80_1: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkenacitkathaṃ tasya vibhāvanā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.81_0: na kṛtako nākṛtako na kāryaṃ nāpi kāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.81_1: na ca skandhā na cāskandhā na cāpyanyatra saṃkarāt //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.82_0: na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.82_1: na taṃ nāstyeva gantavyaṃ dharmāṇāmeva dharmatā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.83_1: ato nāsti na gantavyamastitvaṃ na ca kalpayet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.85_1: tadā samyakprapaśyanti na te dūṣenti nāyakān //
S04bsu021_u:243_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:243_1: deśayatu sugataḥ, yaddeśanāpāṭhe bhagavatā anirodhānutpādagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
S04bsu021_u:243_4: uta tathāgatasyaitatparyāyāntaram? yadbhagavānevamāha - aniruddhā anutpannāśca bhagavatā [Vaidya_78] sarvadharmā deśyante sadasatpakṣādarśanāt /
S04bsu021_u:243_5: yadyanutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti bhagavan dharmagrahaṇaṃ na prāpnoti,
S04bsu021_u:243_7: taducyatāṃ bhagavan / bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu,
S04bsu021_u:243_9: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:243_10: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - na hi mahāmate abhāvastathāgato na ca sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhānutpādagrahaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:243_11: na pratyayo 'pekṣitavyo na ca nirarthakamanutpādagrahaṇaṃ kriyate mayā /
S04bsu021_u:243_12: kiṃ tu mahāmate manomayadharmakāyasya tathāgatasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yatra sarvatīrthakaraśrāvakapratyekabuddhasaptabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāmaviṣayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:243_15: hasyaḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ, tanurdehaṃ śarīram, pṛthivī bhūmirvasuṃdharā, khamākāśaṃ gaganam / ityevamādyānāṃ bhāvānāmekaikasya bhāvasya bahavaḥ paryāyavācakāḥ śabdā bhavanti vikalpitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:243_17: na ca svabhāvo na bhavati / evaṃ mahāmate ahamapi sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairbālānāṃ śravaṇāvabhāsamāgacchāmi /
S04bsu021_u:243_18: taiścābhilapanti mām, na ca prajānanti tathāgatasyaite nāmaparyāyā iti /
S04bsu021_u:243_20: kecitsvayaṃbhuvamiti / nāyakaṃ vināyakaṃ pariṇāyakaṃ buddhamṛṣiṃ vṛṣabhaṃ brahmāṇaṃ viṣṇumīśvaraṃ pradhānaṃ kapilaṃ bhūtāntamariṣṭaneminaṃ somaṃ bhāskaraṃ rāmaṃ vyāsaṃ śukamindraṃ baliṃ varuṇamiti caike saṃjānanti /
S04bsu021_u:243_21: śūnyatāṃ tathatāṃ satyatāṃ bhūtatāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ dharmadhātuṃ nirvāṇaṃ nityaṃ samatāmadvayamanirodhamanimittaṃ pratyayaṃ buddhahetūpadeśaṃ vimokṣaṃ mārgasatyāni sarvajñaṃ jinaṃ manomayamiti caike saṃjānanti /
S04bsu021_u:243_22: evamādibhirmahāmate paripūrṇaṃ tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairanūnairanadhikairihānyeṣu ca lokadhātuṣu māṃ janāḥ saṃjānante udakacandra ivāpraviṣṭanirgatam /
S04bsu021_u:243_23: na ca bālā avabudhyante dvayāntapatitayā saṃtatyā /
S04bsu021_u:243_24: atha ca satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti ca māṃ padārthaniruktyakuśalā abhinnasaṃjñāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:243_26: anirodhānutpādamabhāvaṃ kalpayiṣyanti na ca tathāgatanāmapadaparyāyāntaramindraśakrapuraṃdaraṃ na svanayapratyavasthānapāṭhamadhimokṣanti,
S04bsu021_u:243_28: evaṃ ca mahāmate vakṣyanti te mohapuruṣāḥ - yathāruta evārthaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:243_29: ananyo 'rtho rutāditi / tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta arthasyāśarīratvādrutādanyo 'rtho na bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:243_31: na tvevaṃ jñāsyanti mahāmate yathā rutamutpannapradhvaṃsi,
S04bsu021_u:243_34: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā akṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu021_u:243_36: anyatra akṣarapatitāśayaḥ punarmahāmate yo 'kṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu021_u:243_37: sa ca pralapati, nirakṣaratvāddharmasya / ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate uktaṃ deśanāpāṭhe mayā anyaiśca buddhabodhisattvaiḥ yathaikamapyakṣaraṃ tathāgatā nodāharanti na pratyāharantīti /
S04bsu021_u:243_43: tadabhāvātkiṃ kasya deśyeta? ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena deśanāpāṭharutānabhiniviṣṭena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:243_44: deśanāpāṭhaḥ / sattvāśayapravṛttatvānnānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanā kriyate cittamanomanovijñānavyāvṛttyarthaṃ mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:243_46: arthapratiśaraṇena mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśaraṇena /
S04bsu021_u:243_47: vyañjanānusārī mahāmate kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svātmānaṃ ca nāśayati,
S04bsu021_u:243_48: parārthāṃśca nāvabodhayati / kudṛṣṭipatitayā saṃtatyā svapakṣaṃ vibhrāmyate kutīrthakaiḥ sarvadharmabhūmisvalakṣaṇākuśalaiḥ padaniruktyanabhijñaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:244_3: mahāyāne ca mahāmate samyakparigṛhyamāṇe buddhaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ parigrahaḥ kṛto bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:244_8: atasteṣu viśiṣṭāyatanapratilambheṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā upapattiṃ parigṛhya mahāyāne pratiṣṭhāpanatayā daśavaśitāvicitrarūpaveśadhāriṇo bhūtvā sattvaviśeṣānuśayalakṣaṇagatibhūtāstathātvāya dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu021_u:245_2: tena na mahāmate kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā yathārutārthābhiniveśakuśalena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:245_6: evameva mahāmate bālajātīyā iva bālapṛthagjanavargā yathārutāṅgulyagrābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā eva kālaṃ kariṣyanti,
S04bsu021_u:245_8: tadyathā mahāmate annaṃ bhojyaṃ bālānāṃ ca kaścidanabhisaṃskṛtaṃ paribhoktum /
S04bsu021_u:245_14: ata etena kāraṇena mahāmate arthābhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:245_18: bāhuśrutyaṃ ca nāma mahāmate yaduta arthakauśalyaṃ na rutakauśalyam /
S04bsu021_u:245_20: yathā svayaṃ ca na patati parāṃśca na pātayati /
S04bsu021_u:246_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirbuddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhita evamāha - na bhagavatā anirodhānutpādadarśanena kiṃcidviśiṣyate /
S04bsu021_u:246_3: tīrthakarā api bhagavan kāraṇapratyayahetukīṃ jagata utpattiṃ varṇayanti /
S04bsu021_u:246_12: na nirudhyate / yāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gatvā bhūto bhūtasvabhāvaṃ na vijahāti /
S04bsu021_u:246_15: viśeṣo vātra vaktavyo yena tathāgatavādo viśeṣyate,
S04bsu021_u:246_16: na sarvatīrthakaravādaḥ / aviśiṣyamāṇe bhagavan svavāde tīrthakarāṇāmapi buddhaprasaṅgaḥ syādanirodhānutpādahetutvāt /
S04bsu021_u:246_17: asthānamanavakāśaṃ coktaṃ bhagavatā yadekatra lokadhātau bahavastathāgatā utpadyeranniti /
S04bsu021_u:247_0: bhagavānāha - na mama mahāmate anirodhānutpādastīrthakarānutpādānirodhavādena tulyo nāpyutpādānityavādena /
S04bsu021_u:247_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvo vidyata evānutpannāvikaralakṣaṇaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:247_3: mama tu mahāmate sadasatpakṣavigata utpādabhaṅgavirahito na bhāvo nābhāavaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:247_9: na tvāryāḥ / abhūtārthavikalpārthavibhram eṣa mahāmate gandharvanagaramāyāpuruṣavat /
S04bsu021_u:247_10: tadyathā mahāmate kaścidgandharvanagare bālajātīyo māyāpuruṣasattvasārthavaicitryaṃ praviaśantaṃ vā nirgacchantaṃ vā kalpayet - amī praviṣṭā amī nirgatāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:247_11: na ca tatra kaścitpraviṣṭo vā nirgato vā /
S04bsu021_u:247_15: na ca māyāpuruṣa utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā bhāvābhāvākiṃcitkaratvāt /
S04bsu021_u:247_17: anyatra vitathapatitayā saṃjñayā bālā utpādanirodhaṃ kalpayanti na tvāryāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:247_18: tatra vitathamiti mahāmate na tathā yathā bhāvasvabhāvaḥ kalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:247_19: [Vaidya_81] nāpyanyathā / anyathā kalpyamāne sarvabhāvasvabhāvābhiniveśa eva syāt /
S04bsu021_u:247_21: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate animittadarśanameva śreyo na nimittadarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:247_24: tatra nirvāṇamiti mahāmate yathābhūtārthasthānadarśanaṃ vikalpacittacaittakalāpasya parāvṛttipūrvakam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.87_0: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.91_1: anutpāde prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.92_0: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.92_1: nāhetuko na hetubhyo yadā paśyanti saṃskṛtam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.93_1: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.94_0: na cābhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayavīkṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.94_1: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.100_1: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.101_1: kalāpācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.102_0: bhāvo na vidyate 'nyo 'nyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.106_0: yasya janyo bhavedbhāvaḥ saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.112_0: parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.112_1: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.113_0: yadi janyo na bhāvo 'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.114_1: kalāpo 'yaṃ na dharmo 'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.115_1: na tu śāstrasya bhedo 'sti doṣabhedāttu bhidyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.116_1: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi prāṇinām //
S04bsu021_u:249_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - anityatā anityateti bhagavan sarvatīrthakarairvikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:249_1: tvayā ca sarvadeśanāpāṭhe deśyate - anityā bata saṃskārā utpādavyayadharmiṇa iti /
S04bsu021_u:249_2: tatkimiyaṃ bhagavaṃstathyā mithyeti? katiprakārā bhagavan anityatā? bhagavānāha - aṣṭaprakārā hi mahāmate sarvatīrthakarairanityatā kalpyate,
S04bsu021_u:249_3: na tu mayā / katamāṣṭaprakārā? tatra kecittāvanmahāmate āhuḥ - prārambhavinivṛttiranityateti /
S04bsu021_u:249_7: nairantaryaprabandhena svarasabhaṅgabhedaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣīradadhipariṇāmavikārāntaravadadṛṣṭanaṣṭā sarvabhāveṣu pravartate na nityateti /
S04bsu021_u:249_12: tatra anutpādānityatā nāma yaduta nityamanityaṃ sadasatorapravṛttiḥ sarvadharmāṇāmadarśanaṃ paramāṇupravicayādadarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:249_14: etaddhi mahāmate anutpādānityatāyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasyānavabodhātsarvatīrthakarā utpādānityatāvāde prapatanti /
S04bsu021_u:250_7: na ca kāryakāraṇayorviśeṣo 'sti iyamanityatā idaṃ kāryamiti /
S04bsu021_u:250_11: na ca kāraṇaṃ visadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ janayati /
S04bsu021_u:250_12: atha janayet, teṣāmanityatā sarvabhāvānāṃ visadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ syāt,
S04bsu021_u:250_18: anityatvādayaḥ sarvabhāvā nityāḥ syurnityā eva bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:251_1: tena tryadhvapatitā syāt / tatra yadatītaṃ rūpaṃ tattena saha vinaṣṭam /
S04bsu021_u:251_2: anāgatamapi notpannam / rūpānutpattitayā vartamānenāpi rūpeṇa sahābhinnalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:251_5: sarvatīrthakarāṇāmavināśātsarvabhūtānāṃ sarvaṃ tribhavaṃ bhūtabhautikaṃ yatrotpādasthitivikāraḥ prajñapyate /
S04bsu021_u:251_6: kimanyadanityaṃ bhūtabhautikavinirmuktaṃ yasyānityatā kalpyate tīrthakaraiḥ? bhūtāni ca na pravartante na nivartante svabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniveśāt /
S04bsu021_u:252_0: tatra prārambhavinivṛttirnāma anityatā - na punarbhūtāni bhūtāntaramārabhante parasparavilakṣaṇasvalakṣaṇānna viśeṣaḥ prārabhyate /
S04bsu021_u:253_0: tatra saṃsthānavinivṛttirnāma anityatā - yaduta na bhūtabhautikaṃ vinaśyati ā pralayāt /
S04bsu021_u:253_1: pralayo nāma mahāmate ā paramāṇoḥ pravicayaparīkṣā vināśo bhūtabhautikasya saṃsthānasyānyathābhūtadarśanāddīrghahrasvānulabdhiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:254_0: tatra saṃsthānānityatā nāma - yaduta yasya rūpamevānityaṃ tasya saṃsthānasyānityatā na bhūtānām /
S04bsu021_u:255_0: tatra vikārānityatā nāma - yaduta rūpasyānyathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhūtānāṃ suvarṇasaṃsthānabhūṣaṇavikāradarśanavat /
S04bsu021_u:255_1: na suvarṇaṃ bhāvādvinaśyati kiṃ tu bhūṣaṇasaṃsthānavināśo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:257_0: mama tu mahāmate na nityā nānityā /
S04bsu021_u:257_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta bāhyabhāvānabhyupagamātribhavacittamātropadeśādvicitralakṣaṇānupadeśānna pravartate na nivartate mahābhūtasaṃniveśaviśeṣaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:257_6: trividhaṃ ca mahāmate sarvatīrthakaralauikikalokottaratamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vāgvikalpaviniḥsṛtānām /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.119_0: bhāvānāṃ nāsti vai nāśaṃ bhūtā bhūtātmanā sthitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_3.120_0: kasyacinna hi tīrthyasya vināśo na ca saṃbhavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:264_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavān sarvabodhisattvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanirodhakramānusaṃdhilakṣaṇakauśalyaṃ yena kramānusaṃdhilakṣaṇakauśalyena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nirodhasukhasamāpattimukhena na pratimuhyema,
S04bsu021_u:264_4: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:265_0: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - ṣaṣṭhīṃ mahāmate bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāśca nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /
S04bsu021_u:265_1: saptamyāṃ bhūmau punaścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇavyudāsātsamāpadyante,
S04bsu021_u:265_3: teṣāṃ hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmābhisaṃskārikī grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇapatitā ca nirodhasamāpattiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:265_4: ataste saptamyāṃ bhūmau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpadyante - mā sarvadharmāṇāmaviśeṣalakṣaṇaprāptiḥ syāditi /
S04bsu021_u:265_6: ataḥ saptamyāṃ bhūmau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpattikauśalyaṃ nāsti yena samāpadyeran /
S04bsu021_u:266_0: aṣṭamyāṃ mahāmate bhūmau bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca cittamanomanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāvyāvṛttirbhavati /
S04bsu021_u:266_1: prathamaṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau cittamanomanovijñānamātraṃ traidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati ātmātmīyavigataṃ svacittavikalpodbhavam,
S04bsu021_u:266_3: dvidhā bālānāṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāvena pariṇāmya svajñānaṃ na cāvabodhyante anādikāladauṣṭhulyavikalpaprapañcavāsanāvāsitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:267_5: acintyabuddhamāhātmyaṃ ca deśayanti te buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:268_0: saptasu mahāmate bhūmiṣu cittamanomanovijñānalakṣaṇaparicayakauśalyātmātmīyagrāhyagrāhadharmapudgalanairātmyapravṛttinivṛttisvasāmānya - lakṣaṇaparicayacatuḥpratisaṃvidviniścayakauśalyavaśitāsvādasukhabhūmikramānupraveśabodhipākṣikadharmavibhāgaḥ kriyate mayā - mā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇānavabodhādbhūmikramānusaṃdhyakuśalāstīrthakarakudṛṣṭimārge prapateyuḥ,
S04bsu021_u:268_2: na tu mahāmate atra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā anyatra svacitadṛśyamātramidaṃ yaduta bhūmikramānusaṃdhistraidhātukavicitropacāraśca /
S04bsu021_u:268_3: na ca bālā avabudhyante / anavabodhādbālānāṃ bhūmikramānusaṃdhivyapadeśaṃ traidhātukavicitropacāraśca vyavasthāpyate buddhadharmālayā ca /
S04bsu021_u:269_1: punaraparaṃ mahāmate śrāvakapratyekabuddhā aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau nirodhasamāpattisukhamadamattāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇāvaraṇavāsanāpudgaladharmanairātmyagrāhakadṛṣṭipatitā vikalpanirvāṇamatibuddhayo bhavanti,
S04bsu021_u:269_3: bodhisattvāḥ punarmahāmate nirodhasamādhisukhamukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvapraṇidhānakṛpākaruṇopetā niṣṭhapadagativibhāgajñā na parinirvānti /
S04bsu021_u:270_0: tadyathā punarmahāmate kaścicchayitaḥ svapnāntare mahāvyāyāmautsukyena mahaughādātmānamuttārayet /
S04bsu021_u:270_3: sa evaṃ samanupaśyet - nedaṃ satyaṃ na mithyā anyatra dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātānubhūtavikalpavāsanāvicitrarūpasaṃsthānānādikālavikalpapatitā nāstyastidṛṣṭivikalpaparivarjitā manovijñānānubhūtāḥ svapne dṛśyante /
S04bsu021_u:270_4: evameva mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvā aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau vikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā prathamasaptamībhūmisaṃcārātsarvadharmābhisamayānmāyādidharmasamatayā sarvadharmautsukyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpoparataṃ cittacaitasikavikalpaprasaraṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhadharmeṣu prayujyante /
S04bsu021_u:270_5: anadhigatānāmadhigamāya prayoga eṣa mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ na vināśaḥ cittamanomanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāvigamācca anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:270_6: na cātra mahāmate paramārthe kramo na kramānusaṃdhirnirābhāsavikalpaviviktadharmopadeśāt /
S04bsu021_u:lank_4.2_0: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā tvihāṣṭamī /
S04bsu021_u:lank_4.2_1: dve hi bhūmī vihāro 'tra śeṣā bhūmirmamātmikā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_4.6_0: daśamī tu bhavetprathamā prathamā cāṣṭamī bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:lank_4.6_1: navamī saptamī cāpi saptamī cāṣṭamī bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_4.7_0: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā syāccaturthī pañcamī bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:lank_4.7_1: tṛtīyā ca bhavetṣaṣṭhī nirābhāse kramaḥ kutaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:277_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ bhagavaṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nitya utāho 'nityaḥ? bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tathāgato nityo nānityaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:277_4: nityāni hi mahāmate sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ kāraṇānyakṛtakāni ca /
S04bsu021_u:278_2: tadyathā mahāmate ākāśaṃ na nityaṃ nānityaṃ nityānityavyudāsādekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvanityānityatvadoṣairavacanīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:280_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate astyasau paryāyo yena nityastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:280_2: abhisamayādhigamajñānaṃ hi mahāmate nityaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
S04bsu021_u:280_3: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmaniyāmatā dharmasthititā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthakarābhisamayeṣu /
S04bsu021_u:280_10: dvaye hi sati mahāmate nityatā cānityatā ca bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:280_12: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā na nityā nānityāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:280_15: vikalpabuddhikṣayānmahāmate nityānityagrāho nivāryate bālānāṃ na tu viviktadṛṣṭibuddhikṣayāt /
S04bsu021_u:lank_5.1_1: ye paśyanti sadā buddhān na te dṛṣṭivaśaṃ gatāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:287_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:287_2: asatyātmani kasya pravṛttirvā nirvṛttirvā? bālāśca pravṛttinivṛttyāśritā duḥkhakṣayānavabodhānnirvāṇaṃ na prajānanti /
S04bsu021_u:287_5: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:288_0: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - tathāgatagarbho mahāmate kuśalākuśalahetukaḥ sarvajanmagatikartā pravartate naṭavadgatisaṃkaṭa ātmātmīyavarjitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:288_3: anādikālavividhaprapañcadauṣṭhulyavāsanāvāsitaḥ ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito 'vidyāvāsanabhūmijaiḥ saptabhirvijñānaiḥ saha mahodadhitaraṃgavannityamavyucchinnaśarīraḥ pravartate anityatādoṣarahita ātmavādavinivṛtto 'tyantaprakṛtipariśuddhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:288_6: teṣāṃ copāttānāmindriyākhyānāṃ parikṣayanirodhe samantarānutpatteranyeṣāṃ svamativikalpasukhaduḥkhāpratisaṃvedināṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhasamāpattisamāpannānāṃ caturdhyānasatyavimokṣakuśalānāṃ yogināṃ vimokṣabuddhirbhavatyapravṛtteḥ /
S04bsu021_u:289_0: aparāvṛtte ca tathāgatagarbhaśabdasaṃśabdite ālayavijñāne nāsti saptānāṃ pravṛttivijñānānāṃ nirodhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:289_5: tato 'calāyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito daśasamādhisukhamukhamārgān pratilabhate /
S04bsu021_u:289_6: samādhibuddhaiḥ saṃdhāryamāṇo 'cintyabuddhadharmasvapraṇidhānavyavalokanatayā samādhisukhabhūtakoṭyā vinivārya pratyātmāryagatigamyaiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthakarāsādhāraṇairyogamārgairdaśāryagotramārgaṃ pratilabhate,
S04bsu021_u:289_8: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tathāgatagarbhaḥ ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito viśodhayitavyo viśeṣārthibhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:290_0: yadi hi mahāmate ālayavijñānasaṃśabditastathāgatagarbho 'tra na syāditi asati mahāmate tathāgatagarbhe ālayavijñānasaṃśabdite na pravṛttirna nivṛttiḥ syāt /
S04bsu021_u:290_3: mahāmate ayaṃ tathāgatagarbhālayavijñānagocaraḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyavitarkadarśanānāṃ [Vaidya_91] prakṛtipariśuddho 'pi san aśuddha ivāgantukleśopakliṣṭatayā teṣāmābhāti na tu tathāgatānām /
S04bsu021_u:290_5: etadeva mahāmate mayā śrīmālāṃ devīmadhikṛtya deśanāpāṭhe anyāṃśca sūkṣmanipuṇaviśuddhabuddhīn bodhisattvānadhiṣṭhāya tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabditaḥ saptabhirvijñānaiḥ saha pravṛttyabhiniviṣṭānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmanairātmyapradarśanārthaṃ śrīmālāṃ devīmadhiṣṭhāya tathāgataviṣayo deśito na śrāvakapratyekabuddhānyatīrthakaratarkaviṣayo 'nyatra mahāmate tathāgataviṣaya eva tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānaviṣayastvatsadṛśānāṃ ca sūkṣmanipuṇamatibuddhiprabhedakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmarthapratiśaraṇānāṃ no tu yathārutadeśanāpāṭhābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sarvānyatīrthyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām /
S04bsu021_u:290_6: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatathāgataviṣaye 'smiṃstathāgatagarbhālayavijñānaparijñāne yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_6.3_0: aṅgulyagraṃ yathā bālo na gṛhṇāti niśākaram /
S04bsu021_u:lank_6.4_1: vijñānaṃ pañcabhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛśyaṃ kalpeti raṅgavat //
S04bsu021_u:292_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:292_2: yena nairātmyadvayaprabhedagatilakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvabhūmikramānusaṃdhiṣvetān dharmān vibhāvayema,
S04bsu021_u:292_7: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:292_9: yaduta nāma nimittaṃ vikalpaḥ samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca tathāgatapratyātmāryagatipraveśaḥ śāśvatocchedasadasaddṛṣṭivivarjito dṛṣṭadharmasukhasamāpattisukhavihāra āmukhībhavati yogayoginām /
S04bsu021_u:292_10: tatra mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvavijñānanairātmyadvayasvacittadṛśyabāhyabhāvābhāvānavabodhādvikalpaḥ pravartate bālānāṃ na tvāryāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:293_1: mahāmatirāha - kathaṃ punarbhagavan bālānāṃ vikalpaḥ pravartate,
S04bsu021_u:293_2: na tvāryāṇām? bhagavānāha - nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketābhiniveśena mahāmate bālāścittamanusaranti /
S04bsu021_u:293_6: abhisaṃskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ kośakārakīṭakā iva svavikalpapariveṣṭitamatayo gatisamudrakāntāraprapatitā ghaṭiyantravannātipravartante /
S04bsu021_u:294_2: tatra vikalpaḥ punarmahāmate yena nāma samudīrayati /
S04bsu021_u:294_6: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yena samyagjñānena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nāma bhāvīkaroti,
S04bsu021_u:294_8: evametāṃ tathatāṃ vadāmi / tathatāvyavasthitaśca mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirābhāsagocarapratilābhitvātpramuditāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu021_u:295_0: sa pratilabhya pramuditāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ vyāvṛttaḥ sarvatīrthyāpāyagatibhyo bhavati lokottaradharmagatisamavasṛtaḥ lakṣaṇaparicayānmāyādipūrvakāṃ sarvadharmagatiṃ vibhāvayan svapratyātmāryadharmagatilakṣaṇaṃ tarkadṛṣṭivinivṛttakautuko 'nupūrveṇa yāvaddharmameghā bhūmiriti /
S04bsu021_u:295_4: kāyaṃ manovijñaptirahitam / etanmahāmate tathatāpraveśātpratilabhante bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:296_0: punarapi mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan pañcasu dharmeṣvantargatāstrayaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:296_1: svabhāvā uta svalakṣaṇasiddhāḥ? bhagavānāha - atraiva mahāmate trayaḥ svabhāvā antargatāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:296_2: aṣṭau ca vijñānāni, dve ca nairātmye / tatra nāma ca nimittaṃ ca parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:296_3: yaḥ punarmahāmate tadāśrayapravṛtto vikalpaścittacaittasaṃśabdito yugapatkālodita āditya iva raśmisahito vicitralakṣaṇasvabhāvo vikalpādhārakaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:296_5: samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca mahāmate avināśatvātsvabhāvaḥ pariniṣpanno veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:297_3: eṣu mahāmate pañcasu dharmeṣu sarvabuddhadharmā antargatāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:298_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate pañcadharmāḥ - nimittaṃ nāma vikalpastathatā samyagjñānaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:298_1: tatra mahāmate nimittaṃ yatsaṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣākārarūpādilakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate tannimittam /
S04bsu021_u:298_3: tannāma / yena tannāma samudīrayati nimittābhivyañjakaṃ samadharmeti vā,
S04bsu021_u:298_6: tattvaṃ bhūtaṃ niścato niṣṭhā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvo 'nupalabdhistattathālakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:298_7: mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairanugamya yathāvaddeśitaṃ prajñaptaṃ vivṛtamuttānīkṛtam,
S04bsu021_u:298_10: eteṣveva trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ, aṣṭau ca vijñānāni, dve ca nairātmye, sarvabuddhadharmāścāntargatāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_6.5_0: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvaśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca /
S04bsu021_u:300_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā deśanāpāṭhe yathā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā atītā anāgatā vartamānāśca /
S04bsu021_u:300_4: na ca mahāmate gaṅgānadīvālukāpramāṇatayā tryadhvakabuddhapramāṇatā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:300_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta lokātiśayātikrāntatvānmahāmate dṛṣṭānto 'dṛṣṭāntaḥ sadṛśāsadṛśatvāt /
S04bsu021_u:300_6: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadṛśāsadṛśaṃ lokātiśayātikrāntaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
S04bsu021_u:300_8: taiśca tathāgataiḥ / yathā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti nityānityābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ tīrthakarāśayakudṛṣṭiyuktānāṃ saṃsārabhavacakrānusāriṇāmudvejanārtham - kathamete udvignā bhavagaticakrasaṃkaṭādviśeṣārthino viśeṣamārabheranniti sulabhabuddhatvapradarśanārthaṃ na nodumbarapuṣpatulyastathāgatānāmutpāda [Vaidya_94] iti kṛtvā vīryamārapsyante /
S04bsu021_u:300_9: deśanāpāṭhe tu mayā vaineyajanatāpekṣayā udumbarapuṣpasudurlabhaprādurbhāvāstathāgatā iti deśitam /
S04bsu021_u:300_10: na ca mahāmate udumbarapuṣpaṃ kenaciddṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na drakṣyate /
S04bsu021_u:300_13: svanayapratyavasthānakathāyāṃ mahāmate nirdiśyamānāyāṃ lokātiśayātikrāntā dṛṣṭāntā yuktāḥ kriyante 'śraddheyatvāt /
S04bsu021_u:300_16: tattvaṃ ca tathāgatāḥ / atasteṣu dṛṣṭāntā nopanyasyante /
S04bsu021_u:301_0: kiṃ tu upamāmātrametanmahāmate kṛtaṃ yaduta gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatāḥ samā na viṣamā akalpāvikalpanataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:301_1: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā mīnakacchapaśiśumāranakramahiṣasiṃhahastyādibhiḥ saṃkṣobhyamāṇā na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti - saṃkṣobhyāmahe na veti nirvikalpāḥ svacchā malavyapetāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:301_2: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ svapratyātmāryajñānagaṅgāmahānadībalābhijñāvaśitāvālukāḥ sarvatīrthakarabālamīnaparapravādibhiḥ saṃkṣobhyamāṇā na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:302_0: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā pṛthivīlakṣaṇasvabhāvatvātpṛthivī,
S04bsu021_u:302_2: na ca mahāmate pṛthivī dahyate tejodhātupratibaddhatvādanyatra bālapṛthagjanā vitathatāpatitayā saṃtatyā dahyamānāṃ kalpayanti,
S04bsu021_u:302_5: tadyathā mahāmate nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ vālukā apramāṇāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:302_6: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ raśmyāloko 'pramāṇaḥ sattvaparipākasaṃcodanamupādāya sarvabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu prasarpyate tathāgataiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:302_7: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā na vālukāsvabhāvāntaramārabhante,
S04bsu021_u:302_8: vālukāvasthā eva vālukāḥ, evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saṃsāre na pravṛttirna nivṛttiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:302_10: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā apakṛṣṭā api na prajñāyante,
S04bsu021_u:302_12: mahāmate evameva tathāgatānāṃ jñānaṃ sattvaparipākayogena na kṣīyate na vardhate,
S04bsu021_u:302_13: aśarīratvāddharmasya / śarīravatāṃ hi mahāmate nāśo bhavati nāśarīravatām /
S04bsu021_u:302_14: dharmaścāśarīraḥ / tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā niṣpīḍyamānā ghṛtatailārthibhirghṛtatailādivirahitāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:302_15: evameva mahāmate tathāgatāḥ sattvaduḥkhairniṣpīḍyamānā dharmadhātvīśvarapraṇidhānasukhaṃ na vijahati mahāmate mahākaruṇopetatvāt,
S04bsu021_u:302_17: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukāḥ pravāhānukūlāḥ pravahanti nānudake,
S04bsu021_u:302_18: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmadeśanā nirvāṇapravāhānukūlā saṃvartate /
S04bsu021_u:302_22: na ca mahāmate saṃsārasya pūrvā koṭiḥ prajñāyate /
S04bsu021_u:302_23: aprajñāyamānā kathaṃ gatyarthena nirdekṣyāmi? gatyartho mahāmate ucchedaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:303_0: mahāmatirāha - tadyadi bhagavan pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyate sattvānāṃ saṃsaratām,
S04bsu021_u:303_1: tatkathaṃ mokṣaḥ prajñāyate prāṇinām? bhagavānāha - anādikālaprapañcadauṣṭhulyavikalpavāsanāhetuvinivṛttirmahāmate svacittadṛśyabāhyārthaparijñānādvikalpasyāśrayaparāvṛttirmahāmate mokṣo na nāśaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:303_5: adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā parīkṣyamāṇaṃ buddhyā /
S04bsu021_u:305_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:305_1: deśayatu me sugatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaṃ bhedalakṣaṇaṃ caiṣām /
S04bsu021_u:305_2: tatkathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ? bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu,
S04bsu021_u:305_4: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:305_5: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmā iti mahāmate yaduta kuśalākuśalāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā laukikalokottarāḥ sāvadyānavadyāḥ sāsravānāsravā upāttānupāttāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:305_7: samādhisukhasamāpattayo mahāmate dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārabhāvena āryāṇāṃ kuśalānāsravā ityucyante /
S04bsu021_u:305_9: katamānyaṣṭau? yaduta tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito mano manovijñānaṃ ca pañca ca vijñānakāyāstīrthyānuvarṇitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:305_10: tatra mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā manovijñānasahitā kuśalākuśalakṣaṇaparaṃparābhedabhinnāḥ saṃtatiprabandhanābhinnaśarīrāḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante /
S04bsu021_u:305_12: saṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣagrāhakaṃ manovijñānaṃ pañcabhirvijñānakāyaiḥ saha saṃprayuktaṃ pravartate kṣaṇakālānavasthāyi /
S04bsu021_u:305_13: tatkṣaṇikamiti vadāmi / kṣaṇikaṃ punarmahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ tathāgatagarbhasaṃśabditaṃ manaḥsahitaṃ pravṛttivijñānavāsanābhiḥ kṣaṇikamanāsravavāsanābhirakṣaṇikam /
S04bsu021_u:305_14: na ca bālapṛthagjanā avabudhyante kṣaṇikavādābhiniviṣṭā kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatāmimāṃ sarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:305_16: [Vaidya_96] asaṃsāriṇo mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā ananubhūtasukhaduḥkhā anirvāṇahetavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:306_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitāḥ suvarṇavajrajinadhātuprāptiviśeṣā abhaṅginaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:306_2: anāryatvamāryāṇāṃ syāt / na ca anāryatvamāryāṇāṃ bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:306_3: suvarṇaṃ vajraṃ ca mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitā api tulyamānā na hīyante na vardhante /
S04bsu021_u:306_4: tatkathaṃ bālaiḥ kṣaṇikārthe vikalpyate ādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmasaṃdhābhāṣyakuśalaiḥ?
S04bsu021_u:307_0: punarapi mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūrya buddhatvamavāpyata iti /
S04bsu021_u:307_1: tatkatamāstāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ? kathaṃ ca paripūriṃ gacchanti? bhagavānāha - traya ete mahāmate pāramitābhedāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:307_7: tatra lokottarābhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nirvāṇagrāhapatitāśayā dānādiṣu prayujyante yathaiva bālā ātmasukhanirvāṇābhilāṣiṇaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:307_8: lokottaratamāḥ punarmahāmate svacittadṛśyavikalpamātragrahaṇātsvacittadvayāvabodhādapravṛttervikalpasya upādānagrahaṇābhāvātsvacittarūpalakṣaṇānabhiniveśāddānapāramitā sarvasattvahitasukhārthamājāyate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paramayogayoginām /
S04bsu021_u:307_10: tacchīlaṃ pāramitā ca sā / yā tasyaiva vikalpasyāpravṛttikṣamaṇatā grāhyagrāhakaparijñayā,
S04bsu021_u:307_11: sā kṣāntipāramitā / yena vīryeṇa pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ ghaṭate yogānukūladarśanādvikalpasya vyāvṛtteḥ,
S04bsu021_u:307_13: tatra prajñāpāramitā yadā svacittavikalpābhāvādābuddhipravicayātprativicinvan antadvaye na patati āśrayaparāvṛttipūrvakarmavināśataḥ,
S04bsu021_u:lank_6.11_0: utpattyanantaraṃ bhaṅgaṃ na vai deśemi bāliśān /
S04bsu021_u:lank_6.12_0: sā vidyā kāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ cittānāṃ saṃpravartikam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_6.13_1: rūpaṃ na tiṣṭhate kāle kimālambya pravartsyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_6.17_0: gandharvapuramāyādyā rūpā vai kṣaṇikā na kim /
S04bsu021_u:313_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - arhantaḥ punarbhagavatā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu021_u:313_2: yasyāṃ ca rātrau tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yasyāṃ ca rātrau parinirvṛtaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:313_3: etasminnantare bhagavatā ekamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtam /
S04bsu021_u:313_4: sadā samāhitāśca tathāgatā na vitarkayanti na vyavacārayanti /
S04bsu021_u:313_6: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kṣaṇaparaṃparābhedalakṣaṇaṃ nirdiśyate? vajrapāṇiśca satatasamitaṃ nityānubaddhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:313_8: nirvṛtiśca prajñāpyate / mārāśca mārakarmāṇi ca karmaplotayaśca /
S04bsu021_u:313_9: cañcāmāṇavikā sundarikā pravrājikā yathā dhautapātrādīni ca bhagavan karmāvaraṇāni dṛśyante /
S04bsu021_u:313_10: tatkathaṃ bhagavatā sarvākārajñatā prāptā aprahīṇairdoṣaiḥ? bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu,
S04bsu021_u:313_12: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:313_13: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ saṃdhāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca caritavatāṃ protsāhanārtham /
S04bsu021_u:313_14: santi hi mahāmate bodhisattvacaryācāriṇaḥ iha anyeṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu /
S04bsu021_u:313_15: yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānanirvāṇābhilāṣasteṣāṃ śrāvakayānarucivyāvartanārthaṃ mahāyānagatiprotsāhanārthaṃ ca tannirmitaśrāvakānnirmāṇakāyairvyākaroti,
S04bsu021_u:313_16: na ca dharmatābuddhaiḥ / etatsaṃdhāya mahāmate śrāvakavyākaraṇaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
S04bsu021_u:313_17: na hi mahāmate śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇaviśeṣo vimuktyekarasatayā /
S04bsu021_u:313_21: pūrvadharmasthititāṃ saṃdhāya apūrvacaramasya cābhāvātpūrvaprahiṇairevākṣaraistathāgato na vitarkya na vicārya dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu021_u:314_0: sapta mahāmate manomanovijñānacakṣurvijñānādayaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ vāsanāhetutvātkuśalānāsravapakṣarahitāḥ na saṃsāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:314_3: nirmitanairmāṇikānāṃ mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ vajrapāṇiḥ pārśvānugato na maulānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
S04bsu021_u:314_4: maulo hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ sarvapramāṇendriyavinivṛttaḥ sarvabālaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyānām /
S04bsu021_u:314_8: na teṣu tathāgato na cānyatra tebhyastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:314_10: lakṣaṇopetaṃ ca deśayati, na tu svanayapratyavasthānakathāṃ svapratyātmāryagatigocaram /
S04bsu021_u:314_11: punaraparaṃ mahāmate ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ nirodhāducchedadṛṣṭimāśrayanti [Vaidya_99] bālapṛthagjanāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:lank_7.1_0: trīṇi yānānyayānaṃ ca buddhānāṃ nāsti nirvṛtiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_7.3_1: yānti tenaiva nānyena atasteṣāṃ na nirvṛtiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:321_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiḥ paripṛcchaya punarapyadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadoṣam,
S04bsu021_u:321_1: yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anāgatapratyutpannakāle sattvānāṃ kravyādasattvagativāsanāvāsitānāṃ māṃsabhojagṛddhāṇāṃ rasatṛṣṇāprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayāma,
S04bsu021_u:321_2: yathā ca te kravyādabhojinaḥ sattvā virāgya rasatṛṣṇāṃ dharmarasāhārakāṅkṣayā sarvasattvaikaputrakapremānugatāḥ parasparaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ pratilabheran /
S04bsu021_u:321_4: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyā vā viśramya anuttarāṃ tāthāgatīṃ bhūmimupasarpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:321_6: svayaṃ ca na bhakṣyate, prāgeva kṛpaikarase samyaksaṃbuddhe praṇīte lokanāthe /
S04bsu021_u:321_7: tava śāsane māṃsaṃ svayaṃ ca bhakṣyate,
S04bsu021_u:321_9: tatsādhu bhagavān sarvalokānukampakaḥ sarvasattvaiputrakasamadarśī mahākāruṇiko 'nukampāmupādāya māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadeṣān deśayatu me,
S04bsu021_u:321_10: yathā ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvāstathatvāya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayema /
S04bsu021_u:321_13: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:322_0: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - aparimitairmahāmate kāraṇairmāṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:322_2: iha mahāmate anena dīrgheṇādhvanā saṃsaratāṃ prāṇināṃ nāstyasau kaścitsattvaḥ sulabharūpo yo na mātābhūtpitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā putro vā duhitā vā anyatarānyataro vā svajanabandhubandhūbhūto vā /
S04bsu021_u:322_3: tasya anyajanmaparivṛttāśrayasya mṛgapaśupakṣiyonyantarbhūtasya bandhorbandhubhūtasya vā sarvabhūtātmabhūtānupāgantukāmena sarvajantuprāṇibhūtasaṃbhūtaṃ māṃsaṃ kathamiva bhakṣyaṃ syādbuddhadharmakāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena? rākṣasasyāpi mahāmate tathāgatānāmimāṃ dharmasudharmatāmupaśrutya upagatarakṣabhāvāḥ kṛpālavā bhavanti māṃsabhakṣaṇavinivṛttāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:322_4: kimuta dharmakāmā janāḥ / evaṃ tāvanmahāmate teṣu teṣu jātiparivarteṣu sarvasattvāḥ svajanabandhubhāvasaṃjñāḥ sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyam /
S04bsu021_u:322_6: vyabhicārādapi mahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ cāritravato bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:322_8: tāni ca mahāmate vīthyantareṣvaurabhrikā bhakṣyāṇīti kṛtvā mūlyahetorvikrīyante yataḥ,
S04bsu021_u:323_1: udvejanakaratvādapi mahāmate bhūtānāṃ maitrīmicchato yogino māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:323_2: [Vaidya_101] tadyathāpi mahāmate ḍombacāṇḍālakaivartādīn piśitāśinaḥ sattvān dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā śvānaḥ prabhayanti bhayena,
S04bsu021_u:323_4: evameva mahāmate anye 'pi khabhūjalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmajantavo ye māṃsāśino darśanāddūrādeva paṭunā ghrāṇenāghrāya gandhaṃ rākṣasasyeva mānuṣā drutamapasarpanti,
S04bsu021_u:323_6: tasmādapi ca mahāmate udvejanakaratvānmahāmaitrīvihāriṇo yogino māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya anāryajanajuṣṭaṃ durgandham /
S04bsu021_u:323_8: ṛṣibhojanāhāro hi mahāmate āryajano na māṃsarudhirāhāraḥ,
S04bsu021_u:324_0: bahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:324_2: kiṃcitteṣāṃ śrāmaṇyam, kuto vā brāhmaṇyam? yannāmaite pūrvarṣibhojanānyapāsya kravyādā ivāmiṣāhārāḥ paripūrṇakukṣayaḥ khabhūmijalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmāṃstrāsayanto jantūn samutrāsayanta imaṃ lokaṃ samantataḥ paryaṭanti /
S04bsu021_u:324_3: nihatameṣāṃ śrāmaṇyam, dhvastameṣāṃ brāhmaṇyam, nāstyeṣāṃ dharmo na vinayaḥ, ityanekaprakārapratihatacetasaḥ śāsanamevāpavadanti /
S04bsu021_u:324_4: tasmādbahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsaṃṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:325_1: mṛtasyāpi hi mahāmate manuṣyasya māṃse dahyamāne tadanyaprāṇimāṃse ca,
S04bsu021_u:325_3: ato 'pi mahāmate śucikāmasya yoginaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:326_0: śmaśānikānāṃ ca mahāmate araṇyavanaprasthānyamanuṣyāvacarāṇi prāntāni śayanāsanānyadhyāvasatāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ vidyāṃ sādhayitukāmānāṃ vidyāsādhanamokṣavighnakaratvānmahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayogasādhanāntarāyakaramityapi samanupaśyatāṃ mahāmate svaparātmahitakāmasya māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
