S04bsu021_u:326_2: devatā api cainaṃ parivarjayantīti kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:326_4: ityapi kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:326_5: duḥkhaṃ svapiti, duḥkhaṃ pratibudhyate / pāpakāṃśca romaharṣaṇān svapnān paśyanti /
S04bsu021_u:326_7: utrasyantyapi, kadācitsaṃtrasyantyapi, saṃtrāsamakasmāccāpadyante, āhāre ca mātrāṃ na jānāti nāpyaśitapītakhāditākhāditasya samyagrasapariṇāmapuṣṭyādi samāsādayati,
S04bsu021_u:326_10: [Vaidya_102] putramāṃsabhaiṣajyavadāhāraṃ deśayaṃścāhaṃ mahāmate kathamiva anāryajanasevitamāryajanavivarjitamevamanekadoṣāvahamanekaguṇavivarjitamanṛṣibhojanapraṇītamakalpyaṃ māṃsarudhirāhāraṃ śiṣyebhyo 'nujñāpyāmi?
S04bsu021_u:327_2: na ca mahāmate anāgate 'dhvani ekeṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ vividhavinayavikalpavādināṃ kravyādakulavāsitāvāsitānāṃ rasatṛṣṇāvyavasitānāmidaṃ praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ pratibhāṣyate /
S04bsu021_u:327_3: na tu mahāmate pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāmavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ śrāddhānāmavikalpānāṃ bahulānāṃ śākyakulakulīnānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ kāyajīvitabhogānadhyavasitānāmarasagṛdhrāṇāmalolupānāṃ kṛpālūnāṃ sarvabhūtātmabhūtatāmupagantukāmānāṃ sarvasattvaikaputrakapriyadarśināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānamiti vadāmi /
S04bsu021_u:328_1: sa māṃsabhojanāhārātiprasaṅgena pratisevamāno rasatṛṣṇādhyavasānaparamatayā māṃsāni mānuṣyāṇyapi bhakṣitavān /
S04bsu021_u:329_0: indreṇāpi ca mahāmate devādhipatyaṃ prāptena (pūrvābhūtvā) pūrvajanmamāṃsādavāsanādoṣācchyenarūpamāsthāya kapotaveṣarūpadhārī viśvakarmā samabhidruto 'bhūt /
S04bsu021_u:329_2: yasmādrājā anaparādhibhūtānukampakaḥ śibī duḥkhena mahatā lambhitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:329_3: tadevamanekajanmābhyastamapi mahāmate devendrabhūtasya śakrasyāpi sataḥ svaparadoṣāvahanamabhūt,
S04bsu021_u:330_0: anyeṣāṃ ca mahāmate narendrabhūtānāṃ satāmaśvenāpahṛtānāmaṭavyāṃ paryaṭamānānāṃ siṃhyā saha maithunaṃ gatavatāṃ jīvitabhayādapatyāni cotpāditavantaḥ siṃhasaṃvāsānvayātkalmāṣapādaprabhṛtayo nṛpaputrāḥ pūrvajanmamāṃsādadoṣavāsanatayā manuṣyendrabhūtā api santo māṃsādā abhūvan /
S04bsu021_u:330_1: ihaiva ca mahāmate janmani saptakuṭīrake 'pi grāme pracuramāṃsalaulyādatiprasaṅgena niṣevamānā mānuṣamāṃsādā ghorā ḍākā vā ḍākinyaśca saṃjāyante /
S04bsu021_u:330_2: jātiparivarte ca mahāmate tathaiva māṃsarasādhyavasānatayā siṃhavyāghradvīpivṛkatarakṣumārjārajambukolūkādipracuramāṃsādayoniṣu pracuratarapiśitāśanā rākṣasādighoratarayoniṣu vinipātyante /
S04bsu021_u:330_4: prāgave nirvṛtiḥ / ityevamādayo mahāmate māṃsādadoṣāḥ prāgeva niṣevamānānāṃ samupajāyante,
S04bsu021_u:330_6: na ca mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā [Vaidya_103] etāṃścānyāṃśca guṇadoṣānavabudhyante /
S04bsu021_u:330_7: evamādiguṇadoṣadarśanānmahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasyeti vadāmi /
S04bsu021_u:331_0: yadi ca mahāmate māṃsaṃ na kathaṃcana kecana bhakṣayeyuḥ,
S04bsu021_u:331_1: na tannidānaṃ ghāteran / mūlyahetorhi mahāmate prāyaḥ prāṇino niraparādhino vadhyante svalpādanyahetoḥ /
S04bsu021_u:331_2: kaṣṭaṃ mahāmate rasatṛṣṇāyāmatisevatāṃ māṃsāni mānuṣānyapi mānuṣairbhakṣyante,
S04bsu021_u:331_4: prāyo mahāmate māṃsarasatṛṣṇārtairidaṃ tathā tathā jālayantramāviddhaṃ mohapuruṣaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:331_6: na caiṣāṃ mahāmate kiṃkanīkṛtarūkṣacetasāṃ rākṣasānāmiva gataghṛṇānāṃ kadācidapi prāṇiṣu prāṇisaṃjñayā ghātayatāṃ bhakṣayatāṃ na ghṛṇotpadyate /
S04bsu021_u:332_0: na ca mahāmate akṛtakamakāritamasaṃkalpitaṃ nāma māṃsaṃ kalpyamasti yadupādāya anujānīyāṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:332_1: bhaviṣyanti tu punarmahāmate anāgate 'dhvani mamaiva śāsane pravrajitvā śākyaputrīyatvaṃ pratijānānāḥ kāṣāyadhvajadhāriṇo mohapuruṣā mithyāvitarkopahatacetaso vividhavinayavikalpavādinaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiyuktā rasatṛṣṇādhyavasitāstāṃ tāṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇahetvābhāsāṃ granthayiṣyanti /
S04bsu021_u:332_5: praṇītabhojaneṣu coktam, svayaṃ ca kila tathāgatena paribhuktamiti /
S04bsu021_u:333_0: yadi tu mahāmate anujñātukāmatā me syāt,
S04bsu021_u:333_1: kalpyaṃ vā me śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisevituṃ syāt,
S04bsu021_u:333_2: nāhaṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ śmaśānikānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ sarvāmāṃsabhakṣaṇapratiṣedhaṃ kuryām,
S04bsu021_u:333_3: kṛtavāṃśca / asmin mahāmate dharmakāmānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ śmaśānikānāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāmāraṇyakānāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ sarvayogasādhanāya sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ sarvamāṃsapratiṣedham /
S04bsu021_u:334_0: tatra tatra deśanāpāṭhe śikṣāpadānāmanupūrvībandhaṃ niḥśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena trikoṭiṃ baddhvā na taduddiśya kṛtāni pratiṣiddhāni /
S04bsu021_u:334_2: iha tu sūtre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ nirupāyena sarvaṃ pratiṣiddham /
S04bsu021_u:334_4: nānujānāmi, nānujñāsyāmi / akalpyaṃ mahāmate pravrajitānāṃ māṃsabhojanamiti vadāmi /
S04bsu021_u:334_5: yadapi ca mahāmate mamābhyākhyānaṃ dātavyaṃ maṃsyante tathāgatenāpi paribhuktamiti,
S04bsu021_u:334_6: tadanyeṣāṃ mahāmate mohapuruṣāṇāṃ svakarmadoṣāvaraṇāvṛtānāṃ dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāya saṃvartakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu021_u:334_9: dharmāhārā hi mahāmate mama śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāśca nāmiṣāhārāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:334_10: prāgeva tathāgatāḥ / dharmakāyā hi mahāmate tathāgatā dharmāhārasthitayo nāmiṣakāyā na sarvāmiṣāhārasthitayo vāntasarvabhavopakaraṇatṛṣṇaiṣaṇāvāsanāḥ sarvakleśadoṣavāsanāpagatāḥ suvimuktacittaprajñāḥ sarvajñāḥ sarvadarśinaḥ sarvasattvaikaputrakasamadarśino mahākāruṇikāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:334_11: so 'haṃ mahāmate sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñī san kathamiva svaputramāṃsamanujñāsyāmi paribhoktuṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:334_12: kuta eva svayaṃ paribhoktum? anujñātavānasmi śrāvakebhyaḥ svayaṃ vā paribhuktavāniti mahāmate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /

S04bsu021_u:lank_8.22_1: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret //
S04bsu021_u:341_0: atha khalu bhagavān mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - udgṛhṇa tvaṃ mahāmate laṅkāvatāre mantrapadāni yānyatītānāgatapratyutpannairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbhāṣitāni,
S04bsu021_u:341_1: bhāṣante, bhāṣiṣyante ca / ahamapyetarhi bhāṣiṣye dharmabhāṇakānāṃ parigrahārtham /

S04bsu021_u:342_5: so 'syāṣṭottaraśatābhimantritena rodan krandanto kaṃ diśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāsyati /
S04bsu021_u:343_1: tadyathā - padme padmadeve / hine hini hine / cu cule culu cule / phale phula phule / yule ghule yula yule / ghule ghula ghule / pale pala pale / muñce 3 / chinde bhinde bhañje marde pramarde dinakare svāhā /
S04bsu021_u:344_0: imāni mahāmate mantrapadāni yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
S04bsu021_u:344_1: tasya na kaścidavatāraṃ lapsyate devo vā devī vā nāgo vā nāgī vā yakṣo vā yakṣī vā asuro vā asurī vā garuḍo vā garuḍī vā kinnaro vā kinnarī vā mahorago vā mahoragī vā gandharvo vā gandharvī vā bhūto vā bhūtī vā kumbhāṇḍo vā kumbhāṇḍī vā piśāco vā piśācī vā ostārako vā ostārakī vā,

S04bsu021_u:344_5: imāni bhagavatā mantrapadāni bhāṣitāni rākṣasānāṃ nivāraṇārtham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.5_0: na nirvāsi na nirvāṇe na nirvāṇaṃ tvayi sthitam /

S04bsu021_u:lank_10.20_1: pratyayā dhātavo jñeyā śūnyatā ca bhavābhavam //

S04bsu021_u:lank_10.25_0: nāhaṃ nirvāmi bhāvena kriyayā lakṣaṇena ca /

S04bsu021_u:lank_10.29_0: khadyotā iva mattasya yathā citrā na santi ca /

S04bsu021_u:lank_10.31_0: na grāhako na ca grāhyaṃ na bandhyo na ca bandhanam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.32_1: tadā yogaṃ samāpanno drakṣyate māṃ na saṃśayaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.34_1: bhrāntaṃ traidhātuke cittaṃ vicitraṃ khyāyate yataḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.35_0: svapnaṃ ca lokaṃ ca samasvabhāvaṃ rūpāṇi citrāṇi hi tatra cāpi /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.35_1: dṛśyanti bhogaṃ spariśaṃ samānaṃ dehāntagaṃ lokaguruṃ kriyāṃ ca //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.36_0: cittaṃ hi traidhātukayoniretadbhrāntaṃ hi cittamihamutra dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.37_1: na saṃbhavaṃ na vibhavaṃ prajñāyukto vipaśyati //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.40_1: sarvatra bālāḥ śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ tebhyaḥ pratiśrutvā (?) //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.42_1: bhrānteśca vidyate māyā na māyā bhrāntikāraṇam //

S04bsu021_u:lank_10.60_1: utpadyate ca vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ ca nirudhyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.61_0: nimnonnataṃ yathā citre dṛśyate na ca vidyate /

S04bsu021_u:lank_10.64_1: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkena kutastasya vibhāvanā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.68_1: abhijñā vaśitā tasya balā cittasya citritā //

S04bsu021_u:lank_10.70_0: cittaṃ hi khyāti cittasya bahirdhā khyāti rūpiṇaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.71_0: saṃkalā buddhabimbaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ca vidāraṇam /

S04bsu021_u:lank_10.94_2: atikramya tu putrā me nirvikalpāścaranti te //

S04bsu021_u:lank_10.443_1: alātaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā ca asantaṃ khyāyate nṛṇām //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.447_1: tathā ca śrāvako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.448_0: niṣṭhāgatirna tattasyā na ca bhūyo nivartate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.450_1: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.451_0: paṅkamagno yathā hastī itastato na dhāvati /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.453_0: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.455_1: niṣpannaṃ tathatetyuktaṃ sūtre sūtre sadā mayā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.456_0: vyañjanaṃ padakāyaṃ ca nāma cāpi viśeṣataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.456_1: bālāḥ sajanti durmedhā yathā paṅke mahāgajāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.458_0: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.458_1: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāyinaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.461_0: cittena dhāryate kāyo mano manyati vai sadā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.462_0: tṛṣṇā hi mātā ityuktā avidyā ca tathā pitā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.465_0: siddhāntaśca nayaścāpi pratyātmaṃ śāsanaṃ ca vai /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.465_1: ye paśyanti vibhāgajñā na te tarkavaśaṃ gatāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.466_0: na bhāvo vidyate satyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.466_1: abhāvena tu vai mokṣaṃ kathaṃ necchanti tārkikāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.467_1: dṛṣṭidvayaṃ prapuṣṇanti na ca jānanti pratyayān //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.469_0: rāgo na vidyate dveṣo mohaścāpi na pudgalaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.470_0: yasyāṃ ca rātryāṃ dhigamo yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.471_1: taiśca buddhairmayā caiva na ca kiṃcidviśeṣitam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.472_1: skandhā vidyanti bhāvena ātmā teṣu na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.477_1: kāryaṃ hi pratyayāḥ sarve na kāryājjāyate bhavaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.478_0: kāryaṃ na jāyate kāryaṃ dvitvaṃ kārye prasajyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.481_0: prajñaptisatyato hyātmā dravyaḥ sa hi na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.481_1: skandhānāṃ skandhatā tadvatprajñaptyā na tu dravyataḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.486_1: bahirdhā jāyate nṝṇāṃ cittamātraṃ hi laukikam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.487_0: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate bāhyaṃ cittacitraṃ vidṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.489_0: bahirdhā nāsti vai rūpaṃ svacittaṃ dṛśyate bahiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.491_0: na hetavo na koṭyo vai dṛṣṭāntāvayavāni ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.496_0: yathā hi darpaṇe bimbaṃ keśoṇḍustimirasya vā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.496_1: tathā hi vāsanaiśchannaṃ cittaṃ paśyanti bāliśāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.497_1: artho na vidyate bāhyo yathā tīrthyairvikalpyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.498_0: rajjuṃ yathā hyajānānāḥ sarpaṃ gṛhṇanti bāliśāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.500_0: na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na lakṣyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.501_1: ato nāsti na gantavyaṃ astitvaṃ na ca kalpayet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.502_0: kalpitaṃ kalpyamānaṃ hi yadidaṃ na tadātmakam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.504_1: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā kena bhrāmitā brūhi me mune //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.505_0: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā nāsti cittamātraṃ ca dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.506_0: kalpitaṃ yadi vai nāsti yathā kalpati bāliśaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.506_1: anyathā vidyate cāsau na ca buddhyāvagamyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.507_0: āryāṇāṃ yadi vā so 'sti nāsau bālairvikalpitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.507_1: āryāṇāmatha mithyāsau āryā bālaiḥ samaṃ gatāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.509_1: etaddhi putra mā kranda gṛhṇa citramidaṃ phalam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.511_0: abhūtvā yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairna ca saṃkulaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.512_0: alabdhātmakaṃ hyajātaṃ ca pratyayairna vinā kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.512_1: utpannamapi te bhāvo pratyayairna vinā kvacit //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.515_1: arthaṃ sunītaṃ hi mayā na ca budhyanti bāliśāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.517_0: lakṣaṇaṃ bhāva saṃsthānaṃ nāma caiva caturvidham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.518_1: somabhāskarayorbhāvā ye nāśenti na te sutāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.520_0: eṣā hi mudrā muktānāṃ putrāṇāṃ mama śāsane /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.521_1: nityānityaṃ na prāpnoti saṃsāraśca na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.523_0: pradhvaṃsi patitaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānaṃ ca bhavālaye /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.524_0: atha taiḥ saha saṃbaddhaṃ karma vai dhvasyate nṛṇām /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.524_1: dhvaste tu karmasaṃbandhe na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.525_0: atha dhvastamapi taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃsāre yadi jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.526_0: nābhinnaṃ na ca vai bhinnaṃ cittaṃ rūpaṃ vikalpanāt /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.528_1: nāstyasti kathaṃ bhavati rūpe cānityatā yathā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.530_0: kalpitaṃ hi vināśete mama netrī vinaśyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.531_1: sarve ca te hyasaṃkathyā mama netrīvināśakāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.534_0: nāsau śikṣati buddhānāṃ yasteṣāṃ saṃgrahe caret /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.535_0: viviktaṃ kalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ ye tu paśyanti yoginaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.537_0: tathā hi sattvagotrāṇi citrā vai karmavarjitā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.537_1: dṛśyābhāvānna karmāsti na ca vai karmajā gatiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.538_1: kiṃ tu vidyanti vai bhāvā yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.539_0: yadi bhāvā va vidyante yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.541_0: yeṣāṃ tu bhāvo vai nāsti yathā bālairvikalpitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.541_1: teṣāṃ na vidyate vṛttirindriyāṇāṃ na yoginaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.547_1: kalpito nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kalpayiṣyanti tārkikāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.554_0: paṭaiśca vai kaṭo nāsti paṭo vai vīraṇaistathā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.554_1: eka ekatrā saṃbhūtaḥ pratyayaiḥ kiṃ na jāyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.555_1: paravādā hyamī sarve mayā ca samudāhṛtāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.559_0: na bhūtaṃ nāpi cābhūtaṃ pratyayairna ca pratyayāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.561_1: ahetukaṃ sadā paśyan vikalpo na pravartate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.563_0: vastu na vidyate paśyaṃścittamātraṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.563_1: avastukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.564_1: ahetukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.565_1: vidyante na ca vidyante na te mannayakovidāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.566_1: etaddhi laukikaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.567_1: dvicittatā prasajyeta na ca cittaṃ dvilakṣaṇam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.568_0: svadhāraṃ hi yathā khaḍgaṃ svāgraṃ vai aṅguliryathā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.568_1: na chindate na spṛśate tathā cittaṃ svadarśane //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.569_0: na paraṃ na ca vai tantraṃ kalpitaṃ vastumeva ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.569_1: pañca dharmā dvicittaṃ ca nirābhāse na santi vai //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.571_0: atha vaicitryasaṃsthāne kalpā ca yadi jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.573_0: anādimati saṃsāre artho vai nāsti kutracit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.574_1: na cābhāvena vai puṣṭo vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.575_0: yathāpi dānīṃ naivāsti tathā pūrve 'pi nāstyasau /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.579_1: arthābhāve kathaṃ cittaṃ jāyate brūhi me mune //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.580_0: ahetukamidaṃ sarvaṃ na cittaṃ na ca gocaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.580_1: na ca vai puṣyate cittaṃ tribhavaṃ kriyavarjitam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.581_2: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.582_1: anutpannān svabhāvāṃśca śūnyāḥ kena vadāsi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.585_1: na tu tīrthyadṛṣṭyā pralayo samavāyo na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.586_1: anutpādaiḥ prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.587_1: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.589_1: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.590_0: na ca bhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.590_1: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.595_0: na bāhyabhāvaṃ bhāvānāṃ na ca cittaparigraham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.596_1: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.597_1: kalapācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.598_0: bhāvo na vidyate hyanyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.602_0: yasya janyo hi bhāvo 'sti saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.608_0: parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.608_1: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.609_0: yadi janyo na bhāvo 'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.609_1: anyonyapratyayā hyete te tena pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.610_1: kalāpo 'yaṃ na dharmo 'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.611_1: na tu śāstrasya bhedo 'sti doṣabhedastu vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.612_1: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi bāliśān //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.615_0: astitvasādhakaṃ nāsti nāsti nāsti na yujyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.616_0: kiṃcidāśritya punaḥ kiṃcitkhyāyate yasya vai matam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.617_1: anavasthā prasajyeta kiṃcicca kiṃ ca no bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.619_0: māyājālaṃ na parṇāni na kāṣṭhaṃ na ca śarkarā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.621_1: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.622_0: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu vikalpo na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.622_1: apravṛttiṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.624_0: bāhyaṃ na vidyate dṛśyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.629_1: buddhā deśenti vai yogaṃ mayā ca prativarṇitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.632_0: tathā hi dehinaḥ sarve vikalpena samīritāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.633_1: ābhā vṛttiḥ kathaṃ kena cittamātraṃ vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.636_0: nāma nāmni visaṃyuktaṃ yadā paśyati kalpitam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.637_1: ye tvanyathāvabudhyante na te buddhā na bodhakāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.638_0: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvāśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.639_0: yadā buddhiśca boddhavyaṃ viviktaṃ paśyate jagat /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.641_0: catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ saṃkhyā teṣāṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.642_0: lakṣaṇasya parityāgānna bhūtaṃ na ca bhautikam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.645_0: ālayaṃ hi manasyātmā ātmīyaṃ jñānameva ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.646_1: tadā dvayaṃ na kalpanti ātmā cātmīyameva ca //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.647_0: apravṛttaṃ na puṣṇāti na ca vijñānakāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.648_0: vikalpaṃ cittamātraṃ ca lokaṃ kena vadāhi me /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.650_1: astitvaṃ hi kathaṃ tasya cittagrāhānna jāyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.651_0: vikalpo na bhāvo nābhāvo ato 'stitvaṃ na jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.655_0: na saṃbhavo na vibhavo anityatvāddhi bāliśām /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.655_1: na hi naśyamānaṃ kiṃcidvai kāraṇatvena dṛśyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.656_0: adṛṣṭaṃ hi kathaṃ kena nānityo jāyate bhavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.659_1: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti dvidhā cittaṃ vidṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.663_1: gatayaḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātā yatra jāyanti dehinaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.664_1: saraṃkṣya kuśalān sarvān viśeṣo mokṣa eva vā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.665_0: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe tvayā yanmaraṇaṃ upapattiṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.668_1: rūpagrāhavinirmuktaṃ na janma na ca bhajyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.672_0: śarīre vyāmamātre ca lokaṃ vai lokasamudayam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.674_1: nivārārthaṃ tu dṛṣṭīnāṃ svabhāvaṃ na vikalpayet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.675_0: chidradoṣānna niyamo na vā cittaṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.676_0: ajñāna tṛṣṇā karma ca vijñānādyā ayonijāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.676_1: anavasthākṛtakatvaṃ ca na kṛtvā jāyate bhavaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.680_0: yathāhamanye ca sadā nāstyasti na visaṃkaret /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.682_1: bhāvā hi sarve svavikalpasaṃbhavāstīrthyā vikalpenti jagatsvakāraṇaiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.684_0: hastaḥ karo yathā loke indraḥ śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.685_0: rūpācca śūnyatā nānyā anutpādaṃ tathaiva ca /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.691_0: bhāvā vidyantyanutpannā na vā brūhi mahāmune /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.700_1: maṇḍalaṃ hi na me kiṃcinna ca deśemi dharmatām //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.701_0: dvaye sati hi doṣaḥ syāddvayaṃ buddhairviśodhitam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.702_1: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca vikalpasya vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.703_0: yathā yena prakāreṇa jāyate viṣayo mukham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.704_0: rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā bahirdhā vai vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.706_0: mā vikalpaṃ vikalpetha nirvikalpā hi paṇḍitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.709_1: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.710_1: tathā hi sarvabhāvānāṃ saṃbhavo na hyasaṃbhavaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.717_1: vāyunā kīryate rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhūtaiḥ pravartate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.719_1: vyatibhinnāni rūpāṇi cittaṃ rūpaṃ na bhautikam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.724_1: tīrthyā vadanti janma bhūtānāṃ bhautikasya ca //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.725_0: anutpannā yato ye 'nye tīrthyāḥ kalpanti kāraṇaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.731_1: tīrthyavādo na saṃdeho na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.732_0: rūpaṃ ca vidyate tatra ārūpye nāsti darśanam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.732_1: tadabhāvo na siddhānto na yānaṃ na ca yāyinam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.733_1: aṣṭavidhaikadeśaṃ hi kṣaṇe kāle na gṛhṇanti //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.734_0: na pravartati yadā rūpaṃ indriyā na ca indriyaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.734_1: ato hi deśeti bhagavān kṣaṇikā indriyādayaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.737_0: indriyā indriyārthāśca mūḍhānāṃ na tu paṇḍitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.737_1: bālā gṛhṇanti nāmena āryā vai arthakovidāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.738_0: ṣaṣṭhaṃ hi nirupādānaḥ sopādāno na gṛhyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.743_1: sopādānastathā hyātmā tārkikaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.744_1: dṛṣṭāntaṃ kiṃ na kurvanti tārkikā ātmasādhakāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.747_1: lakṣaṇaṃ yadi jānāti jñānaṃ saṃjāyate nayam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.748_1: ātmanā saha saṃyuktaṃ na ca dharmāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.752_0: na pudgalo na ca skandhā buddho jñānamanāsravam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.756_1: tiṣṭhanti na ca naśyante ātmā doṣaistathā vinā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.758_1: vidyamānā na dṛśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.759_1: akovidā na gṛhṇanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.760_0: yathā hi garbho garbhiṇyāṃ vidyate na ca dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.760_1: ātmā hi tadvatskandheṣu ayuktijño na paśyati //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.762_1: vidyamānāṃ na paśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.767_1: svarasaṃ vidyate teṣu anāsvādyaṃ na gṛhyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.768_1: na ca paśyantyavidvāṃso vidvān dṛṣṭvā vimucyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.770_0: vilakṣaṇā hi vai dharmāścittamekaṃ na gṛhyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.771_0: cittānupaśyī ca yogī cittaṃ citte na paśyati /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.773_0: paurāṇikamidaṃ vartma ahaṃ te ca tathāgatāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.774_0: kāmadhātau tathārūpye na vai buddho vibudhyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.776_0: asatyātmani māyādyā dharmā nāstyasti vai katham /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.776_1: bālānāṃ khyāti tathatā kathaṃ nāsti nirātmikā //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.778_1: dvāvapyetau na janakau kāraṇaiḥ kalpyate katham //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.782_1: bālānāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa brahmacaryaṃ na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.783_1: vyañjitaiḥ pravrajantyeke na cānye ca pravādinaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.785_0: mayi nirvṛte varṣaśate vyāso vai bhāratastathā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.786_0: mauryā nandāśca guptāśca tato mlecchā nṛpādhamāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.786_2: kaliyugānte lokaiśca saddharmo hi na bhāvitaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.788_1: cātuṃ rvarṇā nṛpendrāśca ṛṣayo dharmameva ca //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.789_0: vedāśca yajñaṃ dānaṃ ca dharmasthā vartsyate punaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.789_2: evaṃ mayā śrutādibhyo loko vai vibhramiṣyati //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.791_1: vastrapūtaṃ jalaṃ peyaṃ kaṭisūtraṃ ca dhārayet /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.794_1: ahaṃ cānye kṛtayuge śākyasiṃhaḥ kalau yuge //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.798_0: mātā ca me vasumatiḥ pitā vipraḥ prajāpatiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.799_0: campāyāṃ haṃ samutpannaḥ pitāpi ca pitāmahaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.802_1: ahaṃ ca virajo 'nye vai sarve te kṛtino jināḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.804_0: na dvāpare na tretāyāṃ na paścācca kalau yuge /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.806_0: dvayaṅgulaṃ tryaṅgulaṃ vāpi candraṃ candrāntaraṃ bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.806_1: anyathā citryamānaṃ hi lobhanīyaṃ hi bāliśān //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.809_0: ekaṃ ca bahudhā nāsti vailakṣaṇyānna kutracit /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.810_0: yadyekaṃ bahudhā vai syātsarve hyakṛtakā bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.811_1: ekaṃ hi bahudhā bhavati tārkikāṇāmayaṃ nayaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.819_0: bhaviṣyati mahāyogī nāmnā vai virajo muniḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.819_1: mokṣasya deśakaḥ śāstā munīnāmeṣa vai dhvajaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.828_1: abhūtikā ca bhūtāni bhūtāḥ kiṃcitkva cāgatau //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.832_0: yathā hi pāradaḥ śuddha upakleśairna lipyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.834_0: anyatve ca tadanyatve ubhayaṃ nobhaye tathā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.834_1: astitvaṃ nirupādānaṃ na ca nāsti na saṃskṛtam //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.837_1: ekatvena tadanyatvena na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.838_0: darpaṇe udake netre yatha bimbaṃ pradṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.839_0: bhāvyaṃ vibhāvanādhyātā mārgaḥ satyā ca darśanam /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.840_0: dṛṣṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ yathā vidyuccakraṃ chidragṛhe yathā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.852_0: anutpanne ca vijñāne ajñānādi na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.852_1: tadabhāve na vijñānaṃ saṃtatyā jāyate katham //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.856_0: pavanaṃ hi vahnerdahanaṃ preraṇe na tu saṃbhave /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.861_0: cittaṃ sattvāśca nirvāṇaṃ prakṛtyā bhāsurā nu vai /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.863_0: dṛṣṭāśca te yathābhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā kleśā vidāritāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.864_1: na ca budhyanti durmedhā avaktavyaśca kathyate //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.865_0: bherī yathā candanajā bālaiḥ kurvanti nānyathā /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.867_0: imaṃ nayaṃ yo 'numinoti yuktitaḥ prasādavān yogaparo hyakalpanaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.867_1: anāśrito hyarthaparo bhavedasau hiraṇmayīṃ dharmagatiṃ pradīpayet //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.868_0: bhāvābhāvapratyayamohakalpanā kudṛṣṭijālaṃ samalaṃ hi tasya tu /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.878_0: nivartate yadā cittaṃ nivṛttaṃ paśyato jagat /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.878_1: muditāṃ labhate bhūmiṃ buddhabhūmiṃ labhanti ca //
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.883_0: yathā hi grantho granthena yuktyā yuktistathā yadi /
S04bsu021_u:lank_10.884_0: cakṣuḥ karma ca tṛṣṇā ca avidyāyoniśastathā /
S04bsu021_u:354_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu021_u:354_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
